He has been in this business for 19 years and his monthly income is Kshs 12,000. He has borrowed a loan of Ksh 35,000 this being his third loan from KADET LTD. The loan will be used to buy more business stock i.e sugar tealeaves, bread and salt. He has successfully paid his previous loan. Jacob will use the anticipated profits to expand the business to greater heights. His hopes and dreams is to educate his children and own a big shop in Kapasabet town.

loans.use: To buy more stock of business  like sugar, tea leaves,bread,and salt

loans.name: Wael

texts.ar:
وائل في عمر 45 سنة يعمل في نقل الخضار والفواكه الموسيمية متزوج وله على عاتقه اربعة
اولاد يحب عمله وله في المصلحة اكثر من 15 سنة يريد من خلال طلب قرض له من المجموعة الى تكملة شراء ارض وزرعها
يريد ان يعتمد على نفسه وان يؤمن مستقبل افضل له ولعائلته يسعى جاهدا الى تحسين الوضع المادي والاجتماعي يلقى 
دعم كبير من محيطه فهو مميز بعمله ومتطور وطموح
texts.en: Wael, 45, is married with 4 children.  He has been working in transporting vegetables and seasonal fruits for 15 years. Wael has a passion for his work. He wishes to get a loan from Al Majmoua to fulfil the price of buying a plot of land and planting it. He wishes to be independent and to secure a better future both for himself and his family. Wael works hard to improve his family's social and economic conditions. He enjoys huge support from people who know him. Wael is known for his outstanding work, ambition and willingness to develop.

loans.use: To fulfill the price of buying a plot of land and planting it

loans.name: Kholoud

texts.en:
Kholoud is a mother from Gaza city in Gaza Strip. She has one daughter, Rana, and one son, Muhammad. Her husband, Imad, is a taxi driver who has been doing this work for four years now. Kholoud took out a loan from FATEN as her husband needs to do urgent maintenance on the car and to replace the old engine. The car is the only source of income for the family and fixing it will keep the family in a good financial situation.

Kholoud's husband Imad appears in the picture as she is religious, as are most of Gaza's inhabitants.

loans.use: For car maintenance and to replace an old engine

loans.name: Bilal

texts.ar:
بلال في عمر 38 سنة يعمل في مجال النقل العام لديه سيارة اجرة يعمل عليها اكثر من 13 سنة متزوج وله ولدان 
يحب عائلته ويسعى دائما الى تحسين الوضع المادي والاجتماعي له تاريخ جيد مع المجموعة وكان يلقى الدعم الدائم من عائلته
ومحيطه يريد من خلال طلب قرض من المجموعة الى شراء محرك جديد لسيارته فهي مصدر الرزق الوحيد له ولعائلته زبائنه
هم من محيطه وجيرانه ويعتمد على المواسم السياحية ليزيد من زبائنه
texts.en: Bilal, 38, is married with two children. He has been driving his own cab for 13 years. Bilal loves his family and always seeks to improve its social and economic conditions. He has a good credit history with Al Majmoua. Bilal always enjoys the support of his family and other people who know him.  Bilal wishes to get a loan from Al Majmoua to buy a new engine for his cab, the only source of income for him and his family. Bilal's clients include his neighbours and other people who know him. He depends on tourism seasons to increase his number of clients.

loans.use: Buy a new engine for his cab

loans.name: Elmira

texts.en:
Elmira A. has been trading in clothes since 2000. The business place is her house, which is a comfortable trading-spot for the neighborhood which gives orders to her for every season.

With winter season demand increasing, Elmira has applied to Kiva partner SEF for a loan to cover the purchasing costs for a new clothing inventory.

loans.use: To order a new clothing inventory.

loans.name: Amalya

texts.en: Amalya M. has been trading in flowers, design and perfume since 2000.  She adds a special touch to each order, making her customers happy and willing to come back to her shop. Amalya receives orders locally and from abroad. To enlarge her business, Amalya would like to purchase additional inventory for the shop.

loans.use: To purchase inventory for a flower shop

loans.name: Hassan

texts.ar:
حسن في عمر 21 سنة غير متزوج ويعمل في مجال الاليات الزراعية له في عمله حوالي 8 سنوات يحب عمله
ويسعى دائما الى زيادة مدخوله وتحسين وضعه وتأمين مستقبل جيد يحب ان يكون عائلة وان يكون مرتاح ماديا
من خلال تحسين عمله يريد من خلال طلب قرض له من المجموعة الى شراء ماكنة لضخ المياه ما ينقص حسن هو زيادة المدخول
لزيادة العمل زبائنه كثر هم من محيطه وجيرانه ولكن له خبرة واسعة في هذا المجال طموح وجدي في عمله ويتميز بالدقة 
والجدية
texts.en: Hassan, 21, is single. He has been working in agricultural machinery for 8 years. He likes his work and always seeks to increase his income, improve his living standard, and secure a bright future. Hassan wishes to make a family and to be financially successful by promoting his business. He wishes to get a loan from Al Majmoua to buy a water pump. Hassan lacks funds that would help him expand his business and increase his clients. Most of his clients are from his neighbourhood and the circle of people who know him. Hassan is ambitious, with wide experience in his work. He also takes his work seriously and is known for his meticulousness.

loans.use: To buy a water pump

loans.name: Elsa Aurora

texts.es:
Elsa Aurora S. C. tiene 37 años de edad, Es soltera, vive con los hijos en  el  Cantón de Ventanas  Provincia los Ríos. Tiene 2 hijos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. SAN JACINTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto campo alegre, por la parroquia guare perteneciente al cantón baba, esta ventanilla se dedica labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz.  Esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Elsa Aurora se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Compra sus productos en el Comercial Cepeda y Comercial Chicaisa y vende los  productos en el Comercial López.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para el cultivo de maíz y arroz. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es conocer las islas galápagos.

Le gusta cocinar y caminar.
texts.en:
Elsa Aurora S. C. is 37 years old.  She is single and lives with her children in Ventanas canton, in Los Ríos province.  She has 2 children.

The members of the SAN JACINTO community bank are located in Campo Alegre precinct, in Guare parish, in Baba canton.  The members of this community bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice.  They have been in this business for many years.

Elsa Aurora is a farmer who grows corn and rice.  She buys her products in the Cepeda and Chicaisa shopping areas and sells her products in the López shopping area.

She is requesting this loan to buy farming supplies and fertilizers for growing her corn and rice.  The support of this loan will help her to financially cover her needs.  She faces challenges such as insect infestations, plant diseases and changes in the weather.  Her dream is to go to the Galapagos Islands.

Elsa Aurora likes to cook and go for walks.

loans.use: To buy farming supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Juan Pablo

texts.es:
Juan Pablo R. Z.  tiene 33 años de edad, Vive en Unión Libre, vive con la compañera y con los hijos,  vive en el Cantón de Ventanas  Provincia los Ríos. Tiene 2 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. SAN JACINTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto campo alegre, por la parroquia guare perteneciente al cantón baba, esta ventanilla se dedica labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz.  Esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Juan Pablo se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Compra sus productos en el Comercial Cepeda y Comercial Chicaisa y vende los  productos en el Comercial López.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para el cultivo de maíz y arroz. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar un terreno y un carro.

Le gusta practicar el deporte.
texts.en:
Juan Pablo R. Z. is 33 years old.  He lives with his common-law wife and children in Ventanas canton, in Los Ríos province.  He has 2 children.

The members of the SAN JACINTO community bank are located in Campo Alegre precinct, in Guare parish, in Baba canton.  The members of this community bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice.  They have been in this business for many years.

Juan Pablo is a farmer who grows corn and rice.  He buys his products in the Cepeda and Chicaisa shopping areas and sells his products in the López shopping area.

He is requesting this loan to buy farming supplies and fertilizers for growing corn and rice.  The support of this loan will help him to financially cover his needs.  He faces challenges such as insect infestations, plant diseases and changes in the weather.  His dream is to buy a plot of land and a car.

Juan Pablo likes taking part in sports.

loans.use: To buy farming supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Raed

texts.en:
Raed is a 40-year-old man from Rafah city in Rafah refugee camp. Raed lives with his wife and is a NationA. Palestinian Authority employee. Raed's wife doesn't work which makes his salary the only source of income. Raed took out a loan from FATEN to purchase a new fridge to replace the old one he has in his house. The old one was a secondhand fridge which needed a lot of maintenance. 

Raed appears in the picture here in FATEN's office.

loans.use: To purchase a home fridge

loans.name: Samer

texts.ar:
سامر في عمر 34 سنة متزوج وله ولد يعمل في بيع الالعاب والعطورات والقرطاسية له في العمل
اكثر من 12 سنة يحب عائلته ويسعى جاهدا الى تحسين الوضع المادي والاجتماعي له ولعائلته التي يلقى منها الدعم
الكامل له تاريخ اقتراضي جيد مع المجموعة استطاع من خلاله الى تحسين مجال عمله وتوسيعه يريد من خلال طلب قرض من المجموعة
الى زيادة رأس المال في المحل وشراء بضائع جديدة لتوسيع المصلحة يحب ان يتقدم بوضعه الاجتماعي ويطمح ان يوسع
عمله حتى يصبح محل كبير
texts.en: Samer, 34, is married with a son. He has been working in selling toys, perfume and stationery for 12 years. He loves his family and enjoys its full support. Samer  works hard to improve his sociA. and economic conditions, as well as his family's. Samer has a good credit history with A. Majmoua. His previous loan helped him develop his business. He wishes to get a new loan to increase his business capitA. and buy new stock. Samer wishes to improve his sociA. status and expand his business so that he can own a big shop in the future.

loans.use: To increase his business capital and buy new stock

loans.name: Hasan

texts.en:
Hasan is a husband and the father of Ahmed, 13 years old; Asala, 11 years old; Osama, 9 years old; Tareq, 7 years old and Siba, one year old. Hasan is a National Palestinian Authority employee from Rafah city in Gaza Strip. Hasan took out a loan from FATEN in order to replace an old home appliance and replace the sofas he has in the house with better ones.

Hasan appears in the picture here in FATEN's office.

loans.use: To purchase a new home appliance

loans.name: Lilit

texts.en: Lilit M. is a doctor. In addition to traditional medicine, Lilit helps her clients to rejuvenate and regain their energy and health through physical therapy facilities, such as a small swimming pool, sauna, massage and exercise machines. This combination of treatments gives Lilit’s patients a good opportunity for a balanced lifestyle. Currently there is a need for an additional exercise machine.  Lilit has applied for this loan to pay for the new machine.

loans.use: To purchase an exercise machine

loans.name: Kings Of Kings Group -Lugazi

texts.en:
33-year-old Haurat K. belongs to the Kings of Kings Group-Lugazi.  Twenty years ago, she began her small cinema business in Buziika-Lugazi, which provides about 90,000 shillings a week in earnings.  Haurat credits her husband for providing the inspiration to start this business.  Prior to that, she was operating a retail shop. 

Haurat also has a side business selling fast food, which she says brings her extra profit. Haurat is happily married with 4 children.  Her plans for the future include constructing a house for the family.  She has placed a deposit on a plot of land, and she plans to use this loan to pay the remaining balance to purchase the land.

loans.use: To pay the balance for a plot of land

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Jacinta Nicolasa

texts.es:
Jacinta Nicolasa C. A.  tiene 34 años de edad, Vive en Unión Libre, vive con el compañero y con el hijo,  vive en el Cantón de Ventanas  Provincia los Ríos. Tiene 1 hijo.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. SAN JACINTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto campo alegre, por la parroquia guare perteneciente al cantón baba, esta ventanilla se dedica labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz.  Esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Jacinta Nicolasa se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Compra sus productos en el Comercial Cepeda y Comercial Chicaisa y vende los  productos en el Comercial López.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para el cultivo de maíz y arroz. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar un terreno.

Le gusta practicar el deporte.
texts.en:
Jacinta Nicolasa C. A.  is 34 years old.  She lives in a common-law marriage with her partner and son.  They live in Ventanas Canton, Los Ríos Province.

She is a member of San Jacinto Communal Bank, which is located in the Campo Alegre precinct near Quare parish which belongs to Baba Canton.  The members of this communal bank are farmers growing short-season crops like corn and rice.  This work takes a great deal of time.

Jacinta Nicolasa grows corn and rice.  She buys products in the Cepeda and Chicaisa markets and sells her products in López market.

She is asking for the loan to buy farm supplies and fertilizers for growing corn and rice.  The loan will help her to meet her needs.  She faces challenges like pests, crop diseases, and changes in the weather.  Her dream is to buy a field.

Jacinta likes to play sports.

loans.use: Farm supplies and fertilizer

loans.name: Mohamad

texts.ar:
محمد في عمر 43 سنة متزوج وله ولد يحب عائلته يعمل في مجال النقل العام له في العمل حوالي 11 سنة يريد ان 
يساعد عائلته على زيادة مدخولها وتحسين وضعها له تاريخ جيد مع المجموعة يلقى محمد دعم كامل من محيطه له زبائن كثر هم من عائلته وجيرانه يريد من خلال طلب قرض له من المجموعة الى تحسين وضع سيارته وتصليح المحرك حتى يستطيع ان يزيد من ساعات عمله
وتوسيع المناطق التي يعمل بها يحب ان يتطور وان يحسن وضعه المادي والاجتماعي
texts.en: Mohamad, 43, is married with a son. Mohamad loves his family. He has been working in public transport for 11 years. He wishes to increase his income to improve his family's living conditions. He has a good credit history with Al Majmoua. Mohamad has many clients from his family and neighbourhood. He wants to get a loan from Al Majmoua to improve his cab’s performance and fix its engine so that he can work more hours and in more neighbourhoods.  Mohamad wishes to develop his business and improve his financial and social conditions.

loans.use: To fix his car's engine and improve its performance

loans.name: Wilmer Hernan

texts.es:
Wilmer Hernan R. T. tiene 18 años de edad, Es casado, vive con la esposa  y con el hijo  en  el  Cantón de Ventanas  Provincia los Ríos. Tiene 1  hijo. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. SAN JACINTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto campo alegre, por la parroquia guare perteneciente al cantón baba, esta ventanilla se dedica labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz.  Esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Wilmer Hernan se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Compra sus productos en el Comercial Cepeda y Comercial Chicaisa y vende los  productos en el Comercial López.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para el cultivo de maíz y arroz. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar un terreno y un carro.

Le gusta practicar el deporte.
texts.en:
Wilmer Hernan R. T. is 18 years old.  He is married and lives with his wife and child in Ventanas canton, in Los Ríos province.

The members of the SAN JACINTO community bank are located in Campo Alegre precinct, in Guare parish, in Baba canton.  The members of this community bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice.  They have been in this business for many years.

Wilmer Hernan is a farmer who grows corn and rice.  He buys his products in the Cepeda and Chicaisa shopping areas and sells his products in López shopping area.  He is requesting this loan to buy farming supplies and fertilizers for his corn and rice crops.

The support of this loan will help Wilmer Hernan to financially cover his needs.  He faces challenges such as insect infestations, plant diseases and changes in the weather.  His dream is to buy a plot of land and a car.  He likes to take part in sports.

loans.use: To buy farming supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Tahreer

texts.en:
Tahreer is a young woman from Rafah city in Gaza Strip. She is engaged and preparing for her wedding in a few months. Tahreer's fiance is a Palestinian National Authority employee. Tahreer took out a loan from FATEN in order to help her fiance prepare for the wedding. She will use the $700 loan to purchase bedroom furniture.

Tahreer's father appears in the picture here as she is a religious woman.

loans.use: To purchase bedroom furniture

loans.name: Jenny Elizabeth

texts.es:
Jenny, tiene 36 años de edad, reside en San Miguel, departamento de San Miguel, vive con su hermana y su hijo Jonathan, posee casa propia, se dedica a la venta de artículos de primera necesidad, este negocio lo ha ubicado en la cochera de su casa desde hace 5 años donde ofrece artículos y productos de primera necesidad en cada hogar como bebidas, boquitas y granos básicos (arroz, café, frijoles) entre otros que le soliciten los clientes.
Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para comprar bebidas refrescantes, con esta ayuda tendrá una compra oportuna ya que se acerca la navidad y las bebidas refrescantes no pueden faltar en cada hogar que celebra la noche buena.
Su objetivo es mejorar la rentabilidad del negocio y por mismo aumentar sus ganancias para el hogar.
texts.en:
Jenny is 36 years old.  She lives in San Miguel, in San Miguel department, with her sister and her son Jonathan.  She has her own home and her business is selling convenience store items.  She has had her business for 5 years and it is located in her garage.  She offers her customers household essentials such as drinks, snacks, basic grains (rice, coffee, beans), as well as other products that her customers request.

Jenny is currently requesting a loan to buy soft drinks.  This will be a timely purchase for her since Christmas is approaching and soft drinks are always present in every household which is celebrating Christmas Eve.  Her goal is to improve her business' profitability and thereby increase her household income.

loans.use: To buy soft drinks

loans.name: Elie

texts.ar:
ايلي متزوج وله ارعة اولاد عمره 52سنة يعمل في بيع المواد الزراعية له في عمله 15 سنة يحب عمله ويطوره دائما
ايلي يحب عائلته كثيرا ويسعى الى تأمين مستقبل جيد لأولادهوتعليمهم بشكل جيد يعمل بكد ونشاط وله محبين كثر من محيطه
مقصود في عمله له تاريخ جيد كثيرا في المجموعة يريد من خلال طلب قرض له من المجموعة شراء بذور وحبوب جديدة لتوسيع
العمل يعاني ايلي من نقص في المادة لتطوير عمله وهذا ما يسعى جاهدا الى تحسينه
texts.en: Elie, 52, is married with 4 children. He has been working in selling agriculturA. products for 15 years. Elie likes his business and works on developing it. Elie loves his family very much and seeks to secure his children a safe future and to provide them with a good education. Ellie works hard and vigorously. He is loved in the neighborhood and is known for his good reputation among his clients. He has a very good credit history with A. Majmoua. He wants to get a new loan to buy seeds and grain to expand his business.  Elie lacks the necessary capitA. for developing his business, which he relentlessly works on improving.

loans.use: Purchase of seeds and grain

loans.name: Marta Lidia

texts.es:
Marta, tiene 33 años de edad, vende pupusas, panes y refrescos y vive con sus dos hijos de 18 y 14 años de edad, es madre soltera, su negocio lo inicio por la necesidad de ver por sus hijos las necesidades que tuviesen para poder solventarlas, lo atiende de 3:00pm a 7:00pm, hasta el momento este ha sido su fuente de ingreso.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de Maíz, chicharrón, condimentos, estos productos son los necesarios para la preparación de las pupusas y que desea tener a disponibilidad para hacer sus ventas.
Su propósito es contar con materia prima para seguir en el negocio, además de contar con ingresos para ayudar a sus hijos, su sueño es que estos puedan graduarse de bachiller y tener la oportunidad de seguir la universidad.
texts.en:
Marta is 33 years old and lives with her two children aged 18 and 14.  She is a single mother.  Marta sells pupusas, bread and soft drinks.  She started her business out of necessity.  She saw the needs that her children had and she had to cover them.

Marta works from 3.00pm to 7.00pm and this work is her source of income.  She is requesting a loan to buy corn, fried pork rinds and condiments.  These are the products she needs to make her pupusas and which she would like to have available so that she can make her sales.  Her goal is to have the supplies she needs to continue in her business as well as income with which she can provide for her children.  Her dream is for her children to successfully complete high school and have the opportunity of continuing on to university.

loans.use: To buy corn, fried pork rinds and condiments

loans.name: Luis Walter

texts.es:
Luis Walter B. M. tiene 37 años, Es casado vive con  la esposa y con los hijos en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 3 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. JERUSALEN, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto el Caimito, perteneciente a la parroquia puerto pechiche Cantón Pueblo Viejo, esta Ventanilla se dedica labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, fréjol gandul , esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Luis Walter se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz y fréjol gandul. Compra sus productos en el Comercial García y Comercial López y vende los  productos en el Comercial Vaca.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para el cultivo de maíz y arroz y fréjol gandul. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar un terreno.

Le gusta el deporte.
texts.en:
Luis Walter B. M. is 37 years old.  He is married and lives with his wife and children in Ventanas canton, in Los Ríos province.  He has 3 children.

The members of the JERUSALEN community bank are located in Caimito precinct, in Puerto Pechiche parish, in Pueblo Viejo canton.  The members of this community bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn, rice and pigeon peas.  They have been in this line of work for many years.

Luis Walter is a farmer who grows corn, rice and pigeon peas.  He buys his products in the García and López shopping areas and sells his products in the Vaca shopping area.  He is requesting this loan to buy farming supplies and fertilizers for his corn, rice and pigeon pea crops.

The support of this loan will help him to financially cover his needs.  He faces challenges such as insect infestations, plant diseases and changes in the weather.  His dream is to buy a plot of land. 

Luis Walter likes taking part in sports.

loans.use: To buy farming supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: David Enrique

texts.es: El señor David Enrique León V. tiene 48 años y vive con su esposa y tres hijos en Barranquilla. Se dedica a vender en un puesto estacionario del centro de Barranquilla ropa y calzado usados. Está vinculado a este oficio desde los 16 años cuando ayudaba a sus padres en la misma actividad. Al fallecer su padre, él se convirtió en la mano derecha de su madre y al morir ésta, quedó al frente del negocio. El señor David les compra la mercancía a varios proveedores que se dedican a cambiar en algunos barrios de Barranquilla ropa y calzado usado por utensilios de cocina como ollas, sartenes, calderos y vasos. Sus principales clientes son personas de escasos recursos de la ciudad y campesinos de zonas rurales. El siempre tiene el cuidado de comprar ropa que esté en buen estado, sin rotos, remiendos o manchas. Algunas veces le toca lavar y planchar las prendas para mejorar su apariencia. En su local tiene también un pequeño taller de zapatería en el cual repara el calzado que compra y lo deja como nuevo. Alrededor de su negocio hay otras personas que se dedican a lo mismo, pero cada uno tiene sus proveedores y su clientela habitual. Este es el tercer préstamo que el señor David tramita en la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo y planea invertirlo en comprar más ropa y calzado usado. El promedio de ventas diarias es de $ 100.000 y su margen de utilidad es del 35%. La temporada decembrina es la mejor del año y necesita aumentar su capital de trabajo. La esposa del microempresario también produce diariamente algunos almuerzos que vende a comerciantes del sector. La mayor satisfacción del señor David es haber podido criar sin penurias a sus tres hijos y lograr que el próximo año su hija menor se gradúe de enfermera superior. El dice con mucho humor que,  vendiendo ropa  y calzado usado,  es que su familia puede comprar ropa y calzado nuevo.
texts.en: Mr David Enrique León V. is 48 and lives with his wife and three children in Barranquilla. He sells used clothing and shoes in a stall in the center of Barranquilla. He has been doing this work for 16 years. He started off helping his parents with this work. When his father passed away, he became his mother's main source of support. When she passed away, he became the owner of the business. David purchases merchandise from various providers in Barranquilla neighbourhoods who trade used clothing and shoes for cooking utensils such as pots, pans, bowls and glasses. His main customers are people with few resources from the city and peasants from rural areas. He always takes care to buy clothing that is in good condition, without tears, patches or stains. Sometimes he washes and irons them so that they are like new. Around his business there are other people who do the same work, but each one has their own providers and customer base. This is David's third loan with the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo and he plans to invest it in purchasing more used clothing and shoes. His daily sales average $100,000 and his margin of utility is 35%. The December season is the best of the year and he needs to increase his working capital. His wife also daily produces various lunches that she sells to merchants in the sector. David's greatest satisfaction is having been able to raise his three children without hardship, and having achieved the fact that next year his youngest daughter will graduate from nursing school. He says, with a great sense of humour, that selling used clothing and shoes allows his family to buy new clothes and shoes.

loans.use: to purchase more used clothing and shoes

loans.name: Joseph Omondi

texts.en:
Joseph J. is 37 years old and married to Eunice Achieng Ogada who is 32 years old, and a housewife.  They are blessed with three children  between 11 and 6 years old. Joseph runs a shop in the Kopere trading centre in Kapsabet town.  He has been in this business for six years and his monthly income from the business is Ksh. 7,000.  

Joseph is seeking a loan of Ksh. 35,000 from KADET LTD to purchase cooking oil, sugar, tea leaves and washing detergent to add to his store's stock.  The profits from his business will be used to expand the shop and stock more goods.  This is his second loan from KADET LTD, after successfully repaying his first loan.  Joseph hopes to open up a wholesale business and also to support his children in attaining higher levels of education.

loans.use: To purchase cooking oil, sugar, detergent and other stock for the store

loans.name: Clara Jaqueline

texts.es:
Clara Jaqueline P. A. tiene 35 años, Es casada vive con  el esposo y con los hijos en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 4 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. JERUSALEN, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto el Caimito, perteneciente a la parroquia puerto pechiche Cantón Pueblo Viejo, esta Ventanilla se dedica labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, fréjol gandul , esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Clara Jaqueline se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz y fréjol gandul. Compra sus productos en el Comercial García y Comercial López y vende los  productos en el Comercial Vaca.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para el cultivo de maíz y arroz y fréjol gandul. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar un terreno.

Le gusta realizar quehaceres domésticos.
texts.en:
Clara Jaqueline P. A. is 35 years old.  She is married and lives with her husband and children in Ventanas canton, in Los Ríos province.  She has 4 children.

The members of the JERUSALEN community bank are located in Caimito precinct, in Puerto Pechiche parish, in Pueblo Viejo canton.  The members of this community bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn, rice and pigeon peas.  They have been in this line of work for many years.

Clara Jaqueline is a farmer who grows corn, rice and pigeon peas.  She buys her products in the García and López shopping areas and sells her products in the Vaca shopping area.  She is requesting this loan to buy farming supplies and fertilizers for her corn, rice and pigeon pea crops.

The support of this loan will help her to financially cover her needs.  She faces challenges such as insect infestations, plant diseases and changes in the weather.  Her dream is to buy a plot of land.

Clara Jaqueline enjoys doing her household chores.

loans.use: To buy farming supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan Carlos de 32 años de edad, reside en San Miguel departamento de San Miguel, se dedica a la venta de ropa, vive con su esposa, aun no tienen hijos, el negocio surgió por iniciativa propia, venden todos los días de la semana, de 6:00am a 5:00pm, de forma ambulante, tiene 4 años de dedicarse a este tipo de comercio.
Por el momento quiere compra más ropa para ofrecer a los clientes, por lo que solicita un préstamo para llevar a cabo la inversión, este préstamo ayudara a incrementar el inventario, a desarrollarse como comerciante, atender mejor a los clientes ofreciendo variedad de prendas de vestir.
Su sueño es mantener vivo el negocio a largo plazo, obtener un puesto estable donde ofrecer su mercadería, atraer a clientes para que sus prendas puedan ser vendidas y generar ganancias para su familia.
texts.en:
Juan Carlos is 32 years old and lives in San Miguel, in San Miguel department.  His business is selling clothes.  He lives with his wife but doesn't yet have any children.

Juan Carlos' business came about through his own initiative.  He makes his sales every day of the week, from 6.00am to 5.00pm.  He makes his sales as an itinerant street vendor and has been in this line of business for 4 years.  Right now, he would like to buy more clothes to offer to his customers.  He is requesting a loan so that he can make this investment.  The loan will help him to increase his inventory, develop as a salesman and better serve his customers, offering them a wider range of clothes.

Juan Carlos' dream is to keep his business going in the long term, to obtain a stable sales location where he can sell his merchandise and to attract customers so that he can sell more of his clothes and make more income for his family.

loans.use: To buy clothes

loans.name: Sandro Francisco

texts.es:
Sandro Francisco B. M. tiene 41 años, Es casado vive con  la esposa y con los hijos en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 4 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. JERUSALEN, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto el Caimito, perteneciente a la parroquia puerto pechiche Cantón Pueblo Viejo, esta Ventanilla se dedica labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, fréjol gandul , esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Sandro Francisco se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz y fréjol gandul. Compra sus productos en el Comercial García y Comercial López y vende los  productos en el Comercial Vaca.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para el cultivo de maíz y arroz y fréjol gandul. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar un terreno y contar con el bienestar de la familia.

Le gusta realizar deporte.
texts.en: Sandro Francisco B. M. is 41. He is married and lives with his wife and children in the Ventanas Canton, Los Rios Province. He has 4 children. The V.R.C. Jerusalen is located in the Caimito region, belonging to the Puerto Pechiche Parish, in the Pueblo Viejo Canton. This area is dedicated to short-cycle agricultural labour; the sowing of corn, rice and gandul beans. They spend much time doing this work. Sandro Francisco works in agriculture, sowing corn, rice and gandul beans. He purchases his products in the Garcia and Lopez Markets and sells them in the Vaca Market. He is requesting this loan to purchase agricultural inputs and fertilizers for the cultivation of corn, rice and gandul beans. The support of this loan will help him economically to supply his needs. He confronts challenges such as plagues, diseases and the varied climate. His dream is to purchase a plot of land and know that his family is doing well. He enjoys playing sports.

loans.use: agricultural inputs and fertilizers

loans.name: Merys María

texts.es: La señora Merys María M. Velásquez tiene 50 años y vive con su marido en el barrio El Prado del municipio de Soledad, al norte de Colombia. Tiene tres hijos de 30. 25 y  23 años de su primer matrimonio, pero  viven aparte. Ella posee una panadería en la que produce pan, galletas y pudines; además vende cervezas, gaseosas y jugos. El negocio está ubicado en una esquina cerca a la terminal de transporte interdepartamental de Barranquilla y en ese sector trafican muchas personas, sin embargo, la mayor parte de las ventas las realiza en varias tiendas de barrios cercanos. La microempresaria contrató los servicios de un joven que le ayuda a atender el negocio y hacer los repartos. Ella es quien elabora los panes y demás productos. Este oficio lo aprendió en el año 2003, en Barranquilla, después de llegar desplazada por la violencia de grupos armados ilegales de extrema derecha en el municipio de San Pablo, al sur del departamento de Bolívar. La casa en la que vive la señora Merys es propia, ella recibió un subsidio de vivienda del gobierno nacional.  Este es el crédito número 16 que tramita en la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo y planea invertirlo en la compra de harina, levadura, queso, huevos, azúcar, grasas y esencias. El promedio de ventas diarias es de $ 100.000, el margen de utilidad es del 40%. En un futuro cercano, la microempresaria planea comprar un enfriador más grande, remodelar su vivienda para acondicionar mejor el local del negocio y abrir un nuevo punto de venta en el centro de Barranquilla. Ella dice que todo lo que se ha propuesto en la vida lo ha logrado, porque en su opinión, a las personas no les faltan fuerzas sino voluntad.
texts.en:
Merys María M. Velásquez is 50 years old and lives with her husband in El Prado neighborhood, in the town of Soledad, in the north of Colombia.  She has three children aged 30, 25 and 23 from her first marriage but they no longer live with her.

Merys has a bakery in which she makes bread, cookies and pies.  She also sells beer, soda and juice.  Her business is located on a corner near the inter-departmental transport terminal in Barranquilla and there are a lot of people in this area.  However, most of her sales are made to stores in nearby neighborhoods.

This small businesswoman has hired a young man who helps her in her business and takes care of her deliveries.  Merys makes the bread and other products herself.  She learned this trade in 2003, in Barranquilla.  She arrived there after having been displaced by the violence of illegal, armed, far-right groups in the town of San Pablo, in the south of Bolívar department.

Merys lives in her own home.  She received a housing subsidy from the national government.

This is Merys' 16th loan from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo and she plans to invest it in buying flour, yeast, cheese, eggs, sugar, fats and spices.  Her average daily sales are 100,000 pesos and her profit margin is 40%.  In the near future, she plans to buy a larger chiller cabinet and remodel her home so that she has a better set up for her business premises.  She also plans to open a new sales location in the center of Barranquilla.  She says that so far she has managed to achieve everything that she has set out to achieve in life because, in her opinion, people don't lack strength, just willpower.

loans.use: To buy flour, yeast, cheese, eggs, sugar, fats and spices

loans.name: Mortila

texts.es:
Doña Mortila, tiene 61 años D. edad, resiD. en San Miguel, departamento D. San Miguel, donD. vive con su esposo y una nieta D. 14 años D. edad, posee una tienda donD. ofrece artículos del consumo para el hogar, fue fundado por iniciativa propia desD. hace 10 años, junto a su esposo lo atienden D. 5:00am a 7:00pm, este negocio es la fuente D. ingreso con la que cuenta doña Mortila y su familia.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra D. pollo, aceite, arroz, frijol, gaseosa, que son productos muy demandados por los clientes, es préstamo le ayudara a diversificar los productos y tener oportunidades D. aumentar sus ventas.
Su objetivo es aportar al negocio el capital necesario para fortalecerlo y contar con él por un largo tiempo, proveer D. él lo necesario para cubrir sus necesidades.
texts.en: Mrs Mortila, age 61, lives in San Miguel, in the San Miguel department, with her husband and 14-year-old granddaughter. She has a store where she offers items for the home. She opened the store on her own 10 years ago. She and her husband attend to it from 5 am to 7 pm. This business is her family's source of income. She is requesting a loan for the purchase of chicken, oil, rice, beans, and pop, which are products in high demand. This loan will help her to diversify her products and have the opportunity to increase her sales. Her goal is to bring her business the necessary capital to strengthen it and survive for a long time, getting from it the necessary income to cover her needs.

loans.use: the purchase of chicken, oil, rice, beans and pop

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.ar:
احمد متزوج وله 5 اولاد يعمل في الزراعة له اكثر من 10 سنوات يحب عمله ويريد ان يزيد من مدخوله يحب عائلته
ويسعى دائما الى تطوير عمله كمزارع له تاريخ جيد مع المجموعة تلقى دعم كامل من عائلته احمد منظم ومتطور يحب ان يتقن 
عمله لكن ما ينقصه هو المادة فقد لزيادة مدخول الارض عنده يريد من خلال طلب قرض له من المجموعة الى شراء شتل وحبوب للزرع
زبائنه هم من جيرانه واصدقائه
texts.en: Ahmad, married, is a father of five children. He has been working as a farmer for 10 years. Ahmad likes his work and wants to increase his income. He works hard to improve himself as a farmer. He loves his family and enjoys its full support. Ahmad is systematic, proficient and likes to be up to date. He wants to get a loan from A. Majmoua to buy seedlings and seeds. His clients are from his neighborhood and his circle of friends.

loans.use: To purchase seeds and seedlings

loans.name: Eudiviges  Margarita

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” LOS HERALDOS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia D. Cusco y departamento D. Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Eudiviges; ella tiene 73 años D. edad, casada y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio D. costureria  y tejidos ella elabora sus tejidos D. su casa y con la ayuda D. sus hijos, a la vez la socia es jubilada D. una empresa privada en el área D. auxiliar en contabilidad, dé esta forma la socia hace lo que le gusta y se entretiene.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra D. materiales para su negocio.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos D. su cuota
texts.en: The member belongs to the Los Heraldos community bank. The bank is located in the Cusco district, belonging to the province and department of Cusco. The member is Mrs Eudiviges. She is 73, married and has 4 children. She alternates her daily activities with her seamstress and weaving business. She makes her weavings in her house with the help of her children. She is retired from a private company where she was an accounting assistant. She now does what she likes to do. She is requesting this loan for the purchase of materials for her business. She is happy to have this loan and promises to honour the payments of the quotas.

loans.use: for the purchase of materials for her business.

loans.name: Miguel Ernesto

texts.es:
Miguel, reside en San Miguel, departamento de San Miguel, se dedica a la agricultura, vive actualmente con su esposa y aun no tienen hijos, Miguel tiene 22 años de edad, él siembra frijol, además trabaja en una hacienda como mozo, estos son sus dos fuentes de ingresos para mantener a su esposa y velar por su bienestar.
El está solicitando un préstamo para el pago de alquiler de terreno donde piensa realizar la siembra de frijol, con este préstamo podrá conseguir el terreno y comenzar a prepararlo para el momento de iniciar con la siembra.
Su objetivo es desarrollar su familia, continuar trabajando para ahorrar y estar al pendiente las necesidades de su hogar.
texts.en: Miguel, who lives in San Miguel, in the San Miguel department, works in agriculture. He currently lives with his wife and they do not have any children. Miguel is 22 and sows beans. He also works in a farm as a farmhand. These are his two sources of income to maintain his wife and their well-being. He is requesting a loan to pay the rent for a plot of land where he will sow beans. With this loan he will be able to get the plot of land and start preparing it for sowing. His goal is to develop his family, continue working to save money, and provide his household with all its necessities.

loans.use: to rent land to sow

The members of the JERUSALEN community bank are located in Caimito district, in Puerto Pechiche parish, in Pueblo Viejo canton.  The members of this community bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn, rice and pigeon peas.  They have been in this line of work for many years.

Elba De Jesus is a farmer who grows corn, rice and pigeon peas.  She buys her products in the García and López shopping areas and sells her products in the Vaca shopping area. She faces challenges such as insect infestations, plant diseases and changes in the weather.  Her dream is to improve her home and to continue working.

Elba De Jesus likes sewing.

loans.name: Emilia

texts.es:
Doña Emilia, se dedica a la venta D. antojitos y verduras, tiene 54 años D. edad, vive con sus hijos y su esposo, sus hijos son Marjori D. 20 años y Henry D. 24 años, ellos residen en Guatajiagua, departamento D. Morazán.
La señora Emilia tiene 15 años D. experiencia en el negocio, trabaja en un horario D. 5:00am a 6:00pm, ella aprendió a cocinas porque asistió a clases en un curso impartido en Guatajiagua, ella necesita D. un préstamo para la compra D. materiales para preparar la venta, elementos como verduras para el negocio D. verduras y otras para preparar los platillos, así como condimentos y carnes, este préstamo le ayudara a incrementar el negocio y a ir creciendo poco a poco en el comercio.
Ella sueña con instalar algún día una panadería D. pan dulce y simple, ya que en las clases que recibió aprendió a hacer pan, también desea actualmente proveer D. su negocio los ingresos necesarios para solventar las necesidades del hogar y pagar oportunamente este préstamo.
texts.en:
Emilia has a business selling snacks and vegetables.  She is 54 years old and lives with her children and husband.  Her children are 20 year-old Marjori and 24 year-old Henry.  They live in Guatajiagua, in Morazán department.

Emilia has 15 years of experience in her business.  She works from 5.00am to 6.00pm.  She learned to cook by attending classes in Guatajiagua.  She needs this loan to buy supplies for preparing her sales.  She will buy some vegetables for her vegetable business and some for making her meals.  She will also buy condiments and meat.  This loan will help her to increase her business and grow little by little as a saleswoman.

Emilia dreams of some day setting up a bakery where she will make sweet bread and ordinary bread, since the classes she attended taught her how to bake bread.  Her current wish is, through her business, to make the money she needs to cover her household needs and to repay this loan on time.

loans.use: To buy ingredients for making food

texts.en:
Michael Mariano V. B. is 31 years old.  He lives with his common-law wife and children in Ventanas canton, in Los Ríos province.  He has 2 children.

The members of the JERUSALEN community bank are located in Caimito district, in Puerto Pechiche parish, in Pueblo Viejo canton.  The members of this community bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn, rice and pigeon peas.  They have been in this line of work for many years.

Michael Mariano is a farmer who grows corn, rice and pigeon peas.  He buys his products in the García and López shopping areas and sells his products in the Vaca shopping area.  He is requesting this loan to buy farming supplies and fertilizers for his corn, rice and pigeon pea crops.  The support of this loan will help him to financially cover his needs.  He faces challenges such as insect infestations, plant diseases and changes in the weather.  His dream is to own his own plot of land.

Michael Mariano likes taking part in sports.

loans.use: To buy farming supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
Ana Maria M. B.  tiene 24 años de edad, Es casada vive con  el esposo y con la hija en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 1 hija.
.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. JERUSALEN, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto el Caimito, perteneciente a la parroquia puerto pechiche Cantón Pueblo Viejo, esta Ventanilla se dedica labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, fréjol gandul , esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Ana Maria se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz y fréjol gandul. Compra sus productos en el Comercial García y Comercial López y vende los  productos en el Comercial Vaca.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para el cultivo de maíz y arroz y fréjol gandul. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar un terreno y bienes.

Le gusta asistir a una iglesia evangélica.
texts.en:

The members of the JERUSALEN community bank are located in Caimito district, in Puerto Pechiche parish, in Pueblo Viejo canton.  The members of this community bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn, rice and pigeon peas.  They have been in this line of work for many years.

She faces challenges such as insect infestations, plant diseases and changes in the weather.  Her dream is to buy a plot of land and some assets.

Ana Maria likes attending her evangelical church.

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” LOS HERALDOS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Rosa María; ella tiene 45 años de edad, casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de compra y venta de madera al por mayor y menor a la vez la socia vende fruta y lo distribuye  a sus clientes que le solicitan, de esta manera la socia saca a su familia adelante.   

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de materiales como madera y frutas para sus negocios.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
Rosa María is a member of the 'LOS HERALDOS' community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Rosa María is 45 years old, married and has two children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business buying wood wholesale and selling it retail.  She also sells fruit which she delivers to her customers who request it.  In this way, she gets her family ahead in life.

Rosa María is requesting this loan to buy materials, such as wood and fruit, for her businesses.  She is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: To buy materials, such as wood and fruit, for her businesses

loans.name: Zacarias

texts.es: El señor Zacarías, es agricultor,  casado con la Sra. Valeriana con 5 hijos algunos ya independientes y otros todavía en edad escolar, es Sr. Zacarías y su esposa  nacidos en Cochabamba,  hace 18 años por motivos de trabajo se vinieron a la ciudad de Santa Cruz buscando mejores días para toda su familia, obtuvieron una parcela en Pampa el Cosal en la cual trabaja agricultura siembra maíz, maní, sandia, pero también se dedica a la ganadería por que es una zona húmeda, tiene bastante agua y todo lo que el siembra lo comercializa con la ayuda de su esposa en el mercado de el Torno, es un persona muy trabajadora, el dinero del crédito es para la compra de semillas para la siembra de maíz y también para lo que implica el preparado de la tierra, esta muy agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Zacarías is a farmer.  He is married to Valeriana and has 5 children.  Some of his children already live independently and others are still at school.  

Zacarías and his wife were both born in Cochabamba.  18 years ago, for work reasons, they came to the city of Santa Cruz seeking better lives for their whole family.  They obtained a plot of land in Pampa el Cosal where they grow crops.  They grow corn, peanuts and watermelon.  Zacarías is also a livestock farmer because this is a humid area.  There is quite a lot of water and everything he grows he sells, with his wife's help, in El Torno market.

Zacarías is a very hard-working person.  He will use his loan money to buy seeds for growing corn and also to meet the expenses of preparing his land for sowing.  Zacarías is very grateful to the institution for the support he has received.

loans.use: To buy seeds for growing corn

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan, tiene 23 años de edad, reside en Chilanga departamento de Morazán, donde vive con su esposa y dos hijos, Carlos de 4 años y Aurora de 1 año de edad, se dedica al cultivo de hortalizas Juan alcanzo a estudiar la primaria, pero por la pobreza de su familia su padre se dedicaba al cultivo de hortalizas, por lo que él decidió ayudarle a sembrar y aprendió el oficio perfectamente.
Él inicio el su propio negocio ayudado por su padre, desde hace cinco años está trabajando para su propia familia, su ventaja es que el terreno donde cultiva es bueno, tiene tierra fértil por lo que su cultivo normalmente le da buenos frutos, Juan por el momento está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de insumos agrícolas, como abono, controladores de plagas y poliducto para regar; sus planes son sembrar mil plantas de chile, mil de tomate, este préstamo le ayudara a darle un buen cuido a esta siembra que es bastante y sería lamentable que se perdiera.
Juan es un joven visionario, emprendedor y ha sabido salir a adelante por sus propios medios, sus sueños es seguir produciendo la tierra, ayudar a su familia especialmente que sus hijos estudien y tengan oportunidades de crecimiento profesional, además de ser buen ejemplo.
texts.en:
Juan is 23 years old.  He lives in Chilanga, in Morazán department with his wife and two children: 4 year-old Carlos and 1 year-old Aurora.  Juan grows vegetables.  He studied at elementary school but his family was poor.  His father grew vegetables and so he decided to help him grow his crops and learned the trade perfectly.

Juan started his own business with his father's help.  He has been working for five years for his own family.  His advantage is that the land where he grows his crop is good land.  It is fertile which means that his crops normally grow well.

Right now Juan is requesting this loan so that he can buy farming supplies such as manure, products for controlling insect infestations and pipes for his irrigation.  Juan's plans are to sow 1000 chili plants and 1000 tomato plants.  This loan will help him to care for his crops.  He has a lot of crops and it would be terrible if they were to be lost.

Juan is a visionary and enterprising young man who has known how to get ahead on his own.  His dreams are to continue farming his land and to help his family.  He would particularly like to help his children to study and have opportunities for professional growth.  He would like to be a good example to his children.

loans.use: To buy farming supplies such as manure, products for controlling insect infestations and pipes

loans.name: Eva

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” LOS HERALDOS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Eva; ella tiene 52 años de edad, viuda y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de elaboración de tortas para todo tipo de compromisos como matrimonios, 15 años, bodas de plata, cumpleaños entre otros. La socia es una persona muy alegre y de esta forma saca a su familia adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de insumos para su negocio de venta de tortas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
Eva is a member of the ”LOS HERALDOS” community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Eva is 52 years old, widowed and has 3 children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business making cakes for all sorts of occasions such as weddings, 15th birthday celebrations, silver wedding anniversaries, birthdays, etc.  She is a very happy person and, through her business, she gets her family ahead in life. 

Eva is requesting this loan to buy ingredients for her cake business.  She is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: To buy ingredients for her cake business

Los miembros de la V.R.C. JERUSALEN, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto el Caimito, perteneciente a la parroquia puerto pechiche Cantón Pueblo Viejo, esta Ventanilla se dedica labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, fréjol gandul , esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Washington Saturno se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz y fréjol gandul. Compra sus productos en el Comercial García y Comercial López y vende los  productos en el Comercial Vaca.

Le gusta practicar el indor.
texts.en: Washington Saturno R. R. is 37. He is married and lives with his wife and children in the Ventanas Canton, Los Rios Province. He has 4 children. The V.R.C. Jerusalen group is located in the Caimito area, belonging to the Puerto Pechiche Parish in the Pueblo Viejo Canton. This region is dedicated to short-cycle agricultural labour; the sowing of corn, rice and gandul beans. They spend much time doing this activity. He is requesting this loan to purchase agricultural inputs and fertilizers for the cultivation of corn, rice and gandul beans. The support of this loan will help him economically to supply his needs. He confronts challenges such as plagues, diseases and the varied climate. His dream is to buy lands. he enjoys playing indoor soccer.

loans.name: Manuel Donaldo

texts.es: El señor Manuel vive en la zona del Plan 3000 en el barrio Toro Toro, se dedica ya hace 10 años a la chapería de autos, actualmente tiene su propio taller que funciona a cuatro cuadras de su casa, por lo general realiza el chapeado completo de movilidades como ser autos y camionetas. Su esposa trabaja como recepcionista medio tiempo con lo que le ayuda con sus gastos familiares, mientras que a sus hijos los cuida su suegra.  A la semana realiza el chapeado de una a dos movilidades dependiendo del trabajo, por este motivo solicito el crédito para poder  arreglar con urgencia una de sus maquinas que se encuentra en mal estado y comprar los materiales necesarios para terminar el trabajo de dos movilidades que tiene en el taller. El señor Manuel desea ampliar su taller y poder contratar operarios para realizar un trabajo más rápido y además poder comprar su propia casa debido a que actualmente esta viviendo en la casa de su suegra.
texts.en:
Manuel lives in Toro Toro neighborhood, in Plan 3000 district.  He has been a panel beater for 10 years.  He currently has his own workshop four blocks from his home.  He does work on vehicles such as cars and trucks.  His wife works part time as a receptionist which helps him with their family's expenses.  His mother-in-law looks after his children while they are both at work.

During the week, Manuel works on one or two vehicles, depending on the job.  He is requesting a loan so that he can urgently fix one of his machines that is in bad condition.  He would also like to buy the materials he needs to finish work on two vehicles that he currently has in his workshop.

Manuel would like to expand his workshop and be able to hire workers so that he can do his work more quickly.  He would also like to be able to buy his own home because he currently lives in his mother-in-law's house.

loans.use: To buy putty and paint.  To fix his welding machine

loans.name: Tomasa Esperanza

texts.es:
Tomasa es una mujer emprendedora, mayor de edad, con una hermosa familia. 
Hoy en día labora como conserje, en donde su objetivo ha sido la construcción de su casa. Que ha venido mejorando a través de los financiamientos que la institución ha dado durante diez ciclos.

Hoy con este nuevo crédito, comprara laminas de zinc y cambiar las que están en mal estado.
Contenta porque cada día logra el objetivo de estar en mejores condiciones de vivienda.
texts.en: Tomasa is an enterprising woman, older, with a beautiful family. She currently works as a custodian. Her goal has been to build her home, and she has been improving it through the loans that the institution has given her through ten cycles. Now, with this new loan, she will purchase zinc laminates and change the parts that are in bad condition. She is happy because every day she is achieving the goal of being in better living conditions.

loans.use: she will purchase zinc and other materials to change the roof of her home

Ernestina; ella tiene 45 años de edad, viuda y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de manualidades como cojines, almohadas entre otros más, la socia trabaja de forma ambulatoria  a sus familiares, amistades y personas que le solicitan y de esta manera la socia saca a su familia adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de materiales para su negocio.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota

This borrower belongs to the "Los Heraldos" communal bank, which is located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.

This borrower is Ms. Ernestina.  She is 45 years old, widowed, and has three children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her handicrafts business.  She sells cushions, pillows, and other items in an ambulatory manner.  She sells to her relatives, friends, and people who request her goods.  In this manner, she helps her family to get ahead.

Ms. Ernestina is requesting this loan to buy materials for her business.

She is happy to receive this loan and promises to make her repayments according to the established schedule.

loans.use: to buy materials for her business

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es: Roberto, de 50 años, vive en su casa propia al lado de su esposa Gladys de 41 años y de sus 3 hijos jóvenes; juntos se esfuerzan por salir adelante. Desde hace 7 años, este emprendedor hombre se dedica al transporte de carga pesada en un camión, realiza este servicio para una empresa privada. Durante cinco días útiles a la semana recorre las principales ciudades  del país con la carga encomendada; y le gusta mucho su labor pues le entretiene y le permite conocer lugares turísticos del Perú. Trabaja 12 horas diarias y descansa los fines de semana, que aprovecha para pasarla  con su familia. Pero lo que no le agrada es dejar a su familia, sin embargo, gana muy bien por lo que les brinda una buena calidad de vida. Como es muy trabajador para el futuro tiene muchos planes como el de comprarse un auto nuevo y empezarlo a trabajar él mismo o brindarlo en alquiler; pero sabe que solo logrará sus objetivos con muchos esfuerzo y dedicación. Es el tercer crédito que tiene con MFP y promete pagar sus cuotas puntualmente, pues no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible este aporte que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso. Roberto tiene planeado invertir el crédito solicitado en el pago de la primera letra del auto que sacará en partes; y espera empezar a concretar sus planes.
texts.en: Roberto, age 50, lives in his own home with his wife Gladys, age 41, and their three young children. Together, they work hard to get ahead. For 7 years, this enterprising man has worked transporting heavy cargo in his truck for a private company. He works 5 days a week, going through the principal cities of the country with his cargo. He enjoys his work greatly as it entertains him and allows him to get to know the tourist areas of Peru. He works 12 hours a day and rests on the weekends, when he spends time with his family. He doesn't like leaving his family, but he makes a good income and is able to offer them a good quality of life. Since he is a very hard worker he has many plans for the future, such as buying himself a new vehicle and starting to work for himself, or renting it out. But he knows that he will only achieve his goals with a lot of hard work and dedication. This is his third loan with MFP and he promises to pay his quotas punctually, since he does not want to disappoint the people who will make this loan possible, as it will allow him to continue working in the search of progress. Roberto plans to invest this loan in the first payment of a car which he will pay in parts. He hopes to start to fulfill his plans.

loans.use: to pay part of the cost of a vehicle.

loans.name: Moises Tony

texts.es: El Sr. Moisés Vive en el municipio de la Guardia, es nacido en el departamento de Tarija, hace unos 20 años  que esta en la ciudad de Santa Cruz, de ocupación taxista, su esposa con la cual tiene tres hijos, se encuentra en el exterior por motivo de trabajo se fue a trabajar para asi poder ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar, hace un año que se dedica a esta actividad, es su primer financiamiento, se siente contento por el apoyo y facilidad que le da la institución, el destino del crédito es para comprar materiales de construcción para terminar su vivienda, es una persona joven y esta muy agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Mr Moisés lives in the La Guardia municipality. He was born in the Tarija department. He has lived in the city of Santa Cruz for 20 years. He is a taxi driver. He and his wife have three children. He is currently living away from home to work and help his wife with the household costs. He has worked as a taxi driver for a year. This is his first loan, and he is happy to have the support and ease of this loan. The loan will be used to purchase construction materials to complete his home. He is a young person and is very grateful to the institution for the support offered.

loans.use: the purchase of construction materials

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es:
Julio Cesar V. M.  tiene 23 años de edad, Vive en Unión Libre, vive con la esposa y la hija,  vive en el Cantón de Ventanas  Provincia los Ríos.  Tiene 1 hijo.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. JERUSALEN, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto el Caimito, perteneciente a la parroquia puerto pechiche Cantón Pueblo Viejo, esta Ventanilla se dedica labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, fréjol gandul , esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Julio Cesar se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz y fréjol gandul. Compra sus productos en el Comercial García y Comercial López y vende los  productos en el Comercial Vaca.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para el cultivo de maíz y arroz y fréjol gandul. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar una finca.

Le gusta practicar el deporte.
texts.en:
Julio Cesar V. M. is 23 years old.  He lives with his common-law wife and daughter in Ventanas canton, in Los Ríos province.

The members of the JERUSALEN community bank are located in Caimito district, in Puerto Pechiche parish, in Pueblo Viejo canton.  The members of this community bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn, rice and pigeon peas.  They have been in this line of work for many years.

Julio Cesar is a farmer who grows corn, rice and pigeon peas.  He buys his products in the García and López shopping areas and sells his products in the Vaca shopping area.  He is requesting this loan to buy farming supplies and fertilizers for his corn, rice and pigeon pea crops.  The support of this loan will help him to financially cover his needs.  He faces challenges such as insect infestations, plant diseases and changes in the weather.  His dream is to buy a farm.

Julio Cesar likes taking part in sports.

loans.use: To buy farming supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Renán

texts.es: El señor Renán nacido el 14 de septiembre en Santa Cruz casado con la Sra.  Mirtha con 2 hijos ellos viven en Guaracal a 10 km de Jorochito, tienen su parcela en la cual viven y trabajan en la misma, el siembra Tomate, Maíz, Yuca y también tiene una hectárea de cítrico como  naranja, mandarina, no tienen luz eléctrica pero tienen su panel solar que fueron adquirido con un préstamo anterior de Emprender, es un apersona muy trabajadora y con el dinero del crédito comprara semillas para la siembra de maíz y también para lo que implica el preparado de la tierra, esta muy agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado .
texts.en:
Mr. Renán was born on the 14th of September in Santa Cruz.  He is married to Ms. Mirtha and along with their two children, they live in Guaracal, 10 kilometers from Jorochito.  They own a parcel of land where they live and work.  Renán plants tomatoes, corn, and cassava.  He also has a hectare of citrus fruits like oranges and mandarins.  Their family does not have electric light but they have a solar panel that they acquired with a previous loan from Emprender.

Renán is a very hardworking person and he will use the money from this loan to buy seeds for planting corn and to prepare his land for planting.  He is very grateful for the support being offered to him through this loan.

loans.use: to plant corn and tomatoes

loans.name: Celia Benedicto

texts.es:
Celia Benedicto A. B. tiene 52 años de edad, Vive en Unión Libre, vive con el esposo y con los hijos,  vive en el Cantón de Ventanas  Provincia los Ríos.  Tiene 6 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. JERUSALEN, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto el Caimito, perteneciente a la parroquia puerto pechiche Cantón Pueblo Viejo, esta Ventanilla se dedica labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, fréjol gandul , esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Celia Benedicto se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz y fréjol gandul. Compra sus productos en el Comercial García y Comercial López y vende los  productos en el Comercial Vaca.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para el cultivo de maíz y arroz y fréjol gandul. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar terrenos.

Le gusta asistir a la iglesia universal.
texts.en:
Celia Benedicto A. B. is 52 years old.  She lives with her common-law husband and children in Ventanas canton, in Los Ríos province.  She has 6 children.

The members of the JERUSALEN community bank are located in Caimito district, in Puerto Pechiche parish, in Pueblo Viejo canton.  The members of this community bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn, rice and pigeon peas.  They have been in this line of work for many years.

Celia Benedicto is a farmer who grows corn, rice and pigeon peas.  She buys her products in the García and López shopping areas and sells her products in the Vaca shopping area.  She is requesting this loan to buy farming supplies and fertilizers for her corn, rice and pigeon pea crops.  The support of this loan will help her to financially cover her needs.  She faces challenges such as insect infestations, plant diseases and changes in the weather.  Her dream is to buy some land.

Celia Benedicto likes attending her universal church.

loans.use: To buy farming supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy merchandise for his business such as oil, beans, rice and dairy products

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” LOS HERALDOS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Margarita; ella tiene 43 años de edad, casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de venta de productos de belleza como cremas,shampus,colonias,pérfumes entre otros mas , a la vez la socia trabaja en el Ministerio de Salud como asistenta en enfermería ,la socia se dedica a estas dos actividades y de esta manera saca a su familia adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de mas productos para su negocio.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
Margarita is a member of the "LOS HERALDOS" community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Margarita is 43 years old, married and has 2 children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling beauty products such as creams, shampoo, cologne, perfumes, etc.  She also works for the Ministry of Health as a nursing assistant.  Through these two activities, she manages to get her family ahead in life.

Margarita is requesting this loan to buy more products for her business.  She is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: To buy more products for her business

loans.name: Tatiana Maybeth

texts.es:
Tatiana Maybeth E. G. tiene 19 años, Vive en Unión Libre, vive con el esposo y con la hija,  vive en el Cantón de Ventanas  Provincia los Ríos. Tiene 1 hijo.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. JERUSALEN, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto el Caimito, perteneciente a la parroquia puerto pechiche Cantón Pueblo Viejo, esta Ventanilla se dedica labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, fréjol gandul , esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Tatiana Maybeth se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz y fréjol gandul. Compra sus productos en el Comercial G. y Comercial López y vende los  productos en el Comercial Vaca.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para el cultivo de maíz y arroz y fréjol gandul. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar una casa.

Le gusta salir a pasear.
texts.en:
Tatiana Maybeth E. G. is 19 years old.  She lives with her common-law husband and daughter in Ventanas canton, in Los Ríos province.

The members of the JERUSALEN community bank are located in Caimito district, in Puerto Pechiche parish, in Pueblo Viejo canton.  The members of this community bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn, rice and pigeon peas.  They have been in this line of work for many years.

Tatiana Maybeth is a farmer who grows corn, rice and pigeon peas.  She buys her products in the G. and López shopping areas and sells her products in the Vaca shopping area.  She is requesting this loan to buy farming supplies and fertilizers for her corn, rice and pigeon pea crops.  The support of this loan will help her to financially cover her needs.  She faces challenges such as insect infestations, plant diseases and changes in the weather.  Her dream is to buy her own home.  She likes going out for walks.

loans.use: To buy farming supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Robert

texts.es: El Sr. Robert vive en el municipio de el torno, es de ocupación albañil, hace unos cuatro años que se dedica a esta actividad, su esposa con la cual tiene un hijo se dedica a labores del hogar, es nacido en el municipio localidad de espejos, el destino del crédito es para poner una oficina ya que haces unos meses que se graduó como constructor civil y necesita el dinero para la  compra de material de construcción ya el construirá su propia oficina en un joven muy responsable y trabajador, es su primer financiamiento por lo que se siente agradecido, por la confianza que se le a brindado
texts.en: Mr. Robert lives in the municipality of El Torno.  He is a mason and has been doing this work for about four years.  His wife, with whom he has one son, is a homemaker.  Robert was born in the municipality of Espejos.  He will use this loan to buy construction materials to build an office, as he graduated as a civil engineer a few months ago and plans to build his own office.  He is a very responsible and hardworking young man.  This is his first loan and he feels grateful for the confidence that is being shown in him.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to build himself an office

loans.name: Manuel Agustín

texts.es:
Manuel Agustín B. S. tiene 19 años de edad, Es soltero, vive con los padres en  el  Cantón de Ventanas  Provincia los Ríos. No tiene hijos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. JERUSALEN, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto el Caimito, perteneciente a la parroquia puerto pechiche Cantón Pueblo Viejo, esta Ventanilla se dedica labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, fréjol gandul , esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Manuel Agustín se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz y fréjol gandul. Compra sus productos en el Comercial García y Comercial López y vende los  productos en el Comercial Vaca.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para el cultivo de maíz y arroz y fréjol gandul. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar una moto.

Le gusta practicar el deporte.
texts.en:
Manuel Agustín B. S. is 19 years old, single, and lives with his parents in the canton of Ventanas in Ríos province.  He does not have any children.

The members of the "Jerusalen" rural communal bank are based in the precinct of Caimito, which belongs to the parish of Puerto Pechiche and canton of Pueblo Viejo.  The members of this communal bank work in short-cycle agriculture and grow corn, rice, and pigeon peas.  Collectively, they have been doing this work for a long time.

Manuel Agustín plants corn, rice, and pigeon peas.  He buys products at the García and López markets and sells his produce at the Vaca market.

He is requesting this loan to buy agricultural supplies and fertilizers for cultivating corn, rice, and pigeon peas.  With the economic support provided by this loan, he will be better able to meet his needs.  He faces challenges like insect plagues and crop illnesses, as well as variations in the climate.  His dream is to buy a motorcycle.

Manuel Agustín enjoys playing sports.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” LOS HERALDOS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Ana María; ella tiene 56 años de edad, casada y tiene 4 hijos; La socia es ama de casa se dedica al cuidado de sus hijos y de su casa, la socia solicito el préstamo para su uso personal, para la compra de algunos productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar y leche.  

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de productos de primera necesidad.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en: The member belongs to the Los Heraldos community bank. The bank is located in the Cusco district, belonging to the province and department of Cusco. The member is Mrs Ana Maria. She is 56, married and has 4 children. She is a housewife and raises her children and cares for her home. She is requesting a loan for personal use, for the purchase of various basic staples such as rice, sugar and milk. She is requesting this loan for the purchase of various basic staples. She is happy to have this loan and promises to honour the payments of the quotas.

loans.use: to purchase basic staples.

loans.name: Antonio Desiderio

texts.es: El Sr. Antonio Desiderio C. E. vive junto a su esposa e hijos. Tiene casa propia la cual se encuentra ubicada en el distrito de Pueblo Nuevo. El Sr. Antonio trabaja como obrero de campo en una empresa de la zona. Su esposa tambien trabaja como obrera de campo. El Sr. Antonio requiere el crédito para realizar algunos arreglos a su vivienda. Su sueño segun nos comenta es terminar de construir su vivienda y asi poder darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. El Sr. Antonio está muy agradecido por el apoyo que le podamos brindar a trávez de este financiamiento.
texts.en: Mr. Antonio Desiderio C. E. lives with his wife and children. He has his own home in the Pueblo Nuevo district. Antonio works as a farm labourer in a business in the area.
