His wife also works as a farm labourer. Antonio needs a loan to make some repairs to his home. His dream, he tells us, is to finish building his home and be able to give his family a better quality of life. Antonio is very grateful for the support that we are able to offer him through this loan.

loans.use: home improvements

loans.name: Jefferson Alexi

texts.es:
Jefferson Alexi tiene 21 años, Vive en Unión Libre, vive con la esposa y con los hijos,  vive en el Cantón de Ventanas  Provincia los Ríos. Tiene 2 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. JERUSALEN, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto el Caimito, perteneciente a la parroquia puerto pechiche Cantón Pueblo Viejo, esta Ventanilla se dedica labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, fréjol gandul , esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Jefferson Alexi se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz y fréjol gandul. Compra sus productos en el Comercial García y Comercial López y vende los  productos en el Comercial Vaca.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para el cultivo de maíz y arroz y fréjol gandul. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar un terreno y una casa.

Le gusta practicar el deporte.
texts.en: Jefferson Alexi is 21. He is in a common-law marriage and lives with his wife and children in the Ventanas Canton, Los Rios Province. He has 2 children. The V.R.C. Jerusalen group is located in the Caimito area, belonging to the Puerto Pechiche Parish in the Pueblo Viejo Canton. This region is dedicated to short-cycle agricultural labour; the sowing of corn, rice and gandul beans. They spend much time doing this activity. Jefferson Alexi works in agriculture, sowing corn, rice and gandul beans. He purchases his products in the Garcia and Lopez Markets and sells in the Vaca Market. He is requesting this loan to purchase agricultural inputs and fertilizers for the cultivation of corn, rice and gandul beans. The support of this loan will help him economically to supply his needs. He confronts challenges such as plagues, diseases and the varied climate. His dream is to buy a plot of land and a house. he enjoys playing sports.

loans.use: agricultural inputs and fertilizers

loans.name: Eriberto Antonio

texts.es:
Eriberto es un padre de familia muy dedicado por el bienestar familiar. Labora como mecánico automotriz, desde hace varios años. Como meta ha sido la mejora a su vivienda en donde lo ha logrado con el apoyo financiero  de Afodenic. 
Ya que todos sus trece crédito, han sido para infraestructura. Hoy lo que desea hacer es un muro en la parte de atrás del solar para que no se siga desbordando con el invierno lo que es de mucho peligro y que quiere mejorar. 
Comprara materiales de construcción como: piedra, arena, cemento, hierro y hacer muro. Lo que ira poco a poco culminando ya que su financiamiento es poco, debido a su situación económica, ya que también tiene que cumplir con  otros gastos.
texts.en:
Eriberto is a father who is very much committed to his family's well-being.  He has been working as a car mechanic for several years.  His goal has been to improve his home and he is achieving this through the financial support of Afodenic. 

Eriberto has used all thirteen of his loans so far to improve his home's infrastructure.  What he would like to do now is build a wall out the back of his house so that he doesn't get flooded in the winter which is a big danger.  He would like to make this improvement.  He will buy building materials such as: stone, sand, cement and iron to build his wall.  He will finish this work bit by bit as he has little in the way of finances, owing to his socio-economic situation.  He also has to cover other expenses.

loans.use: To buy building materials to build a wall out the back of his home

loans.name: Marina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” LOS HERALDOS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Marina; ella tiene 42 años de edad, casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias como consultora de belleza de las marcas de Esika, Avon, Unique y Dupre, la socia vende cremas, colonias, perfumes entre otros a la vez la socia vende jugos de en mercado del distrito de Zarzuela y de esta manera la socia saca a su familia adelante. 

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de mas productos para su negocio.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
Marina is a member of the ”LOS HERALDOS” community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Marina is 42 years old, married and has 2 children.  She divides her time between her daily activities as a beauty consultant for Esika, Avon, Unique and Dupre brand cosmetics.  She sells creams, cologne, perfume and other products.  She also sells juice in the Zarzuela district market.  In this way, she gets her family ahead in life.

Marina is requesting this loan so that she can buy more products for her business.  She is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: To buy more products for her business

loans.name: Ederson

texts.es: Ederson, de 23 años, vive en casa de su hermana, en compañía de ella; y cada día, juntos se esfuerzan por salir adelante. Desde muy pequeño empezó ha trabajar, y en la actualidad es comerciante ambulante en un gran mercado de su zona. Él vende por temporadas verduras y cuando es época veraniega, estos productos comestibles se descomponen con facilidad,  es por ello que empezó a comercializar ropa, tanto para hombre como para mujer. Este muy satisfecho con las ganancias que obtiene pues son regulares, trabaja durante todo el día y ya tiene algunos clientes fijos que le hacen pedidos. Para él, le desagrada de ser ambulante, ya que así ha perdido varios clientes. Para el futuro quiere instalar un puesto en el mismo mercado, así espera consolidar su negocio y aumentar sus gananciasEs el primer crédito que tiene con MFP, y promete pagar sus cuotas puntualmente pues no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible este aporte que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca D. progreso. Ederson tiene planeado invertir el crédito solicitado en la compra de mercadería en ropa, pues necesita abastecerse para el año entrante.
texts.en: Ederson, age 23, lives with his sister in her home. Every day they work together to get ahead. He started to work at a very young age. He currently works as a street merchant in a large market in the area. He sells seasonal vegetables. In the summer, these products go bad easily. For this reason, he started to sell clothing for men and women. He is very satisfied with the earnings that he makes, as they are regular. He works all day and already has a customer base who make orders. For him, it is disagreeable to sell on the street, as he has lost some customers. In the future he wants to open a stall in the same market. This way, he hopes to solidify his business and increase his earnings. This is his first loan with MFP, and he promises to pay his quotas punctually as he does not want to disappoint the people who have made this loan possible. This loan will allow him to continue working in the search of progress. Ederson plans to invest the loan in the purchase of merchandise: clothing. He needs to stock up for the new year.

loans.use: to purchase more clothing to stock his business.

loans.name: Guadalupe Del Carmen

texts.es:
Doña Guadalupe, resiD. en San Miguel, departamento D. San Miguel, donD. vive con su esposa y dos hijos D. 32 y 15 años D. edad, y un nieto, ella se dedica a la panadería y tiene 52 años D. edad, inicio trabajando como panificadora en una panadería, pero al aprender el proceso que lleva la elaboración del pan, decidió instalar su propia panadería desD. hace 25 años aproximadamente.
Ella ahora necesita un préstamo para comprar materiales como harina, azúcar, levadura, y solicita este préstamo para poder realizar la compra, aumentando así el inventario D. materiales y tratando D. producir una mayor cantidad.
Su objetivo es cada día ver por su familia, sus necesidades importantes, también estar pendiente del negocio para no dejarlo caer y además ir pagando las deudas.
texts.en:
Guadalupe lives in San Miguel, in San Miguel department, with her husband, her two children aged 31 and 15, and a grandchild.  Guadalupe is 52 years old and owns a bakery.  She started working as a bread maker in a bakery but, once she had learned the bread making process, she decided to set up her own bakery.  She has now had her own bakery for approximately 25 years.

Guadalupe currently needs a loan to buy supplies such as flour, sugar and yeast.  She is requesting this loan so that she can make these purchases, increase her inventory of supplies and try to produce a larger quantity of goods.

Guadalupe's goal is to look after her family and their important needs.  She also plans to keep an eye on her business so that it doesn't slip and to pay off her debts.

loans.use: To buy flour, sugar and yeast for making bread

loans.name: Luis

texts.es: Luis, de 42 años, vive en su casa que es propia al lado de su pareja Rocío de 40 años y de sus dos pequeños hijos; juntos se esfuerzan cada día por salir adelante. Este trabajador hombre se dedica desde hace 5 años a la venta y transporte de ropa, al por mayor, labora en el negocio junto a su esposa, quien le ayuda en la ardua labor de compra de ropa en los grandes emporios de la ciudad. Le gusta mucho el trabajo, pues luego de comprar la variada  mercadería en ropa, la distribuye en los mercados de las  distintas ciudades del país y la va dejando con su pequeño camión que él mismo maneja. Trabaja durante todos los días, y muy pocas veces descansa durante los fines de semana, casi 12 horas diarias, pero esta muy satisfecho pues obtiene regulares ganancias, y es por esta razón que cada vez aumenta más el volumen de sus ventas. Además tiene muchos planes para el futuro como el de comprarse un camión más para transportar mayor cantidad de prendas. Es el cuarto crédito que tiene con MFP y promete pagar sus cuotas puntualmente, pues no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible este aporte que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso. Luis tiene planeado invertir el crédito solicitado en la compra de mercadería en cantidad de ropa variada, para distinta época, pues tiene varios pedidos por fin de año que espera concretar.
texts.en: Luis, age 42, lives in his own house with his partner Rocio, age 40, and their two small children. Together, they work hard every day to get ahead. This hard-working man has worked for 5 years selling and transporting clothing, wholesale. He works in this business with his wife, who helps him in the arduous labour of buying clothing in the big trading centers of the city. He enjoys his work greatly, as after buying the varied clothing, he distributes it to various cities in the country in his small truck which he drives himself. He works every day, and he rarely rests on the weekends. He works almost 12 hours a day, but he is very satisfied because he makes regular earnings; thus, each time he increases his sales volume. He also has many plans for the future, such as buying another truck for transporting more clothing articles. This is his fourth loan with MFP and he promises to pay his quotas punctually, since he does not want to disappoint those who are making this loan possible. This loan will allow him to continue working in the search of progress. He plans to invest the requested loan in the purchase of merchandise; varied clothing, for a certain season, as he has several orders for the end of the season that he hopes to fill.

loans.use: to stock up on clothing for various seasons.

loans.name: Rina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” LOS HERALDOS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Rina; ella tiene 35 años de edad, soltera y tiene 1 hijo; La socia trabaja en uno de los hospitales del Cusco en el area de administración lleva  un par de años en este trabajo , esta es la única actividad que realiza por el momento y de esta manera la socia saca a su familia adelante.   

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de algunos productos de primera necesidad y para sus gastos personales.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Rina is a member of the "LOS HERALDOS” community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Rina is 35 years old, single and has one child.  She works in administration in one of Cusco's hospitals.  She has been in this job for a couple of years.  It is the only business activity that she is engaged in right now and it is how she gets her family ahead in life.

Rina is requesting a loan to buy some essential household products and to cover some personal expenses.  She is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her loan repayments on time.

loans.use: To buy some essential household products and to cover some personal expenses

loans.name: Rossy

texts.es: Rossy, de 18 años, vive en casa de sus padres, al lado de ellos; esta empeñosa joven se esfuerza trabajando para ayudar a sus progenitores. Desde hace un año empezó a estudiar repostería, desde entonces, aprendió a preparar toda clase de pasteles y bocaditos, que comercializa a diferentes tiendas de por su zona, pues su escuela tiene convenio con diversos centros comerciales. Cada día prepara sus postres desde las 6 de la tarde hasta las 9 de la noche, y obtiene regulares ganancias de las ventas, por lo que esta muy satisfecha. Además tiene algunos clientes que en la actualidad le están pidiendo buffets (bocaditos de distinta variedad) que también prepara a buenos precios. Además como es una joven muy trabajadora para el futuro tiene planeado instalar un negocio de venta de pasteles y bocaditos, al por mayor, de esta manera espera seguir progresando. Es el primer crédito que tiene con MFP, y promete pagar sus cuotas puntualmente pues no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible este aporte que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso. Rossy tiene planeado invertir el crédito solicitado en la compra de ingredientes (como harina, aceite, manteca) que necesita al por mayor y así espera continuar trabajando.
texts.en: Rossy, age 18, lives with her parents in their home. This hard-working youth works hard to help her parents. A year ago she started studying baking. She learned to make all kinds of cakes and pastries, which she sells to different stores in the area, as her school has agreements with various shopping centers. Every day she makes her desserts from 6 pm to 9 pm. She makes a regular income from the sales, and is thus very satisfied. She has various customers who are requesting buffets (varied snacks) that she also prepares at good prices. As she is a hard-working youth, she plans to open a cake and snack business in the future, where she will sell wholesale. This way, she hopes to continue progressing. This is her first loan with MFP and she promises to pay her quotas punctually as she does not want to disappoint those who are making this loan possible. This loan will allow her to continue working in the search of progress. Rossy plans to invest the requested loan in the wholesale purchase of ingredients (such as flour, oil and butter) which she needs. This way, she hopes to continue working.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for the making of snacks and cakes.

loans.name: Jorge  Raymundo

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “LOS HERALDOS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Jorge Raymundo; el tiene 48 años de edad y es casado y tiene 1 hijo; el socio se dedica a la compra y venta de materiales eléctricos, el socio realiza instalaciones eléctricas a domicilio ,el socio tiene su empresa eléctrica lleva años en este negocio ya que la profesión del socio es ingeniero eléctrico, el socio es una persona muy entusiasta y con muchas ganas de salir adelante y de esta forma saca a su familia adelante.

El socio solicita el préstamo para la compra de materiales para su negocio. 

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Jorge Raymundo is a member of the “LOS HERALDOS” which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Jorge Raymundo is 48 years old, married and has one child.  His business is buying and selling electrical materials.  He installs electrical systems in peoples' homes.  He has his own electrical company and has been in this business for years as he is an electrical engineer by profession.  Jorge Raymundo is a very enthusiastic person who has a great desire to get himself and his family ahead in life through his business. 

Jorge Raymundo is requesting this loan to buy electrical materials for his business.  He is happy to be receiving his loan and pledges to make his repayments on time.

loans.use: To buy materials for his business

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es:
María Luisa, D. 36 años D. edad, posee una tienda, resiD. en San Francisco Gotera, departamento D. Morazán, donD. vive con su esposo y tres hijos, José D. 17 años, Félix D. 10 y Jeovany 12 años, su esposo trabaja distribuyendo gaseosas, ella inicio el negocio desD. que se caso, atendiéndolo todo el día durante toda la semana.
Ella está necesitando un préstamo para la compra D. mercadería para el negocio como pan, salsas, condimentos, y otros que son necesarios para los hogares D. los clientes, este préstamo le permitirá fortalecer el negocio y atender la demanda generada por la temporada naviD.ña.
Sus aspiraciones son que con su ayuda más la D. su esposo contribuirán para que a sus hijos no les falte alimentación, salud y educación, y mejorar la calidad D. vida D. todos.
texts.en:
María Luisa is 36 years old.  She owns a store and lives in San Francisco Gotera, in Morazán department with her husband and three children: 17 year-old José, 10 year-old Félix and 12 year-old Jeovany.  Her husband works delivering soda.

María Luisa set up her business when she got married.  She works in her store all day, every day of the week.  She needs this loan to buy merchandise for her business such as bread, sauces, condiments and other products that are needed in her customers' households.  This loan will allow her to strengthen her business and fill the demand created by the Christmas season.  Her aspirations are for herself and her husband to ensure that their children don't want for food, health or education.  She would like to improve the entire family's quality of life.

loans.use: To buy merchandise for her business such as bread, sauces and condiments

loans.name: Marco

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “LOS HERALDOS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Marco; el tiene 49 años de edad y es casado y tiene 2 hijos; el socio se dedica a su negocio de tienda de abarrotes el vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar y leche entre otros productos más a la vez el socio es empleado jubilado de una empresa privada y de esta forma la socia saca a su familia adelante.

El socio solicita el préstamo para la compra de productos para su negocio.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Marco is a member of the “LOS HERALDOS” community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Marco is 49 years old, married and has 2 children.  His business is a grocery store where he sells essentials such as rice, sugar, milk and other products.  He is also retired from a job he had in a private company.  Through his business, Marco gets his family ahead in life.

Marco is requesting this loan to buy products for his business.  He is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make his repayments on time.

loans.use: To buy products for his business

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es: Juan Carlos es un joven que se dedica a al elaboración de balones anteriormente él trabajaba para su tía en la fabrica de balones pero ahora es independiente y hace sus propios balones, el cliente es bastante trabajador y conoce bastante de su área, gracias a su trabajo el puede ayudar a su familia que vive en La Paz, el actualmente tiene bastante mercado y también viaja a provincias para comercializar sus productos, comenta que a un mediano plazo piensa retornar a su tierra natal La Paz para estar al lado de sus padres y sus hermanos.  Él vive en alquiler en un cuarto en la casa de su tía, el dinero del crédito lo utilizara en la compra de blader para las pelotas, esta agradecido con la institución  por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Juan Carlos is a young man whose business is making balls.  He used to work for his aunt in her ball factory but now he works for himself and makes his own balls.  Juan Carlos is hard working and quite well-known in his area.  His work enables him to help out his family who live in La Paz.

Juan Carlos currently has quite a large market for his goods and he also travels to different provinces to sell his products.  He comments that in the medium term, he is thinking of returning to his native city of La Paz so that he can be with his parents and siblings.  He currently rents a room in his aunt's house.  He will use his loan money to buy bladders for making his sports balls.  He is grateful to the institution for the support he has received.

loans.use: To buy bladders for making sports balls

loans.name: Yoni Huamani

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” LOS HERALDOS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia D. Cusco y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Yoni; ella tiene 45 años D. edad, viuda y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio D. compra y venta D. ropa, la socia viaja hasta Lima para comprar su mercadería para luego distribuirlo a sus clientes D. forma ambulatoria, a la vez la socia realiza manualidades que también lo distribuye a sus clientes que le solicitan.  

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra D. mas mercadería para su negocio.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos D. su cuota
texts.en:
Yoni is a member of the "LOS HERALDOS” community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Yoni is 45 years old, widowed and has 3 children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business buying and selling clothes.  Yoni travels to Lima to buy her merchandise which she then delivers to her customers as an itinerant saleswoman.  Yoni also makes handicrafts that she delivers to her customers who request them.

Yoni is requesting this loan to buy more merchandise for her business.  She is happy to be receiving her loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: To buy merchandise for her business

loans.name: Guillermina Arely

texts.es:
Guillermina, tiene 38 años D. edad, resiD. en Guatajiagua departamento D. Morazán, donD. vive con sus hijos Yesenia, Ilcia,  Osmin, Amílcar, Ruth, Eliseo y Nancy, posee una tienda donD. ofrece productos para el hogar, desD. hace un año está administrando este negocio.
Esta solicitando un préstamo para la compra D. arroz, azúcar, frijoles, detergentes, pastas y pan, esta inversión la hará con la intención D. mejorar el negocio y D. aprovechar para aumentar el inventario D. productos.
Sueña con ampliar el negocio, contar con muchos productos y tener un gran número D. clientes, recibir abundantes ganancias y ayudar a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Guillermina is 38 years old.  She lives in Guatajiagua, in Morazán department, with her children Yesenia, Ilcia, Osmin, Amílcar, Ruth, Eliseo and Nancy.  She has a store where she sells household products.  She has been in this business for one year.  She is requesting a loan to buy rice, sugar, beans, detergents, pasta and bread.  She is making this investment with the intention of improving her business and increasing her product inventory.

Guillermina dreams of expanding her business, having a lot of products, having a large number of customers, making healthy profits and helping her children.

loans.use: To buy rice, sugar, beans, detergents, pasta and bread

loans.name: Nelva

texts.es: Nelva, de 45 años, es una mujer carismática y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia, junto a su esposo  y sus 2 hijas y su nieta,  a quien adora. Con mucho esfuerzo, Nelva lleva adelante sus negocios, que es la venta de quesos y de productos de belleza. Los lunes  se dedica a la venta quesos, inmediatamente después de recoger de la agencia; que le envían sus familiares de provincias. En seguida, las distribuye  a sus vecinos y todos sus clientes de su barrio. Pero el resto de los días, después de sus labores domésticas, apoya a su esposo en su taller de carpintería, y por las tardes recorre las calles de su distrito, ofreciendo sus productos de belleza  a sus familiares, amigas y vecinas de su barrio, quienes la prefieren por su buen trato y las facilidades que le brinda. Se siente contenta con el trabajo que realiza, ya que gracias a sus utilidades ayuda  en su hogar. En adelante, piensa instalar un negocio de papelería, en el ambiente de su casa, para ello viene realizando acondicionando un lugar. Este es su primer crédito con MFP, y sabe que este aporte le será útil, por ello se compromete pagar todas sus cuotas  puntualmente. Con el crédito que recibirá, comprará más productos de belleza, para abastecer los diversos pedidos pendientes que tiene.
texts.en: Nelva, age 45, is a charismatic and hard-working woman. She lives in her own home with her husband, 2 daughters and granddaughter, whom she adores. With great work, Nelva has gotten her business ahead. She sells cheeses and beauty products. On Mondays, she sells cheeses, immediately after getting it from the office; her family members in the provinces send it to her. She distributes it to her neighbours and all her customers in her neighbourhood. But the rest of the days, after doing her housework, she helps her husband in his carpentry workshop. In the afternoons she walks through the streets of her district, selling her beauty products to her family, friends and neighbours, who prefer her for the good service she provides. She is happy with her work, since she is able to help with the household. In the future, she wants to open a stationery store in her home. This is her first loan with MFP, and she knows that it will be useful, so she promises to pay all of the quotas punctually. With this loan, she will buy more beauty products to fill the various pending orders that she has.

loans.use: to stock up on beauty products.

loans.name: Levy Azucena

texts.es:
Doña Levi, D. 40 años D. edad, se dedica a la elaboración y venta D. piñatas, vive con sus hijos: Gloria D. 21 años y Carlos D. 19 años D. edad, es madre soltera, residen en San Francisco Gotera departamento D. Morazán, ella tiene más D. 10 años D. dedicarse a este negocio, le ayudan sus hijos y una hermana, su horario D. trabajo es D. 8:00am a 5:00pm.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra D. materiales como papel periódico y papel crespón, alambre y pega, esta compra le ayudara a fabricar más piñatas, además D. tener la oportunidad D. aumentar la producción también aumentaran sus ventas, generando D. esta manera ingresos abundantes para solventar las necesidades del hogar.
Ella quiere cancelar puntualmente el préstamo, aumentar sus ingresos para poder montar un local amplio adecuado para fabricar y comercializar las piñatas.
texts.en: Mrs Levi, age 40, makes piñatas. She lives with her children: Gloria, age 21, and Carlos, age 19. She is a single mother. She lives in San Francisco Gotera, in the Morazan department. For over 10 years she has worked in this business. Her children and one of her sisters helps her. Her work schedule is from 8 am to 5 pm. She is requesting a loan for the purchase of materials such as newspaper and crepe paper, wire and glue. This purchase will help her to make more piñatas, in addition to having the opportunity to increase her production and sales, thus generating more income to cover her household costs. She wants to repay the loan punctually and increase her income to open a well-stocked business to make and sell her piñatas.

loans.use: the purchase of materials such as newspaper and crepe paper, wire and glue

loans.name: Alex Michael

texts.es:
Alex de 26 años,  es un joven trabajador que siempre le ha ayudado a su mama a conseguir más ingresos para su familia. 

Viviendo en el cantón llamado Playas uno de los lugares turísticos del Ecuador con una diversa dimensión de mariscos. Ha trabajado administrando la tienda de la mama hace ya mucho tiempo pero como necesitaba surtirla con mercadería que solicitaban los clientes con sus ahorros empezó a comprar recargas para celulares, tarjetas para celulares etc. 

Con una buena administración ahora tiene la tienda surtida con algunos viveres y recargas celulares. Trabaja desde las 07h00am hasta las 22h00pm. Para seguir trabajando y ayudar a su mama quiere comprar tarjetas celulares, arroz y recargas. Uno de sus propósitos para la tienda es incrementar el espacio y comprar mercadería.
texts.en: Alex, age 26, is a young worker who has always helped his mother to make more money for the family. He lives in the Playas canton, one of the touristic locations in Ecuador with a diverse marine life. He has worked in his mother's store for a long time, but as he needed to stock it with the merchandise that his customers requested, he started to use his savings to purchase cell phone cards and recharges, etc. With his good management, he now has it stocked with various food items and cellphone refills. He works from 7 am to 10 pm. In order to continue working and helping his mother, he wants to buy cell phone cards, rice and refills. One of his goals for the store is to increase the space and buy merchandise.

loans.use: cell phone refills, rice

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: the purchase of fabric and threads for making shirts

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María, de 50 años, es una madre amorosa y muy laboriosa, vive en su casa propia, junto a su esposo y sus 4 hijos. Desde hace 30 años se ha dedicado a la venta de lozas, lencerías y ropa en general, de acuerdo a la temporada climática, trata de  incrementar y diversificar sus productos. Es así que siempre esta en constante actividad, comprando y vendiendo, en su puesto informal de ventas, que constantemente la reubican, por no tener un puesto fijo. Su hija mayor le ayuda en esta labor y las veces que no pueden, dejan de trabajar,  y se van de compras sin mayor apuro y con mayor tranquilidad. Es así, con el pasar del tiempo, conoce sus puntos de ventas, en donde encuentra precios muy  módicos. Por ello, es que vende a precios más asequibles; por lo que cuenta con más clientes. Para María le es importante continuar en su negocio y buscar un puesto de ventas, donde realice su negocio  con mayor tranquilidad. Es su 7mo crédito con MFP, por lo que se compromete nuevamente en ser responsable con el pago de sus cuotas, considerando éste crédito muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de más lencerías y ropas casuales, para la temporada del año nuevo.
texts.en: María, age 50, is a loving and hard-working mother. She lives in her own home with her husband and 4 children. For 30 years she has sold china and general clothing based on the season. She tries to increase and diversify her products. She is constantly working, buying and selling, in her informal sales stall which she is constantly moving, since she does not have a fixed location. Her oldest daughter helps her with this work. When they can't work, they go shopping. With the passing of time, she has become familiar with her sales points. She has very good prices, and so she has more customers. For Maria it is important to continue with her business and get a fixed sales location where she can do her work with more peace of mind. This is her seventh loan with MFP, and she promises again to be responsible with the payment of her quotas. She thinks this loan will be very useful in the progress of her business. With the requested loan, she will invest in the purchase of more lingerie and casual clothing for the weather of the new year.

loans.use: to purchase more lingerie and casual clothing to fill her customers' orders.

loans.name: Olga Argentina

texts.es:
Doña Olga, tiene 62 años D. edad, vive en Guatajiagua departamento D. Morazán, donD. vive con su hija y tres nietos, más su esposo, ella se dedica a la sastrería, dedicándose desD. hace 20 años a esta actividad, su horario es D. 8:00am a 6:00pm, ella aprendió este oficio por que su esposo también es sastre y le enseño.
Dona Olga necesita D. materiales para poder confeccionar vestidos, por lo que solicita un préstamo para la compra D. telas, zippers, broches, botones e hilos, con esta compra mantendrá un buen número D. materiales a disponibilidad para confeccionar trajes, vestidos, faldas para dama.
Su objetivo es mantener todo lo necesario para que su taller D. sastrería funcione perfectamente, además generar ingresos a través D. los trabajos para pagar este préstamo adecuadamente, y ayudar a sus nietos en sus estudios.
texts.en: Mrs Olga, age 62, lives in Guatajiagua in the department of Morazán, with her daughter and three grandchildren, and her husband. She has worked as a tailor for 20 years. Her schedule is from 8 am to 6 pm. She learned this work because her husband is also a tailor and he taught her. Olda needs materials to be able to make dresses, so she is requesting a loan for the purchase of fabrics, zippers, clasps, buttons and threads. With this purchase she will have a good amount of material available to make suits, dresses, and skirts for women. Her goal is to have everything necessary for her workshop to function perfectly, and to generate income through her work to pay this loan properly, and help her children in their studies.

loans.use: the purchase of fabrics, zippers, clasps, buttons and threads.

loans.name: Cristo Y Nuestro Esfuerzo 2 Group

texts.en:
Yaquelin is a lively 60-year-old woman who lives with her long-term partner and their two children. With the money from this loan, she will invest in her business selling clothing for women and men. She started her business with the first loan she took around 3 years ago, and she has been reinvesting all her five loans she took before this. Her dreams for the future are to buy her own house, and to have her kids go to university. 

Yaquelin is a member of the group known as Cristo  y Nuestro esfuerzo (Christ and our effort) 2. She emigrated from Haiti 20 years ago, and this group is composed of Haitian citizens living in her village.  Her story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Dominican and Haitian clients generally, many of whom recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti. Her group is located in the rural areas surrounding La Romana, where the economy is dominated by the sugar cane harvest and where running water (none of which is potable) and electricity are unreliable. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy clothes for resale

loans.name: Jose Neftali

texts.es:
Don José, reside en San Miguel, departamento de San Miguel, tiene 41 años vive con su familia conformada por su esposa y una bebe de 6 mese de nacida, se dedica a la vena de electrodomésticos, negocio que inicio con uno de sus hermanos, pero que luego instalo un negocio propio y que su suegro le ayuda a vender, su horario es de 6:00am a 7:00pm, por el momento don José necesita un préstamo para la compra de artículos y abastecer el negocio.
Con este préstamo estará fortaleciendo su puesto de venta y contara con artículos que en ocasiones le son buscados por los clientes. Don José busca el crecimiento en el comercio y ser competente ante los demás negocios, además de generar para su familia los ingresos que son tan necesarios para saldar necesidades.
texts.en:
José lives in San Miguel, in San Miguel department.  He is 41 years old and lives with his wife and 6 month-old baby girl.  José's business is selling electrical appliances.  He started his business together with one of his brothers but then he set up on his own.  His father-in-law helps him in his business.  José works from 6.00am to 7.00pm.  Right now he needs a loan to buy goods and stock his business.

José will use this loan to strengthen his sales location and have in stock goods that his customers are sometimes looking for.  José is looking to grow his business and be competitive as regards other businesses.  He would also like to make enough income to cover his family's needs.

loans.use: To buy goods to stock his business

loans.name: German

texts.es: El Sr. German vive en la localidad de el Torno,  es de ocupación carpintero, hace unos 13 años que se dedica a esta actividad, es nacido en el departamento de Chuquisaca hace unos 30 años que se vino a vivir al departamento de Santa Cruz, su esposa con la cual tiene cuatros hijos dos a su cargo porque otros dos ya son independientes, su esposa  se dedica a la venta de comida, el destino del crédito es para comprar madera, se siente agradecido con la institución por el apoyo económico que siempre le a dado.
texts.en: Mr. German lives in the El Torno area. He is a carpenter and has done this work for 13 years. He was born in the Chuquisaca department but came to the Santa Cruz department 30 years ago. His wife (with whom he has four children, two of whom are under their care and two of whom are independent) works selling food. This loan will be used to buy wood. He is grateful to the institution for the economic support that they have always given him.

loans.use: the purchase of wood

loans.name: Maria Irma

texts.es:
Doña María, D. 58 años D. edad, resiD. en San Miguel, departamento D. San Miguel, vive con su hijo, tienen casa propia, ella es V., posee un comedor que en un inicio era pupuseria, pero poco a poco creció ofreciendo comida  para desayuno, almuerzo cena, desD. hace 16 años en un horario D.  6:00am a 7:00pm.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra D. mercadería para el comedor, también utensilios D. cocina, con esta compra espera tener lo necesario para la preparación D. los alimentos tanto en productos como verduras, carnes y condimentos como también es utensilios más eficientes.
Su mayor sueño es mantener el comedor estable sin recurrir a préstamo, además D. generar ingresos para su hogar e ir mejorando las condiciones del comedor.
texts.en:
María is 58 years old and lives in San Miguel, in San Miguel department, with her son.  She is a widow and has her own home.  María owns an eatery.  It was originally a pupuseria but she gradually grew her business and started offering breakfasts, lunches and dinners.  She has had her business for 16 years and works from 6.00am to 7.00pm.

María is requesting a loan to buy merchandise and cooking utensils for her eatery.  With this purchase, she hopes to have all she needs to make her meals both in terms of products such as vegetables, meat and condiments as well as more efficient utensils.

María's greatest dream is to keep her business stable without having to take out loans.  She would also like to make income for her household and continue improving the conditions of her eatery.

loans.use: To buy merchandise for her eatery as well as cooking utensils

loans.name: Marvin Antonio

texts.es:
Marvin es un hombre trabajador, padre de dos hijos, casado. Hoy en día labora a una empresa privada desempeñándose en servicios de seguridad. Atreves de los préstamo ha venido construyendo su casa toda de concreto. El cual todos sus financiamientos han sido con el fin de poder tener una casa digna para su familia.
Con este nuevo préstamo, seguirá con el levantamiento de pared en algunas partes de la vivienda que le falta, para luego poder repellarla toda que lo hará a largo plazo ya que este es un gran avance en su vida como meta personal.
Comprara materiales como: arena, cemento, hierro, piedrín, clavos,  entre otros para seguir la obra.
texts.en:
Marvin is a hard-working man.  He is married and has two children.  He currently works in a private company as a security guard.  Through a series of  loans, he has been able to build his house entirely from concrete.  All of his loans have been taken out with the goal of having a decent house for his family to live in.

Marvin will use this new loan to continue building walls in some parts of his home that still need them so that he can later plaster the whole house.  He will do that in the long term.  This is a great advance in his life and a personal goal.  He will buy materials such as sand, cement, iron, gravel, nails, etc. so that he can continue with the work.

loans.use: To buy building materials to finish building his house from concrete.  He doesn't have much left to do which means he is very happy in his personal life.

loans.name: Maria Berta

texts.es:
Doña María, reside en San Miguel, departamento de San Miguel, donde vive sola, es madre soltera de dos hijos pero estos ya tienen sus propios hogares, ella tiene 51 años de edad, vende alborotos, este negocio fue fundado hace 10 años  por iniciativa propia, trabaja todos los días de 7:00am a 4:00pm, en el mercado municipal de San Miguel, ella por el momento desea adquirir un préstamo para comprar materiales para invertir en el negocio como maicillo, dulce, leña  y plásticos, esta es su materia prima para la preparación de los alborotos.
Este préstamo le ayudara a continuar preparando su venta, a contar con suficientes materiales para su elaboración, además que seguirá vendiendo y generando ingresos para ella ya que tiene gastos y nadie le ayuda a cubrirlos en caso que ella no pueda.
Su objetivo en mantenerse en el negocio, contar con ingresos para seguir manteniéndose de sus ventas.
texts.en:
María lives in San Miguel, in San Miguel department.  She is a single mother of two children but she lives alone because her children already have their own homes.  María is 51 years old and sells popcorn.  She set up this business 10 years ago on her own initiative.  She works every day from 7.00am to 4.00pm in the town market in San Miguel.

María would currently like a loan to buy materials to invest in her business such as sorghum, sweetener, firewood and plastic bags.  These are the supplies that she uses to prepare her popcorn.  This loan will help her to continue preparing her goods to sell and to have enough materials to make her goods.  It will also help her to continue making her sales and making income for herself since she has expenses but nobody to help her cover them if she can't.  Her goal is to stay in business and to make the profits necessary to continue making her sales.

loans.use: To buy sorghum, sweetener, firewood and plastic bags

loans.name: Alba Luz

texts.es:
Doña Alba de 47 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de refrescos y panes, vive con sus hijos uno de 29 años y el otro de 25 años de edad, es madre soltera, todos trabajan en su familia, residen en El Transito,  el negocio lo comenzó por iniciativa propia, por la necesidad de velar por los gastos de su familia, sus ventas la realiza en el mercado municipal de El Transito, con un horario de 8:00am a 5:00pm, actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de productos como bebidas, pan, pollo y condimentos entre otro que son necesarios para la venta.
La compra le ayudara a fortalecer el negocio y le permitirá tener mayores ingresos en la familia, sus aspiraciones son mantener el negocio fuerte, crecer en clientela y mejorar las condiciones económicas de la familia.
texts.en:
Alba is 47 years old.  Her business is selling soft drinks and bread.  She is a single mother and lives with her children aged 29 and 25 in El Transito.  All the members of her family work.

Alba started her business on her own initiative as she needed to take care of her family's expenses.  She makes her sales in El Transito town market and works from 8.00am to 5.00pm.

Alba is currently requesting a loan to buy products such as drinks, bread, chicken, condiments and other goods that are necessary for her business.  These purchases will help to strengthen her business and allow her to make more income for her family.  Her goals are to keep her business strong, to increase her number of customers and to improve her family's finances.

loans.use: To buy products such as drinks, bread, chicken and condiments

loans.name: Cristo Y Nuestro Esfuerzo 5, 7 Group

texts.en:
Leonel is the coordinator of his group, Cristo y Nuestro Esfuerzo 5 & 7  (Christ and Our Effort). He makes his home in a simple structure with his four children. He says that his most difficult challenge is raising his children without their mother. While he continues to do so, he intends to carry on attending church.

Leonel is excited to be taking his fifth loan with Esperanza, having successfully repaid his previous loans and grown his business. He has had his business for ten years. He plans to use this loan to invest in his business by buying shoes by the dozen in different sizes, colors and for varying types of clients. He will use the profits to invest in his business, while saving part of it to eventually build a house, buy a vehicle and pay for his children's studies. 

Leonel's story is representative of his group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican (many of whom recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti) clients generally. His group is located in the rural areas surrounding La Romana, where the sugarcane harvest and tourist industry dominate the economy. This area, like nearly all impoverished areas of the Dominican Republic, suffers from unreliable running water (none of which is potable) and electricity.

loans.use: To buy shoes for resale

loans.name: Juana Isabel

texts.es:
Juana de 36 años de edad, reside en El Transito departamento de San Miguel, se dedica a la venta de tortillas, vive con su madre y hermanos, es soltera, tiene 13 años de dedicarse a la venta de tortillas, las prepara todos los días de la semana.
Juana necesita un préstamo para mejoramiento del negocio, pagando los gastos de agua potable, esto le ayudara a tener en mejor condición el negocio, además necesita una parte del préstamo para gastos familiares.
Su propósito es mantener el negocio, proveer siempre para su familia y cancelar este préstamo de la mejor manera.
texts.en:
Juana is 36 years old and lives in El Transito, in San Miguel department.  Her business is selling tortillas.  Juana lives with her mother and siblings.  She is single and has been selling tortillas for 13 years.  She makes her tortillas every day of the week.

Juana needs this loan to improve her business, covering her potable water expenses.  This will help her to keep her business in good shape.  She also needs some of her loan for family expenses.  Her goal is to keep her business running, to always provide for her family and to pay back this loan in the best way possible.

loans.use: To improve her business

loans.name: Duo Las Princesas De San Bartolo Group

texts.es:
DUO  LAS PRINCESAS DE SAN BARTOLO
Doña Flor de María C. A. se dedica a vender frutas y verduras en el mercado de la terminal zona 4 de Guatemala, ella nos comenta  para lograr surtir su venta la forma de en que ella satisface las necesidades de sus clientes es vender huevos y detergentes que lo hace los miércoles y sábado el resto de los días  vende sus frutas en el mercado y siempre trata la forma de vender fruta de temporada, nos comenta que cada año salen a vender productos navideños que lo hacen en todo el mes de diciembre por lo que ella necesita su crédito para surtir mas su venta de esta temporada, como  uvas, manzanas,  de la misma forma doña Paula  se dedica vender frutas en el mercado  ella nos comenta que a cada fin de año ella prefiere vender las frutas de temporada  ya que es lo que sus clientes le solicitan mas en el área.Solicita el credito para surtir su venta de frutas, como manzanas,uvas etc.
texts.en: in English: Duo The Princesses of Saint Berthold Doña Flor de María C. A. sells fruit and vegetables at the market of the terminal area 4 of Guatemala. She told us that to achieve customer satisfaction she sells eggs and detergents on Wednesdays and Saturdays, and on the other days she sells seasonal fruit at the market. Furthermore she told us that every year she sells Christmas products that she produces during the whole month of December. She needs this loan to finance the additional sales during this season, such as grapes and apples. Similarly, Doña Paula sells fruit at the market. She told us that at the end of each year she prefers to sell seasonal fruit, because that is what her local customers expect her to do. She applies for this loan to increase her sale of fruit, such as apples, grapes, etc.

loans.use: To finance the sale of fruit such as apples, grapes, etc.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es:
Manuel, de 21 años de edad, reside en El Transito departamento de San Miguel, vive con su madre y sus hermanos, trabaja en un carwash y servillantas, tiene 6 años de trabajar en este lugar.
El necesita un préstamo para ampliar su vivienda, específicamente un cuarto ya que en el que esta es muy pequeño, la obtención de este préstamo será de mucha ayuda ya que estará contribuyendo a su vivienda y aprovechara para mejorar otras partes donde las paredes no están adecuadas.
Su objetivo es tener una mejor vivienda junto a sus familiares, que todos se sientan cómodos y tranquilos,  además de querer formar su propia familia.
texts.en:
Manuel is 21 years old and lives in El Transito, in San Miguel department.  He lives with his mother and siblings.  Manuel works in a carwash and tire shop.  He has been working there for 6 years.

Manuel needs this loan to extend his home.  He specifically wants to extend one of the rooms which is very small.  This loan will help him a lot as it will help him to improve his home and he will take advantage to also improve other parts where the walls aren't very good.  His goal is to have a better home for his family and for them all to be comfortable and relaxed.  He would also like to start his own family.

loans.use: To buy building materials to improve his home

loans.name: Raimunda

texts.es:
Doña Raimunda, tiene 50 años de edad,  vive con sus hijos de 26, 23 y 20 años de edad, todos trabajan y le ayudan con los gastos del hogar, Doña Raimunda se dedica a la crianza de cerdos, no tiene un horario fijo.
La Señora Raimunda está con planes de compra cerdos pero no cuenta con disponibilidad por lo que solicita un préstamo para comprar algunos cerdos y engordarlos para el comercio. Esta inversión le ayudara a multiplicar el negocio creciendo con su granja.
Sus aspiraciones son continuar con el comercio de cerdos, además de ayudara a sus hijos con los gastos del hogar y cubrir sus necesidades personales.
texts.en:
Raimunda is 50 years old.  She lives with her children aged 26, 23 and 20.  They all work and help her with the household expenses.

Raimunda raises pigs.  She does not work regular hours.  Raimunda plans to buy more pigs but she doesn't have enough money available.  She is requesting this loan to buy some pigs and fatten them so that she can sell them.  This investment will help her to increase her business and expand her farm.  Her goals are to continue in her business raising pigs, to help her children with the household expenses and to cover her personal needs.

loans.use: To buy pigs

loans.name: Monica

texts.es: Mónica tiene 32 años, vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos en casa de sus suegros. Desde hace 2 años se dedica a la venta de comida solo los fines de semana en la plaza de su localidad, asimismo vende carne de ovejas, animales que cría, considerándolo muy rentable este negocio.  De esta manera puede tener una estabilidad económica, factor importante para el sustento de su familia. Por ahora su principal prioridad es renovar sus utensilios de cocina y comprar más ollas, además desea incrementar la cantidad de ovejas que tiene. Es su primer crédito con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas que conoce, responsables y muy solidarias, agradece a todas las personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será muy útil en el progreso de su actividad económica. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de nuevas ollas y una carpa que la protejan de las lluvias.
texts.en:
Mónica is 32 years old.  She lives with her husband and two children in her in-laws' home.

For the past two years, Mónica has been selling food on weekends in the town square.  She also sells the meat of the sheep that she raises.  She considers this business very profitable.  In this way, Mónica manages to achieve financial stability which is very important in supporting her family.  For now, her main priority is replacing her cooking utensils and buying more pots.  She would also like to increase the quantity of sheep that she owns.

This is Mónica's first loan with MFP.  She is very happy to know that she has financial support and she likes being a member of her community bank because all of the bank's members are people that she knows.  They are all responsible and very supportive of each other.

Mónica thanks everybody who will help to fund her loan since it will be very useful to her in making progress in her business.  She will invest her loan money in buying new pots and an awning that will protect her from the rain.

loans.use: To buy pots and an awning that will protect her customers from the rain

loans.name: Seraphine

texts.en:
Seraphine owns a business that sells foodstuffs. She is 28 years old, married and has four children, who are aged between five and twelve years old. Her husband is in a similar business. 

Seraphine has been selling foodstuffs for five years. Her loan will be used to buy more sorghum, beans and cassava to sell. She hopes to use the increased profits from her business to provide food for the family, pay school fees and renovate a house.

loans.use: To buy more beans and sorghum to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Saphie

texts.en:
Saphie is 43 years old, married and has two children. Currently one of her children attends school. Saphie sells cassava, which she has been doing for four years. She works together with her husband. She will use the loan to purchase more cassava to sell.

With the increased profits from her expanded business Saphie plans to buy a plot of land, renovate a house and pay her children's school fees. In the future she would like to own a big shop with a variety of items.

loans.use: To buy more cassava to sell

loans.name: Dinora Delmi

texts.es:
Dinora D. 46 años D. edad, resiD. en El Transito departamento D. San Miguel, donD. vive con sus hijos D. 26 y 24 años D. edad, además el esposo D. una hija y dos nietos, se dedica a atender una tienda donD. ofrece productos domésticos, en su casa todos los adultos trabajan para ayudar con los gastos, la tienda Dinora la abre a las 7:00am y cierra a las 6:00pm.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo pues no cuenta con fondos ahorrados para invertir en el negocio, desea comprar mercadería alguna nueva que le solicitan los clientes, como pastas, cremas, pollo y carnes; esta inversión le permitirá ampliar el negocio, mantenerlo en condiciones competentes.
Su principal propósito es manejar bien el préstamo, administrar bien el negocio y atender bien a los clientes para asegurar su satisfacción, además D. aportar para su familia lo necesario.
texts.en:
Dinora is 46 years old and lives in El Transito, in San Miguel department, with her children who are 26 and 24.  She also lives with the husband of one of her daughters and two grandchildren.

Dinora serves in her store where she sells household products.  All of the adults in her house work to help with the family's expenses.  Dinora's store opens at 7.00am and closes at 6.00pm.  She is requesting a loan as she doesn't have enough savings to invest in her business.  She would like to buy some new goods that her customers are requesting such as pasta, creams, chicken and meat.  This investment will enable her to expand her business and keep it competitive.  Her main goals are to handle her loan well, to manage her business well and to serve her customers well in order to ensure their satisfaction.  She also wants to be able to proviD. her family with everything they need.

loans.use: To buy products such as pasta, cream, chicken and meats

loans.name: Hada Luz

texts.es:
Hada, tiene 32 años de edad, reside en Usulután, se dedica a la venta de ropa, vive sola es soltera madre de una niña de 2 años de edad, trabaja de forma ambulante en los alrededores del mercado municipal de El Transito, actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para comprar ropa, dicho préstamo le dará impulso para que su negocio se vea fortalecido y pueda atender de una mejora manera a los clientes, ofreciéndoles distintas modas y colores en prendas de vestir.
Su sueño es poder obtener un puesto fijo para la venta, aumentar sus clientes, y generar ingresos para ayudar a su hija y mejorar su nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Hada is 32 years old and lives in Usulután.  Her business is selling clothes.  She is a single mother of a 2 year-old daughter and lives alone with her daughter.  She works as an itinerant street vendor around El Transito town market.  She is currently requesting this loan to buy clothes.  This loan will give her business a boost and strengthen it.  It will enable her to better serve her customers, offering them clothes in different styles and colors.

Hada's dream is to obtain a fixed sales location, to increase her number of customers and to make income to help her daughter and improve her standard of living.

loans.use: To buy clothes

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan Carlos, de 26 años de edad, reside en El Transito departamento de San Miguel, vive solo y se dedica a una tienda donde ofrece artículos de primera necesidad, lo atiende en un horario de 6:00am a 5:00pm.
El solicita un préstamo para la compra de mercadería para vender en su negocio, esta inversión le ayudara a mantener surtido el negocio, a tener más posibilidades de crecimiento y aumentar las ventas.
Su objetivo es prosperar en el negocio, mejorar sus condiciones de vida a través del negocio.
texts.en:
Juan Carlos is 26 years old and lives in El Transito, in San Miguel department.  He lives alone and works in a store where he sells essential household products.  He serves in his store from 6.00am to 5.00pm.

Juan Carlos is requesting a loan to buy merchandise to sell in his business.  This investment will help him to keep his business well stocked, to have more possibilities for growth and to increase his sales.  His goal is to be successful in his business and to improve his living conditions through his business.

loans.use: To buy merchandise to sell in his business

loans.name: Benjamin Daniel

texts.es:
Benjamín se dedica a la venta de pan. Tiene mucho tiempo de tener este negocio. Benjamín ha trabajado fuertemente todos los días por proporcionar el pan de cada día actualmente tiene ciertos pedidos que sus clientes le realizan.  
El desea adquirir más mercadería para ampliar su negocio y de esa manera poder satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar un crédito que será utilizado en la compra de materia prima. Benjamín es un joven bastante trabajador y que gusta mucho de colaborar con los demás, los ingresos que percibe de su negocio los utiliza para ayudar a su familia a salir adelante.
texts.en:
Benjamín's business is selling bread.  He has been in this business for a long time.  Benjamín works hard every day making his bread.  He currently has a number of orders that his customers make.  He would like to acquire more merchandise so that he can expand his business and thereby be able to meet his customers' demands.  For this reason, he is requesting a loan that he will use to buy raw materials.

Benjamín is quite a hard-working young man who very much likes to work with other people.  He uses the profits that he makes in his business to help his family get ahead.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Carlos Tulio De Jesus

texts.es:
MICROEMPRESARIO: CARLOS TULIO G.


Carlos Tulio G. agricultor de nacimiento trabaja la tierra desde que era muy niño, actualmente le prestas sus servicios a sus vecinos para así poder tener diariamente su jornal de trabajo.

Este agricultor tiene además un cultivo de lulo que le permite tener mayores ingresos, por esto el requiere de un crédito para comprar abonos y fertilizantes para su cultivo y así podrá tener una cosecha sana y productiva.

Su familia conformada por su esposa y 5 hijos se benefician y mejora su calidad de vida gracia a los cultivo de Carlos Tulio y a su trabajo como agricultor.
texts.en: Carlos Tulio G., a farmer by birth, has worked the land from his childhood. He currently lends his services to his neighbours in order to work every day. This farmer has a Quito orange crop which allows him to make better earnings. He needs a loan to purchase manure and fertilizers for his crop in order to have a healthy and productive harvest. His family consists of his wife and five children. Their quality of life improves and they benefit from Carlos' crops and his work as a farmer.

loans.use: the purchase of manure and fertilizers

loans.name: Edilson Vladimir

texts.es:
Edilson, de 23 años de edad, vive con su esposa y su hijo de un año de edad, residen en Santa Elena, departamento de Usulután, trabaja solo él para mantener a su familia dedicándose a la ganadería, este negocio lo inicio con la ayuda de su padre ya que tiene experiencia en este negocio, no tiene un horario fijo, y actualmente necesita dinero para comprar ganado de repasto para el comercio, con este préstamo él podrá tener acceso a mejorar su condición como vendedor y comerciante de ganado.
Su aspiración es ser un ganadero de éxito, aumentar el número de reces y aumentar sus ganancias para ayudar de una mejor manera a su familia y vivir cómodamente.
texts.en:
Edilson is 23 years old.  He lives with his wife and 1 year-old child in Santa Elena, in Usulután department.  He works as a livestock farmer to support his family. 

Edilson started his business with his father's help since he has experience in the business.  He does not work regular hours.

Edilson currently needs money to buy cattle to sell.  This loan will enable him to improve his position as a cattle salesman.  His goal is to become a successful livestock farmer, to increase his number of cattle and to increase his profits so that he can help his family the best he can and live comfortably.

loans.use: To buy cattle to sell

loans.name: Jose Humberto

texts.es:
José, es un joven de 22 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de medicina y ropa, vive con su esposa y su hija de 2 años de edad, residen en San Rafael Oriente departamento de Usulután, José inicio este negocio desde 2 años, y por el momento está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de mercadería (prendas de vestir), esta inversión le ayudara a fortalecer el inventario y tener a disponibilidad de los clientes variedad de productos.
Su objetivo es tener un buen negocio que genere ganancias y que le ayude a superarse junto a su familia, brindándoles estabilidad y una mejor condición de vida.
texts.en: José is a young man of 22 years. He sells medicine and clothing, and lives with his wife and 2 year-old daughter. They live in San Rafael Oriente, in the Usulutan department. Jose started this business 2 years ago, and at the moment he is requesting a loan for the purchase of merchandise (articles of clothing). This investment will help him to strengthen his inventory and have a variety of products available to his customers. his goal is to have a good business that generates earnings and helps him and his family to succeed, offering them stability and better living conditions.

loans.use: the purchase of merchandise (articles of clothing)

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Elsa Isabel

texts.es:
Doña Elsa, tiene 41 años de edad, reside en San Miguel, departamento de San Miguel, posee un comedor y vive con una de sus hijas de 14 años de edad, es madre soltera, su comedor lo inicio con poco material y atendiéndolo sola, pero hoy día tiene dos empleadas, lleva ya 7 años de administrarlo con un horario de 7:00am a 5:00pm, ha ganado mucha clientela.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de mercadería para preparar los alimentos, ya que en ocasiones no logra salir con la demanda por lo que quiere aumentar su inventario comprando bebidas, arroz, pastas, condimentos, verduras y carnes, con esta compra espera tener en mejores condiciones el comedor y poder salir con todos los pedidos.
Doña Elsa, sueña con un comedor más amplio, casa propia y ayudar a su hija en los estudios.
texts.en:
Elsa is 41 years old.  She lives in San Miguel, in San Miguel department.  She is a single mother and lives with one of her daughters who is 14 years old.  She owns an eatery which she set up with just a little bit of material and, in the beginning, she worked there on her own.  However, she now has two employees and has been running her business for 7 years.  She works from 7.00am to 5.00pm and has attracted a lot of customers.

Elsa is requesting this loan to buy supplies for making her meals since she sometimes cannot meet demand.  She would like to increase her inventory, purchasing drinks, rice, pasta, condiments, vegetables and meat.  She hopes that these purchases will improve her eatery and that she will be able to cover all the orders she receives.

Elsa dreams of having a larger eatery, her own home and she would like to help her daughter with her studies.

loans.use: To buy supplies for preparing her meals

loans.name: Magaly

texts.es: Magaly tiene 22 años, vive con sus padres en una casa arrendada. Hace más de 3 años se dedica a la venta de helados, que ella misma lo elabora en casa de sus padres. Ahí formó su propia microempresa, asimismo su productos es distribuido a los vendedores que trabajan para ella. Por otro lado, Magaly vende estos helados en las afueras de un centro educativo. Sus mayores ventas son la época de verano, pero durante la temporada de invierno se dedica a la agricultura, así no deja de percibir sus ingresos. Se siente muy motivada en realizar su negocio porque es rentable, por lo que se proyecta en adelante producir más helados e intensificarse en el negocio de venta de helados. Es su primer crédito que tiene con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas que conoce, responsables y muy solidarias, agradece a todas las personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será muy útil en el progreso de su actividad económica. Con el crédito que solicita, lo utilizará para abastecerse al por mayor de ingredientes  necesarios para la elaboración de helados.
texts.en: Magaly is 22. She lives with her parents in a rented home. For over three years she has made ice cream herself in her parents' home. There she formed her own business, and her products are distributed to sellers who work for her. She also sells these ice creams outside of a school. Her greatest sales are in the summer, but during the winter she works as a farmer in order to maintain an income. She feels very motivated to do her business because it is profitable, and in the future she expects to make more ice cream and strengthen her ice cream sales business. This is her first loan with MFP, and she is very happy to know that she has financial support. She is grateful to be part of her community bank because all of the members are people whom she knows. They are responsible and very united. She thanks everyone who will lend toward this loan, as it will be very useful in the progress of her business. With the loan that she is requesting, she will stock up on the necessary wholesale ingredients to make ice cream.

loans.use: to stock up on ingredients for making ice cream.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: David

texts.es:
Desde hace 22 años David V. se desempeña como vendedor ambulante de dulces, mecato y cigarrillos, con su negocio le brinda a su familia la posibilidad de tener el sustento diario.

David quiere que su negocio tenga mayor surtido de productos y de esta manera puede conseguir nuevos clientes y para esto requiere de un crédito que le permita comprar los productos para vender.

Su sueño es tener una tienda mixta con una gran variedad de productos y esto lo podrá hacer solo cuando su actual negocio comience a crecer y a ser mas reconocido por los clientes.
texts.en: For 22 years David V. has worked as a street vendor, selling candy, lunches and cigarettes. With his business, he provides his family the possibility of having their daily bread. David wants his business to be better stocked with products in order to gain new customers, and for this he needs a loan to buy products to sell. His dream is to have a mixed store with a large variety of products. He will only be able to do this when his current business starts to grow and be known by customers.

loans.use: to purchase inputs

loans.name: Irma

texts.es: Irma tiene 63 años, vive con su esposo y una D. sus 4 hijos en su casa propia. DesD. hace 3 años se dedica D. manera formal a la elaboración D. productos lácteos como yogurt, queso y mantequilla con ayuda D. su esposo y su hija que es ingeniera en industrias alimentarias. Es así como elaboran sus productos con los estándares D. calidad y D. higiene que se requiere para estos productos, resultado D. este trabajo bien elaborado ha logrado conseguir clientela fija que viven dentro D. su localidad y que periódicamente hacen sus pedidos; además D. recomendar sus productos a otras personas. Esto le permite crecer D. manera sostenida en su negocio y le da mucha satisfacción D. ver la rentabilidad que tiene y que promete en adelante aumentar su producción y  descubrir nuevos mercados D. venta. Es su primer crédito con MFP, esta muy contenta D.  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero para su negocio y agradece  a aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será  muy útil en el progreso D. su actividad económica. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra D. materiales D. construcción para la ampliación D. su local D. fabricación D. sus productos.
texts.en: Irma is 63. She lives with her husband and one of their 4 children in their own home. For 3 years she has maD. milk products such as yogurt, cheese and butter with the help of her husband and daughter, who is a food industry engineer. They make their products with the required standards of quality and hygiene, and the result is a job well done. They have gained a fixed customer base within their area who make orders periodically and also recommend her products to other people. This allows the business to grow sustainably and she gets a lot of satisfaction from seeing the business' profitability, which promises that in the future her production will increase and she will discover new markets. This is her first loan with MFP, and she is very happy to know that she has financial support for her business. She thanks those who will lend toward this loan, as it will be very useful in the progress of her business. With the loan that she is requesting, she will invest in the purchase of construction materials to expand her factory.

loans.use: to purchase materials to expand her milk product factory

loans.name: Orlandine

texts.es:
Orlandine es un padre de familia de 59 años de edad que reside junto a su esposa en el sector Sequiones del distrito de Túcume. Una zona agrícola habitada por personas humildes y bastante trabajadoras. La localidad pertenece a la provincia de Lambayeque y se encuentra situada a media hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Orlandine ha trabajado desde muy joven en labores asociadas a la agricultura,actualmente cuenta con un terreno de cultivo de dos hectáreas, en el cual suele sembrar diversos productos, entre granos y cereales. El depende de los ingresos que le brinde esta actividad para sacar adelante la economía de su familia. 

Orlandine ha instalado en esta ocasión un cultivo de maíz y se encuentra trabajando arduamente para lograr una buena cosecha. El desea brindar mantenimiento a sus cultivos para asegurarse una buena producción y el sustento de su familia. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles que contribuyan al logro de su objetivo.
texts.en:
Orlandine is a 59 year-old father who lives with his wife in Sequiones sector, in Túcume district.  This is an agricultural area inhabited by humble and hard-working people.  It is in Lambayeque province, one hour from the city of Chiclayo.

Orlandine has been working in farming since he was very young.  He currently has a two hectare plot of land where he grows crops such as grains and cereals.  He depends on the income he makes in this business to help get his family ahead financially.  Orlandine is currently sowing his corn crop and is hard at work so that he can manage a good harvest.  He would like to maintain his crops so that they grow well and so that he is able to support his family.  For this reason, he is requesting a loan for 2,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa to help him achieve his goal.

loans.use: To maintain his corn crop

loans.name: María De Transito

texts.es:
María del Tránsito tiene 64 años D. edad, es casada y resiD. junto a su esposo en el distrito D. Pueblo Nuevo, una zona que tiene a la mayor parte D. su población situada en áreas urbano marginales.  Se encuentra ubicada en la provincia D. Ferreñafe, a más D. veinte minutos D. la ciudad D. Chiclayo.

Ella cuenta con una pequeña bodega instalada en su vivienda en donD. ofrece en venta a sus clientes diversos productos D. uso diario, entre productos D. primera necesidad y abarrotes. Ella trata D. ofrecer productos D. buena calidad y brindar un trato amable. El negocio ya cuenta con tres años D. funcionamiento y durante todo este tiempo ha podido captar una clientela estable, la cual siempre acuD. a su establecimiento a adquirir los productos que necesitan.

María desea adquirir más productos para ampliar su bodega y poder satisfacer la demanda con la que actualmente cuenta. Por ello ha decidido solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 1000 nuevos soles que contribuyan al logro D. su objetivo.
texts.en:
María del Tránsito is 64 years old. She is married and lives with her husband in the district of Pueblo Nuevo, where most of the population lives in poorer urban areas. Pueblo Nuevo is located in the province of Ferreñafe, more than twenty minutes away from the city of Chiclayo.

She has a small store in her own home where she offers her clients a variety of everyday products, including staples and groceries. She tries to offer good quality products and proviD. a friendly service. The business has been operating for three years and during this time she has been able to attract a steady customer base, who always goes to her store purchase the products they need.

María wants to buy more products to expand her store and meet the current demand. Therefore, she is requesting a loan of 1000 soles to Edpyme Alternativa that will contribute to her goal.

loans.use: Buy more products to expand her store and meet the current demand.

loans.name: Guillermina

texts.es: Guillermina tiene 45 años vive con sus 3 hijos en su casa propia. Desde hace 5 años tiene su negocio en su propia casa, donde vende productos de primera necesidad, asimismo vende jugos de fruta que ella misma prepara así como comida, en la que incluye las parrillas de carne o pollo siendo estos alimentos expendidos por la tarde. Su gran ventaja es la ubicación de su negocio, ya que se encuentra en una zona muy transitada y comercial. Una de sus hijas la ayuda en la atención de su negocio y todos los días sin descansar  trabaja para tener las ganancias necesarias que le permitan sostener la economía de su hogar. Se siente muy satisfecha con su trabajo porque  tiene las ganancias  necesarias y tiene deseos de crecer, una de sus metas es mejorar la infraestructura de su local comercial para continuar con sus negocios. Es su primer crédito que tiene con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas que conoce, responsables y muy solidarias, agradece  a todas las personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será  muy útil en el progreso de su actividad económica. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de más mercadería para su tienda y mejorar su parrilla donde prepara comida.
texts.en:
Guillermina is 45 years old and lives with her 3 children in her own home. For the last 5 years she has been running a business from her home, selling staples, fruit juices she makes herself and also food in the afternoon, including barbecued beef and chicken. Her business has the advantage of being located in a very busy shopping area. One of her daughters helps her run the business and she works tirelessly every day to obtain the necessary income to financially maintain her home. She is very pleased with her job beause she earns enough. She would also like to expand the business; one of her goals is to improve the infrastructure of the premises. 

This is her first loan with MFP. She is very happy to know she will have financial backing. She also enjoys being part of her communal bank because all members are people she knows, responsible and very supportive. She would like to thank everyone contributing to the loan requested, as it will be very useful to advance her business. She will invest the loan in the purchase of more merchandise for the shop and the improvement of the grill where she prepares the food.

loans.use: Buy products to stock up her shop.

loans.name: Mariela

texts.es:
Mariela tiene 21 años de edad, es soltera y reside junto a sus padres y hermanos en  uno de los caseríos que conforman el distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, una zona de clima semitropical que produce principalmente frutas como el mango, la maracuyá y el limón. Pertenece a la región Piura y se encuentra ubicada a cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.
