Se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza y cosméticos por catálogo, ella cuenta con un grupo de clientes que le compran sus productos con frecuencia, mientras más pedidos le realizan obtiene mas puntos de parte de la empresa que le provee los productos y por consiguiente obtiene mayores ganancias. Por este motivo ella siempre se esfuerza por obtener cada vez mas clientes.

Mariela se vale de esta actividad para salir adelante y apoyar a su familia con el sostenimiento de su economía diaria. Ella desea  desea contar con un capital estable para adquirir mas productos y contar con un stock fijo de cosméticos que permita a sus clientes adquirir los productos que necesitan rápidamente y no esperar hasta fin de mes, que es cuando le entregan los pedidos. Por ello ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 500  nuevos soles que le ayuden a conseguir su meta.
texts.en:
Mariela is 21 years old and single. She lives with her parents and siblings in one of the hamlets in the agricultural district of Tambogrande, a semitropical climate zone which mainly produces fruits like mango, passion fruit and lemon. Tambogrande is in the Piura region and is four hours away from the city of Chiclayo, capital of the Lambayeque region.

Mariela sells beauty products and cosmetics through a catalog. She has a group of customers who buy their products often. The more orders she processes, the more perks she gets from the company that provides her with the products, and therefore the greater the profits she makes. For this reason she always strives to get more and more customers.

Through this activity Mariela supports her family´s daily expenses. She wants enough capital to purchase more products and have a fixed stock of cosmetics that will allow her customers to buy the products they need quickly and not have to wait until the end of the month, when the orders are delivered. That´s why she has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 500 soles to help her achieve her goal.

loans.use: Buy more products so as to have a stock of cosmetic products.

loans.name: Dios Proveera 4, 6, 7 Group

texts.en:
Fela plans to use this loan to invest in her business selling miscellaneous products. She will buy clothing, shoes, cosmetics and household products. 

She is excited to be taking her third loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loan and expanded her business. She will use the profits to reinvest in her business and save for her children's education. She wants to have an improved business that gives enough support for her family's needs. 

She is the mother of two children and they live together with her long-term partner. She enjoys cooking special food for her family.

Fela is a member of the group called Dios Proveera 4, 6, 7 (God Will Provide). Her story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Dominican and Haitian clients, many of whom recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti. Her group is located in the rural areas surrounding La Romana, where the economy is dominated by the sugarcane harvest and where running water, none of which is potable, and electricity are unreliable. She makes her home here in a simple structure with her long-term partner and their three children. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy miscellaneous products

loans.name: Duo Solidario El Misperal Group

texts.es: DUO SOLIDARIO EL MISPERAL Doña Marta Lilia J.  A. ,  es una socia que desde varios años comenzó su negocio de venta de verduras y frutas en el mercado local de su comunidad solo en los días de mercado, al pasar del tiempo conoció  a Fape y lleva cuatro ciclos trabajando  y ha demostrado mucha responsabilidad actualmente es la presidenta del banco comunal y vende frutas y verduras por mayor en el mercado minerva , al igual que doña Maricela  es una socia que se dedica a la venta de flores y arreglos florales  en el mercado donde amablemente sirve a sus clientes  dándoles diversos diseños de arreglos en su comunidad, aparte de eso se dedica a arreglos  florales para ocasiones especiales tales como boda y quince años y han logrado crecer gracias a la confianza que Fape les ha brindado.
texts.en:
Solidarity Group - El Misperal

Marta Lilia J. A. set up her business selling fruit and vegetables several years ago.   She sells in her local market on market days.  Over time, she came to hear about FAPE and she has now been working with them for four loan cycles.  She has been very responsible in making her loan repayments.  She is currently the president of her community bank and sells fruit and vegetables wholesale in Minerva market.

Maricela's business is selling flowers and flower arrangements in the market where she serves her customers in a very friendly way, providing them with different designs and arrangements.  She also makes flower arrangements for special occasions such as weddings and 15th birthday celebrations.  The two ladies have managed to grow their businesses thanks to the trust that FAPE has placed in them.

loans.use: To buy fruit and vegetables. To sell flower arrangements

loans.name: Danilo Jose

texts.es:
Danilo es un joven de 23 años de edad, casado, con un hermoso hijo. Tiene su propio negocio una pulpería que inicio hace dos años, con dinero de su liquidación de su trabajo anterior.

Pues invirtió en una pequeña pulpería, vendiendo de todo un poco con poca cantidad, con el objetivo de captar clientes. Es por eso busca alternativa que le ayude a incrementar de inventario, mediante un financiamiento, en donde es Afodenic quien da el apoyo económico y un plazo satisfactorio para cumplir con el plan de pago.
Con esta inversión espera mejorar los niveles de venta. Comprara productos de consumos como quintales de arroz, frijoles, azúcar, maíz, bidón de aceite, productos lácteos, golosinas productos que se venden mucho lo que rota su dinero para un equilibrio en su negocio.
texts.en:
Danilo is a young man of 23.  He is married and has a beautiful child.  He owns his own business, a grocery store, which he set up two years ago with the redundancy money he received from his previous job.  He invested his money in a small grocery store where he sells a little of everything with the aim of attracting customers.  He is looking for a way to help him to increase his inventory.  This is why he is requesting a loan from Afodenic who provide him with financial support and a reasonable repayment schedule.

Danilo hopes to use this investment to improve his sales levels.  He will buy products such as 100kg sacks of rice, beans, sugar and corn, a can of oil, dairy products, candies and other products that sell well.  This helps rotate his money and keeps his business balanced.

loans.use: To invest in buying products to increase his sales levels

loans.name: Janneth Del Rocio

texts.es:
Janneth de 47 años, ha trabajado vendiendo ropa para poder ayudarle a su esposo con los gastos familiares. Viviendo en una casa de ladrillos y cemento con su esposo ubicado en la Primavera de Duran (zona periurbana, con una ecología en disolución a las afuera de Guayaquil). Vende ropa a sus vecinos y conocidos hace tiempo para ayudar a su esposo con los gastos familiares.  Para tener más ingresos también los fines de semana trabaja en una camaronera.     

Uno de sus objetivos es tener su casa bien construida por eso quiere el préstamo para comprar cemento, arena. En el futuro quiere terminar de construir su casa.
texts.en:
Janneth is 47 years old and has worked selling clothing to be able to help her husband with the household expenses. She lives in a brick and cement house with her husband in the Primavera de Duran area (a suburban area, with a deteriorating environment on the outskirts of Guayaquil). She has sold clothing to her neighbors and acquaintances for a while in order to help her husband with the family expenses. In order to have greater income, on the weekends she also works in shrimp plant.

One of her goals is to have a well-built house so she would like a loan to buy cement and sand. In the future she wants to finish building her home.

loans.use: Cement and sand

loans.name: Maria Del Rosario

texts.es:
María es una pequeña comerciante, que inicio su negocio hace varios años con la venta de ropa nueva y usada, comprando las pacas en donde viene una variedad de ropa. Iniciando con ahorros de su trabajo en lavado y planchado a domicilio.
Pues ha tenido que trabajar mucho ya que no cuenta con el apoyo del padre de sus dos hijas.
Este es su segundo préstamo en Afodenic en donde seguirá invirtiendo en ropa nueva y usada, ya que se vende más por su bajo costo. Ventas que hace en los departamentos del norte de Jinotega, Somoto ya que ha captado clientela así como mejores ganancias ya que la venta es buena.
texts.en:
María is a small businesswoman who began her business years ago selling new and used clothing, buying a variety of clothing by the bundle, beginning with savings from her work washing and ironing clothing as a home laundry service.

She has had to work a lot as she does not have the support of her two daughter’s father.

This is her second loan with Afodenic, which she will invest in new and used clothing, as she sells a lot due to her low prices. She sells in the northern states of Jinotega and Simoto as she has gained customers there resulting in the best earning as the sales are good.

loans.use: Buy a variety of new and used clothing

loans.name: Ryad

texts.en: Ryad is a 53 year-old married man, living and working in Baalbeck, Ryad. He has owned a clothing shop since 1997 and is requesting a loan from A. majmoua for the first time, in order to buy new collections. Ryad’s work is improving day after day and all his clients recommend dealing with him. In this Holy season Ryad was generous with his clients and offered speciA. prices and offers that attracted many new ones who couldn’t refuse such offers. Ryad hopes to stay successful and meet his customers' needs.

loans.use: To buy new collections of clothing

loans.name: Francisca Del Socorro

texts.es: Todos los días Francisca labora en su propio negocio, que es la venta de repostería. Así es como recibe mejores ingresos para subsistir diariamente y aportar a su hogar, pues tener  hijos implica una lucha constante para salir adelante. Desde hace 5años tomó la decisión de convertirse en microempresaria y aportar con su trabajo a los ingresos del hogar, pues cada vez se hacía más difícil la subsistencia. El motivo del financiamiento es para la compra materia prima necesaria para su negocio. Francisca espera mejorar sus ventas y aumentar sus ingresos familiares.
texts.en: Every day Francisca works in her own business, where she sells baked items. This is how she makes an income for her daily subsistence and to support her household, since having children means a constant struggle to get ahead. Five years ago she made a decision to become a businesswoman to make an income for her household, since subsistence was getting more and more difficult. This loan will be used for basic materials that she needs for her business. Francisca hopes to increase her sales and increase her familial income.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Samir

texts.en: Samir is a 46-year-old married man who owns a car accessories shop.  Samir is requesting a loan from the Kiva partner Al Majmoua to buy necessary merchandise for his business.  Samir is a hard worker and his honesty is remarkable.  Samir’s main targets are to expand his business, improve his family’s social and financial situation, and provide education in the best university in town for his children.  As compared to his competitors, Samir provides good customer service, quality, and competitive prices.

loans.use: To buy necessary merchandise for his car accessories shop

loans.name: Segundo Rumaldo

texts.es:
Segundo Rumaldo G. R. tiene 33 años de edad, Vive en Unión Libre junto a la compañera y a los hijos en el Cantón chillanes Provincia de Bolívar. Tiene 2 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. TRES DE NOVIEMBRE, Esta compuesta por 28 socios y esta a 90 minutos de  la oficina se encuentra dentro de los límites del Cantón Chillanes. Esta Ventanilla se dedica labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de arroz, plátano, maíz, cacao, naranja, yuca. Esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Segundo Rumaldo se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de arroz, plátano, maíz, cacao, naranja, yuca. Compra sus productos en Mata de cacao y sus ventas se realizan en el Comercial  Matilde Esther y vende los  productos en Bucay.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para el cultivo de arroz, plátano, maíz, cacao, naranja, yuca Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es seguir trabajando y educar a sus hijos

Le gusta el deporte.
texts.en: Segundo Rumaldo G. R. is 33 and in a common-law marriage. He lives with his partner and children in the Chillanes Canton, Bolivar province. He has 2 children. The V.R.C. Tres de Noviembre is made up of 28 members and is located 90 minutes from the office, within the limits of the Chillanes Canton. This region is dedicated to short-cycle agricultural labour; the sowing of rice, bananas, corn, cocoa, oranges and yucca. They spend a lot of time doing this work. Rumaldo works in agriculture, sowing rice, bananas, corn, cocoa, oranges and yucca. He purchases his products in Mata de Cacao and sells in the Matilde Esther Market and in Bucay. He is requesting this loan to purchase agricultural inputs and fertilizers for the cultivation of rice, bananas, corn, cocoa, oranges and yucca. The support of this loan will help him economically to supply his needs. He confronts challenges such as plagues, diseases and the varied climate. His dream is to contiune working and to educate his children. He enjoys sports.

loans.use: agricultural inputs and fertilizers

loans.name: Mario Del Carmen

texts.es:
El Señor Mario C., tiene 27 años de edad, vive en la Comarca Namanji, en Estelí, con más de 10 años de experiencia en el sector agrícola.
El recuerda que empezó desde los 10 años de edad ayudando a sus padres a limpiar frijoles. Dejo de estudiar cuando apenas estaba en 2do grado de primaria; Luego su padre falleció cuando el tenia 13 años de edad y tuvo que seguir trabajando duro para ayudarle a su mama.
A los 20 años de edad se caso, pero siguió viviendo con su Mama para ayudarla, fueron sembrando poco a poco repollo, cebolla, chiltoma, y recogiendo dinero para seguir mejorando. A invertido en algunas maquinarias como: pozo, regaderos… etc.
Realizo este crédito para la siembra de cebolla en especial, pero desea mejorar poco a poco la variedad de cultivo. Espera obtener buenos resultados de esta siembra, en especial que el producto sea de mayor calidad para venderlo a un mejor precio.
Sus metas son seguir mejorando su calidad de vida y ayudar a sus hijos a que sigan estudiando y puedan tener un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Mario C. is 27 and lives in Comarca Namanji, in Esteli, he has more than 10 years of experience in the agriculture industry.

He remembers starting when he was 10 years old helping his parents clean beans.  He quit studying when he was only in 2nd grade of elementary, his dad passed away when he was 13 and he had to work hard to help his mom.

When he was 20 he got married, but continued to live with his mom to help her, they started growing little by little, cabbage, onion, 
sweet pepper, making some money for betterment. He has invested in some technology such as a well, irrigation system, etc.

He requested this loan to particularly grow onion, but he wants to improve the variety of his crops little by little.  He hopes to get good results from this crop and get a better quality product so he can sell it at a higher price.
His goals are to continue improving his quality of life and help his children study so they can have a better future.

loans.use: To grow onion

loans.name: Jose Ramon

texts.es: Hace 10 años José Ramón que tiene su negocio que es brindar el servicio de triciclo y una pulpería. Ha buscado la forma de salir adelante con su negocio, Fue entonces cuando en su afán de salir adelante y generar sus propios ingresos, decidió empezar a este medio de vida. Su negocio ha crecido de manera considerable, teniendo la fortuna de conseguir nuevos clientes es por ello precisamente, que requiere de un crédito para realizarle mejoras  a su triciclo para brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes.
texts.en: For 10 years José Ramón has had his business offering a bike service and running a convenience store. He has been looking for a way to get ahead with his business, and from his desire to get ahead and make his own income he decided to start this style of life. His business has grown considerably, and he has had the good luck to get new customers. For this reason, he needs a loan to make improvements to his bike in order to offer a better service to his customers.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Lucerito De Jose Galvez Group

texts.es: Gloria tiene 50 años D. edad, participa en EDAPROSPO desD. hace seis años, es la tesorera D. la Alcancía Comunal “Lucerito D. José Gálvez.” ella es casada tiene 4 hijos, los cuales son mayores D. edad. Se dedica a la venta D. diferentes productos pero especialmente los productos Unión (panes, pasteles, galletas) y detergentes, ella se encarga D. repartir a sus  clientes fijos para luego pasarles a cobrar semanalmente. Con los ingresos D. este negocio ayudó a su esposo a comprar una moto taxi para alquilar. Ella solicitó el préstamo a EDAPROSPO para comprar cerveza y ropa para  venderlos por año nuevo. El sueño D. Gloria es poner una bodeguita en su casa.
texts.en: Gloria is 50 and has been participating in EDAPROSPO for six years. She is the treasurer of the Lucerito D. José Gálvez Community Bank. She is married and has 4 grown children. She sells different products but especially Unión products (breads, cakes and cookies) and detergents. She distributes to her regular customers and they pay weekly. With the income from this business she helped her husband to buy a new taxi car to rent. She is requesting a loan from EDAPROSPO to buy beer and clothing to sell for the new year. Gloria's dream is to open a bar in her home.

loans.use: to purchase beer and clothing to sell in the new year

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es: Rosa María es una mujer muy emprendedora y disfruta mucho de obtener este medio de vida. Esta no es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos pues con mucho esfuerzo ha salido adelante. Desde hace más de 12 años que se dedica a este negocio, que es la venta de ropa pues con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado salir adelante, se siente muy contenta de tener esta oportunidad con este crédito es la compra de pantalones, camisas, faldas, pantalones y ropa en general, para esta temporada festiva.
texts.en: Rosa María is a very enterprising woman who benefits greatly from this lifestyle. This is not the first time that she has taken out loans, and she has gotten ahead with lots of work. For over 12 years she has had this business, which is clothing sales. With a lot of work, she has gotten ahead. She is very happy to have this opportunity. With this loan she will purchase pants, shirts, skirts, pants and general clothing for this festive season.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: La Sra. Juana vive en la zona de la villa 1ro. De mayo, es casa propia donde vive junto a su hija. La Sra. Juana esta en su segundo ciclo en la institución, donde ha demostrado un buen comportamiento de pago. Ella alquila cuartos en sus domicilio y también tiene su venta de asaditos en el colegio que esta cerca de su domicilio. El crédito que esta solicitando es para la compra de insumos como fideos, arroz, papa, aceite, para la elaboración de sus platillos ya que por estas fiestas de fin de año se va a dedicar a la venta de comida. La Sra. Juana es trabajadora y responsable.
texts.en: Mrs Juana lives in the Villa Primero de Mayo zone. She lives in her own home with her daughter. Juana is in her second loan cycle with the institution, where she has demonstrated herself to be responsible with repayments. She rents rooms in her home and also sells roasts in the school near to her home. The loan that she is requesting is for the purchase of items such as noodles, rice, potatoes and oil for making her dishes, since at the end of the year she is going to focus on making food. Juana is hard-working and responsible.

loans.use: the purchase of tools for making roasts and roasted peanuts

loans.name: Laura Maria

texts.es:
Laura de 42 años, es una mujer trabajadora que con esfuerzo y ayuda de su esposo ha mantenido a sus dos hijos. Viviendo en una zona periurbana llamada Paraíso trabaja como profesora en una escuela pequeña que administra (sus alumnos aparecen en la foto). 

Hace 7 años atrás comenzó a trabajar dando clases en la escuela a niños de 6 a 9 años. Poco a poco con ayuda de su esposo continuo en la escuela ya que las pensiones que pagan son muy económicas y también porque los padres de los niños no pagan puntuales las mensualidades. Actualmente solo trabaja con tres maestros en los tres cursos que hay. La escuela es fiscal y se llama Almendor Surcos. 

Quiere continuar con su trabajo por lo que quiere ayudar adecuando la escuela comprando con el préstamo cemento, pintura, arena y así los niños se sientan más cómodos. En el futuro quiere tener una de las mejores escuelas diversificarlas con aulas practicas.
texts.en: Laura, age 42, is a hard-working woman who, with a lot of effort and the help of her husband, has been able to support their two children. They live in a periurban zone called Paraiso. She works as a teacher in a small school that she runs (her students appear in the photo). She started giving classes in the school to children ages 6 to 9 seven years ago. Bit by bit, with her husband's help, she continued with the school. The tuition that the families pay is very reasonable and the parents do not pay the monthly fees punctually. She currently only works with three teachers in the three courses that the school has. The school, called Almendor Surcos, is supported by the state. Laura wants to continue with her work, so she wants to help improve the school. With this loan she will purchase cement, paint and sand so that the children will feel more comfortable. In the future she wants to have one of the best schools and diversify it with  more classrooms.

loans.use: cement, paint and sand

loans.name: G.s. Las Chacaras Group

texts.es: Este grupo lleva por nombre Las Chacaras, los integrantes del grupo decidieron ponerle este nombre porque así se llama el municipio donde viven. Son personas que se conocen de hace muchísimo tiempo. Marcia Mercedes se dedica a una pulpería, hace más de 10 años que tiene este negocio pues es una persona muy inteligente al pensar en una forma de obtener ingreso para su hogar. Doña Maria Luisa decidió iniciar con este negocio de ventas de frutas  por que tenia la necesidad de mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia, y sacar a sus hijos adelante, ya que no tenía la solvencia económica suficiente para conseguir darles una mejor educación a sus hijos y apoyar a su esposo con los gastos de la casa.  Juntas se han unido para realizar mejorar en su negocio por medio del financiamiento.
texts.en: This group's name is "Las Chacaras", the members of the group decided to use this name because that is the name of the municipality where they live.  The members have known each other for a long time.  Marcia Mercedes has a general store, she's had this business for more than 10 years, she is an intelligent person that thought of a way to make income for her home.  Maria Luisa decided to start the business of selling fruit because she needed to improve her quality of live and her family's to get her children ahead because she didn't have enough solvency to provide her children with a better education and to support her husband with the home expenses.  They have united to improve their businesses through this loan.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Giovanna

texts.es: La Sra. Giovana se dedica al comercio de ropa de bebe ya hace aproximadamente 8 años, este negocio nació por la necesidad de  poder aportar en la familia con un negocio ya que el dinero no les alcanzaba y ella quería sobretodo ayudar al esposo quien es chofer de minibús. La cliente necesita el dinero para poder comprar ropa de bebe por docena y así  ampliar su capital en esta época de navidad y poder generara mayor ingreso, es una persona muy responsable y trabajadora, esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Mrs. Giovana has sold baby clothing for approximately 8 years. This business was born of the necessity to support her family with a business, as they did not have enough money and she wanted above all to help her husband, who is a minibus driver. She needs this money to be able to buy baby clothing by the dozen and thus expand her capital in this Christmas season in order to generate more income. She is a very responsible and hard-working person. She is grateful to the institution for the support offered.

loans.use: the purchase of clothing for babies

loans.name: Ada Zila

texts.es: Ada Zila se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general. Tiene mucho tiempo de obtener este medio de vida que para ella es muy importante para proporcionarle a su familia el alimento diario. Hace más de 16 años que tiene experiencia en este negocio, es una persona que siempre está buscando la forma de mejorar sus ingresos. Sus dos hijos que están a su cargo siempre buscan la forma de obtener buenas notas agradeciendo el sacrificio que su madre realiza. El crédito es para la compra de pantalones, calzado, ropa interior entre otras cosas.
texts.en: Ada Zila sells general merchandise. She spends a lot of time doing this, since for her it is very important to offer her family their daily bread. She has had this business for over 16 years. She is a person who is always looking for a way to improve her income. Her two children who are under her care are always trying to get good grades as they are grateful for the sacrifice that their mother makes for them. This loan is for the purchase of pants, shoes and underwear, among other items.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Elena

texts.es: L. sra. Elena García, D. 38 años D. edad es una mujer muy trabajadora, vive en casa alquilada junto a su pareja Frithz D. 41 años y sus 02 queridos hijos  George  D. 11 años y Sofía D. 07 años D. edad, conforman una bonita familia llena D. armonía. El negocio D. Elena, es muy visitado por sus compradores, porque ofrece ropas novedosas D. primera calidad. Su bazar D. ropa esta situado en L. ciudad del distrito D. kimbiri, donD. viene trabajando como 08 años en este negocio; gracias al apoyo D. su pareja elL. pueD. viajar con tranquilidad para adquirir más mercadería para su bazar, es así que su pareja cumple un rol  muy importante en el negocio D. Elena. Este negocio le genera buenas ganancias, gracias a ello pudo comprarse un lote D. terreno donD. más adelante planea construir su casa y brindar una mejor calidad D. vida a sus hijos. Con el tiempo espera ampliar su stand D. ropa y así satisfacer las peticiones D. su clienteL.. Es su segundo crédito con MFP y asegura que no dejará D. pagar sus cuotas, En su banco comunal es una socia muy venerada por aportar ideas. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará más mercadería para abastecer  su negocio y desarrollarse en este rubro.
texts.en:
Elena García is 38 years old.  She is a very hard-working woman who lives in a rented house together with her partner, 41 year-old Frithz, and their two beloved children: 11 year-old George and 7 year-old Sofia.  Theirs is a beautiful family which is full of harmony.

Elena's business is very popular with her customers because she offers good-quality, fashionable clothes.  Her clothes stall is located in the city, in  Kimbiri district.  She has been working in this business for 8 years.  Thanks to her partner's support, she can travel peacefully to acquire more merchandise for her business.  Her partner plays a very important role in Elena's business.

This business makes Elena good profits which has enabled her to buy a plot of land where she later plans to build a house and proviD. her children with a better quality of life.  Over time, she hopes to expand her clothes stand and thereby satisfy her customers' demands.

This is Elena's second loan with MFP and she assures us that she will not fail to make her repayments.  She is a very well respected member of her community bank as she brings many ideas to it.  She will use her loan money to buy more merchandise with which to stock her business and make progress.

loans.use: To buy more clothes to satisfy her customers' demands

loans.name: Girasoles Group

texts.es:
El Banco comunal GIRASOLES, en su ciclo 12, está conformado por 11 clientes, 10 mujeres y 1 varón, la mayoría D. las socias pertenecen a la Zona D. Villa Salomé, que están ubicados ingresando por Alto Pampahasi. Las socias se dedican a la venta D. diversos productos como ser, venta D. abarrotes y víveres en tienda D. barrio, venta D. comida, venta D. verduras, venta D. cosméticos, venta D. ropa y libros, también se dedican a la costura D. polleras y tejidos D. ropa En la secuencia anterior todas cancelaron muy bien con pequeños problemas D. una socia los cuales fueron solucionados D. inmediato. 
La Sra. Felicidad  Es la líder del banco comunal, actualmente toma el cargo D. presidenta  se dedica a la costura D. polleras en su mismo domicilio y a la  venta D. otros productos en tienda D. barrio, cuenta con esta actividad hace 25 años, el préstamo será destinado a los pedidos D. víveres por mayor como fideos, azucar, arroz, galletas y refrescos. Casada con el señor Félix, que trabaja como mecánico en el mismo domicilio.
En su banco comunal se ha destacado como una persona responsable y puntual en sus pagos, también  dirige D. manera ordenada a su banca pidiendo a sus compañeras responsabilidad con el crédito y puntualidad en los pagos. Asimismo ha sido la presidenta durante varios ciclos.
texts.en:
The GIRASOLES (Sunflowers) community bank is entering its 12th loan cycle.  The group has 11 members: 10 women and 1 man.  Most of the members live in Villa Salomé, in Alto Pampahasi.  The group's members work selling a variety of products such as: groceries and foodstuffs in a neighborhood store, meals, vegetables, cosmetics, clothes and books.  They also work sewing 'polleras' (traditional skirts) and knitting clothes.

During the last loan cycle, all the members of this group paid their loans back on time.  There were a few small problems with one of the members but these were solved immediately.

Felicidad is the leader of this community bank.  She is currently the bank's president.  Her business is sewing 'polleras' (traditional skirts) in her own home.  She also sells products in a neighborhood store.  She has been in this business for 25 years.  Her loan will be used to order foodstuffs wholesale such as noodles, sugar, rice, cookies and soft drinks.  Felicidad is married to Félix who works from home as a mechanic.

Felicidad stands out as a responsible member of her community bank who is always punctual in making her loan repayments.  She leads her bank in an organized way, requesting her fellow members to be responsible with their loans and make their repayments on time.  She has been the bank's president for several loan cycles.

loans.use: To buy foodstuffs to stock her neighborhood store

loans.name: Nelsy Yenireth

texts.es:
La Señora Nelsy Hernández, tiene 21 años de edad, casada, tiene un hijo solamente y vive en la ciudad de Estelí.
Ella es Comerciante, se dedica a la venta de productos Avon, Ella es originaria de la Comarca El Regadío, para mejorar su nivel de vida decidió emigrar a la Ciudad de Estelí; Dejo los estudios por falta de recursos, pues ella proviene de una familia muy humilde, su Papa es Conductor y su Mama Ama de casa; su esposo le ayuda un poco con los ingresos, pues el trabaja en una Fabrica de Puros.
Ella decidió hacer este préstamo para comprar más productos porque su demanda a crecido, sobre todo en estas fechas de diciembre que las ventas son mejores y uno aprovecha para vender mas. 
Su meta es incrementar su negocio y tener casa propia, pues actualmente vive con su suegra.
texts.en:
Nelsy Hernández is 21 years old, married and has one child.  She lives in the city of Estelí.

Nelsy is a saleswoman who sells Avon products.  She is originally from El Regadiío region but in order to improve her living standards she decided to move to the city of Estelí.  She stopped studying through lack of funds as she is from a very humble family.  Her dad is a driver and her mom is a housewife.  Her husband helps her a little with the household income as he works in a cigar factory.

Nelsy decided to take this loan so that she could buy more products because her demand has grown, above all during this month of December.  This is a time when her sales improve and she takes advantage in order to sell more.

Nelsy's goal is to increase her business and buy her own home as she currently lives with her mother-in-law.

loans.use: To buy inventory / Avon products

loans.name: Julia

texts.es: La señora Julia tiene 48 años de edad, es casada con Esteban de 50 años y tienen 03 hijos; viven en su propia casa en el distrito de Ayna San Francisco y es una familia muy feliz. Julia, se dedica al negocio y tiene ingresos distintos; obtenidos de la venta de refrescos de chicha, que ella misma prepara, asimismo vende frutas variadas como: plátano, mango, piña, pacae y cítricos, asimismo vende pan. Esta serie de actividades lo realiza dentro del distrito de San Francisco con ayuda de sus hijos. Julia sabe como administrar su tiempo, madruga a las 04 de la mañana para dirigirse al horno a recoger los panes, luego se dirige a las esquinas para poder venderlos; una vez  culminado con sus ventas, se dirige a su kiosco de frutas, que a la vez también aprovecha en vender sus refrescos; ya que su espacio de frutas es amplio. Su actividad es rutinaria viene  trabajando hace más de 15 años, le encanta este negocio porque gracias a ello pudo sacar profesional a uno de sus hijos. Para el futuro desea abrir una fuente de soda, para aumentar sus ingresos económicos y poder atender a más clientes. Este es su sexto crédito con MFP y asegura que no dejará de pagar sus cuotas, En su banco comunal es una socia muy respetada  por ser muy puntual en sus pagos. Con los tres mil que solicita, comprará lo necesario para aperturar su tienda, una fuente de soda.
texts.en:
Julia is 48 years old.  She is married to 50 year-old Esteban and they have three children.  They live in their own home in Ayna San Francisco district.  Julia's is a very happy family.

Julia makes income from a number of businesses.  She sells 'chicha' (a drink made from corn) which she makes herself and she also sells various fruit such as bananas, mangoes, pineapples, guavas and citrus fruit.  Julia also sells bread.  She carries out these business activities in San Francisco district with the help of her children.  Julia knows how to manage her time.  She gets up at 4.00am and heads for her oven to collect her bread.  She then heads out to the street corner top sell the bread.  Once she has finished making her bread sales, she heads off to her fruit stand where she sells her fruit and also her soft drinks since her fruit stand is quite spacious.

Julia's business is routine.  She has been working for more than 15 years.  She loves her business because it has enabled her to support one of her children in becoming a professional.  In the future, she would like to open a soda fountain in order to increase her income and serve more customers.

This is Julia's sixth loan with MFP and she assures us that she won't fail to make her loan repayments.  She is a very well-respected member of her community bank as she is very punctual with her repayments.  She will use the 3,000 Peruvian soles she is requesting to buy the supplies she needs to open her soda fountain.

loans.use: To buy materials and products to open her soda fountain

loans.name: David

texts.en:
Six years ago, David R. was a contractor building a fourplex apartment building. The laws had recently changed, requiring fourplexes to have sprinkler systems installed.  “There were only five companies that did that between San Antonio, Laredo, and La Isla.  Only one company wanted to come look at my project.” Due to the high demand of this sprinkler installation service and the low supply, companies could get away with overcharging. David decided that he would get certified to install sprinkler systems and charge this service for a more reasonable price. 

David says he charges about a third of what that company charged him for a comparable job. David and his 10 employees now install sprinkler systems and fire protection in private, commercial, and government buildings.

The biggest challenges in this industry are finding credit and funding everything up-front.  “Right now my dream is just to survive.  …It’s very difficult to get credit, so you have to fund everything yourself.”  David’s clients do not pay him until the job is done, or up to 90 days later.  In the past, the people who sold the raw materials would take some of this risk by offering credit. “But now they don’t have inventory… now you go to them and say “I need this and this” and they say ‘good.  Pay me now, and I’ll go get it for you.’ So you become the financier for your clients.  Because you have to go buy the materials and then wait to be paid at the end of the job. You have to start with your money.”

That is not the only reason the industry is so difficult, David says.  “None of the other companies want to help you.  …They never tell you where to start if you want to get certified… and if anyone starts charging a cheaper rate, they start badmouthing them.  That way no one will contract them and the price never lowers.”

David is proud of his work.  “We’ve done about 200 installations. About 99% of our clients are very happy and use us again or recommend us to others.”

This loan will go to buy tubing and other raw materials in order to install sprinkler systems in a 12-story building in La Isla.  David needs to buy the materials up front, “So I’m looking for credit anywhere I can.”
 
Without this loan, David would have to hire fewer workers and take on smaller jobs.  David originally went to a bank, but they said they do not lend for this kind of loan. “A loan to buy a house, yes.  But to buy raw materials?  Not one cent.” 

David hopes that eventually he can get a larger loan or a revolving line of credit.  

David supports his wife and two children with this company. He is from Mexico, but moved to the U.S. 20 years ago.  David describes himself as “a person who wants to help the community but every day it’s more difficult.”  He advises other business owners “don’t spend effort on superfluous things.”

loans.use: To purchase tubing and other raw materials

loans.name: Mayra Alexandra

texts.es:
La Señorita. Mayra C. es socia del banco comunal Atenas, vive por el sector del Carmen de Sinincay en donde su gente se dedica a la agricultura, mucha de su población labora en la ciudad realizando varias actividades.
 
La Señorita Mayra tiene 18 años de edad, es soltera, su papá labora como empleado privado y su mamá trabaja elaborando guaipe (tela para limpiar), no tienen casa propia por lo que viven en casa de un familiar.
 
Nuestra socia estudia en el colegio y va por el último año de bachillerato, es su primer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y con el dinero del crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de tela para la fabricación de guaipe y comenzar en esta actividad.
 
Su meta es ponerse un local de cabinas telefónicas y también brindar el servicio de Internet.
texts.en: Miss Mayra C. is a member of the Atenas community bank. She lives in the El Carmen de Sinicay sector, where the people work in agriculture and a great part of the population works various jobs in the city. Mayra is 18 and single. Her father works as a private employee and her mother makes guaipe (cleaning cloths). They do not have their own home because they live in the home of a family member. She studies in university and is in her final year of a bachelor's degree. This is her first loan with the community bank and with the money she will invest in the purchase of fabric for making guaipe and start this work. Her goal is to open a telephone booth business and also offer an internet service.

loans.use: to purchase fabric

loans.name: Lucila

texts.es: Lucila tiene 41 años de edad, está  casada y vive en su propia casa, tiene cuatro queridos hijos. Juntos viven en la comunidad de Palestina distrito de Kimbiri. Lucila, es una señora emprendedora que junto a su esposo Serapio labran la tierra hace más de veinte años para poder  darle una buena comodidad y educación a sus adorados hijos. En su parcela  tienen las plantaciones de café, cacao, hojas de coca y piña; y en tiempo de cosecha y desmonte de malezas lo realiza con la ayuda de los jornaleros. Considera que el cacao es el producto de su agrado; porque es más rentable, mientras lo venda bien maduros, obtendrá más dinero por sus granos de cacao. Los meses de enero, febrero y marzo son los periodos de lluvia, tiempo que no le deja realizar ninguna actividad. Piensa incrementar más plantaciones de cacao y para lo cual  necesita capital para comprar más hectáreas de terreno. Este es su primer crédito con MFP, por el cual se compromete a pagar puntualmente ya que posteriormente solicitará más préstamos, está satisfecha con la institución ya que le brinda demasiada facilidad. Con el crédito que solicita, piensa invertir en una pequeña bodega, ya que por la zona  que ella habita  casi no existen tiendas, razón por la cual todo los comuneros de la comunidad de Palestina pierden de su valioso día  en viajar hasta la ciudad mas cercana  para comprarse  víveres.
texts.en:
Lucila is 41, married and lives with her four dear children in her own house in the community of Palestina, Kimbri district.  Lucila is an enterpreneurial woman and together with her husband, Serapio, they have farmed for more than twenty years to be able to give comfort and an education to their beloved children.
  In their field they have plantings of coffee, cacao, coca leaves and pineapple.  In the harvest season and when they need to clean out the underbrush,  they work with the help of day laborers.  She thinks that cacao is the best crop because it is the most profitable and when they sell it very ripe, they get more money for the cacao beans.  The months of January, February and March are the periods of rain and she is not able to do any farm work.  She is planning to increase the cacao crop and for this she needs capital to buy more hectares of land.  This is her first loan with MFP and she promises to make the payments on time since she would like to have more loans in the future.  Lucila is happy with the institution since it offers easy terms.  With this loan she would like to have a small store since there are almost none in the area where she lives.  Because of this all of the people in the community of Palestina waste a valuable day when they have to go to the closest city to buy supplies.

loans.use: To buy staples

loans.name: Mariana Elizabeth

texts.es:
La Señora. Mariana Álvarez es socia del banco comunal Atenas y vive por el sector de las Orquídeas, en donde su gente se dedica a la agricultura, mucha de su población labora en la ciudad realizando varias actividades.

Nuestra socia tiene 28 años, es casada y tiene 2 hijos de 7 y 2 años de edad, su primer hijo estudia en una escuela de la ciudad, su esposo labora como empleado privado, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.

Doña Mariana trabaja como secretaria de una empresa de radio taxis, esta actividad la realiza hace 8 años y labora todos los días de la semana con horarios rotativos.

Se encuentra 6 años en el banco comunal y el dinero de su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de víveres para su hogar. Su meta es tener su casa propia.
texts.en: Mrs. Mariana Álvarez is a member of the Atenas community bank and lives in the Las Orquideas sector, where the people work in agriculture and much of the population work various jobs in the city. She is 28, married and has 2 children ages 7 and 2. Her oldest child studies in a school in the city. Her husband works as a private employee. They do not have their own home as they rent. Mariana works as a secretary for a taxi company. She has been doing this for 8 years and works every day of the week on a rotating schedule. She has been part of the community bank for 6 years. She will invest this loan in the purchase of supplies for her home. Her goal is to have her own home.

loans.use: to purchase supplies

loans.name: Fanny Viviana

texts.es:
La Señora Fanny F. es socia del banco comunal Atenas y vive por el sector de Ucubamba, en donde su gente se dedica a la agricultura, mucha de su población labora en la ciudad realizando varias actividades.

La Señora Fanny tiene 26 años, es casada y tiene 2 hijos de 9 y 5 años de edad quienes  estudian en una escuela de la ciudad. Su esposo labora en su taller de aluminio y vidrio, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive en casa de su suegro.

Doña Fanny ayuda  en el taller de su esposo, esta actividad la realiza hace 5 años y cuando tienen obras por entregar trabajan de domingo a domingo sin horario.
 
Es socia de la banca comunal hace 4 años y su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de más aluminio, vidrio y hierro para su taller. Su meta es  tener su taller propio.
texts.en: Mrs. Fanny F. is a member of the Atenas community bank and lives in the Ucubamba sector, where the people work in agriculture and much of the population work various jobs in the city. Fanny is 26, married and has 2 children ages 9 and 5 who are enrolled in a school in the city. Her husband works in an aluminium and class factory. They do not have their own home because they live in her father-in-law's home. Fanny helps out in her husband's workshop. She has been doing this for 5 years, and when they have work for a deadline, she works all week long with no schedule. She has been a member of the community bank for 4 years and she will invest her loan in the purchase of more aluminium, class and iron for the workshop. Her goal is to have her own workshop.

loans.use: to purchase aluminium, class and iron.

loans.name: Solidario Flores De Cruz Blanca Group

texts.es:
GRUPO FLORES  D. CRUZ BLANCA
La señora Felisa P. es la representante del este Grupo D. Mujeres, ella se dedica a  la crianza D. pollos, pero también todos los días viaja para poder vender sus pollos, gallinas, patos, pavos, también ella compra y revenD. estos animales,  su esposo  trabaja D. piloto D. buses y no gana mucho dinero por lo que ella cuenta que con su negocio ella ha sido un apoyo para  sus hijos por lo que  desD. muy temprano se levanta.Solicita el credito para compra y venta D. animales.   Ángela P. se dedica a la venta D. tortillas  el crédito lo necesita para poder comprar maíz y leña para su tortillería, por su parte Mercedes M. venD. ropa típica y  ella quiere aprovechar las fechas D. fin D. año que es cuando sus clientes quieren variedad D. ropa. Las tres señoras están muy contentas D. poder tener acceso a un crédito ya que les permite poder seguir trabajando.
texts.en:
Flores D. Cruz Blanca group

Felisa P. is the representative of this Women's Group.  She raises chickens but also every day she travels to sell her chickens, hens, ducks and turkeys.  She also buys and resells these animals.  Her husband is a bus driver but doesn't earn very much money so Felisa needs her business.  She has been a support for her children so that's why she gets going very early.  She is requesting a loan to buy and sell animals.  Angela P. sells tortillas and she will use the loan to buy corn and firewood for the tortilla shop.  Mercedes M. sells typical clothing and she wants to take advantage of the time at year's end when her customers want a variety of clothes.  The three women are very happy that they have access to a loan that helps them continue working.

loans.use: To buy and sell animals.  To buy corn, firewood, and to buy clothing

loans.name: Lesbia Del Socorro

texts.es: Lesbia tiene 47 años, es una persona muy honesta y delicada. Ella tiene mucho tiempo de trabajar con Fundación. Su negocio es la venta de mercadería en general, ella sale todos los días a ofrecer sus productos sus clientes siempre se encuentran muy contentos pues Lesbia se preocupa por proporcionarle lo que ellos le solicitan. El motivo del financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de materia prima como perfumes, cremas, polvos, pintura de uñas entre otras cosas.
texts.en: Lesbia is 47 years old and is a very honest and dedicated person. She has worked with Fundación for a long time and her business is the sale of general merchandise. She goes out every day to offer her products to her clients who always find themselves very pleased. Lesbia takes extra care to bring the products that they are seeking. The goal of the funding she is seeking is the purchase of fine goods such as perfumes, creams, face powders and nail polish among other things.

loans.use: Purchase of cosmetics merchandise

loans.name: Yovana

texts.es: Yovana  C., de 23 años de edad; es una mujer muy trabajadora. Vive en una casa alquilada junto a su pareja Jhon Yucra de 28 años y sus 03 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. El negocio de Yovana es la venta de ropa, negocio que es muy frecuentado por sus clientes ya que se le considera una persona muy atenta, y siempre esta dispuesta aconsejar a sus clientes sobre el tipo de prenda que debe elegir, de esa manera ellos puedan estar satisfechos con la compra. En esta actividad lo desarrolla a lado de su pareja, trabajando sin para desde hace 05 años. Su negocio es muy rentable por que esta situado en la avenida principal de su ciudad y eso le da mucha ventaja ya que hay mucha afluencia de gente. Su plan a futuro es alquilar un espacio más en el centro comercial, de esa manera logrará aumentar sus ganancias. Este es su 11avo crédito con MFP y asegura que no dejará de pagar sus cuotas, En su banco comunal es una socia muy admirada por su trabajo y por lo puntual que es en sus pagos. Con los 2000 mil que solicita, implementará su negocio con variedad de prendas de vestir, así podrá cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en: Yovana C. is 23 years old and is a very hardworking woman. She lives in a rented house together with her partner Jhon Yucra, who is 28, and her three dear children to whom she desires to give a better quality of life. Yovana's business is a clothing store and it is frequented often by her clients who consider her a very attentive person. She is always available to consult with her customers about the type of clothing that they should choose. In this way they can be satisfied with their purchase. She has worked non-stop to develop this business along with her partner for the past five years. Her business is very profitable because it is situated on the principal avenue of her city and this gives her a big advantage because there are a lot of affluent people in this area. Her plan for the future is to rent a space closer to the commercial center. In this way she will be able to augment her earnings. This is her 11th loan with MFP and she assures that she will not fail to repay the loan. In her communal bank she is a very admired member due to her work and her punctual loan payments. With the 2000 soles she is seeking she will purchase a variety of clothing to keep up with the demand of her customers.

loans.use: Purchase a variety of clothing to keep up with the demand of her clients.

loans.name: Cristo Rey De Nicolas De Pierola Group

texts.es: Ana tiene 49 años D. edad es socia D. la Alcancía Comunal “Cristo Rey D. Nicolás D. Piérola” tiene 3 hijos menores, es enfermera D. profesión (pone inyectables D. forma particular) no lo ejerce debido a que ella desea pasar más tiempo con sus hijos, para lo cual decidió dedicarse a la repostería el ingreso D. este pequeño negocio le permitió comprar los materiales para elaborar tortas como moldes y algunos adornos que puedan llevar dichas tortas. Ella se dedica a esta labor desD. hace  20 años. Ana solicitó el préstamo a EDAPROSPO para comprar más ingredientes y preparar tortas aprovechando las fiestas D. promociones D. los colegios  D. la zona donD. ella vive. Ella sueña con comprarse una cocina con horno que le permita preparar tortas en el menor tiempo posible pero su sueño más codiciado es tener un local y alquilarlo para fiestas y bufetes.
texts.en: Ana is 49 and is a member of the Cristo Rey D. Nicolas D. Pierola Community Bank. She has three young children and is a nurse (doing injections) by profession, but she does not practice because she wants to spend more time with her children. Thus, she decided to work in baking. The income from this small business has allowed her to purchase materials for making pies, such as molds and various decorations for the pies. She has worked in this business for 20 years. Ana is requesting a loan from EDAPROSPO to purchase more ingredients and prepare pies, taking advantage of the upcoming graduation festivities for the schools in the area where she lives. She dreams of buying herself a kitchen with an oven to prepare pies in as little time as possible, but her greatest dream is to have a location and rent it out for parties and dinners.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for pies

loans.name: Zonia

texts.es: Zonia, D. 47 años, es casada con Damián Ochoa D. 50años D. edad,  y fruto D. ese gran amor tienen 04 queridos hijos. Juntos viven en el distrito D. San francisco, departamento D. ayacucho, donD. habitan en su propia casa. Zonia, anteriormente tenía un restaurante donD. se dedicaba por completo, donD. preparaba variedad D. comidas nacionales, sin embargo hace 03 meses le ofrecieron una buena oportunidad económica por el alquiler del espacio que ocupaba dicho negocio. Hoy funciona una tienda D. artefactos, y con el tiempo y D. las ganancias que percibía lograron terminar D. construir su casa D. 03 pisos; siendo el primero y segundo piso alquilados para comercio; pero el tercer piso solo lo ocupa elL. y su familia 4 habitaciones y los 5 que quedan puestas en alquiler. Las rentas le han generado buenos ingresos económicos, es por ello que tiene planeado mejorar las instalaciones D. sus habitaciones. Este es su 16avo crédito con MFP, se compromete a pagar puntualmente, asimismo es una socia responsable y está satisfecha con su banco comunal, por los beneficios que le conceD.. Con los 1000 soles que solicita piensa restaurar los cuartos D. su vivienda y así poder brindar una mejor calidad D. servicios a sus arrendatarios.
texts.en: Zonia, 47, is married to Damián Ochoa , 50, and the fruit of this great love is their 4 dear children.  They live in the San Franciscio district, Ayachucho province, in their own house.  Previously Zonia had a restaurant where she worked full time and where she prepared a variety of national dishes.  Nevertheless, 3 months ago she was offered a good business opportunity, to rent out the space of this business.  Now there is an appliance store there, and with time and her earnings she hopes to be able to finish building her 3 story house.  She would rent the first and second floors for businesses, but on the third floor her family would live in 4 rooms, with the other 5 for rent.  The rents have generated good earnings and that is why she plans to improve the rooms in the house.  This is her 16th loan with MFP and she promises to make all the payments punctually.  She is a responsible member and is happy with her communal bank because of the benefits offered her.  She will use the 1000 sols to fix up the rooms in the house to be able to give better services to her tenants.

loans.use: To fix up the rooms in her house to be able to give a better quality of life to her family

loans.name: Fanny Antonia

texts.es: Fanny Antonia labora en su propio negocio, una pulpería en la que ofrece a sus vecinos golosinas, refrescos, pan, granos básicos entre otras cosas así es como recibe mejores ingresos para subsistir diariamente y aportar a su hogar. Desde hace 2 años tomó la decisión de convertirse en microempresaria y aportar con su trabajo a los ingresos del hogar. El financiamiento que actualmente solicita es para la compra de materia prima, ya que se acercan temporadas festivas.
texts.en: Fanny Antonia works in her own business, a convenience store, where she offers her neighbors candy, beverages, bread, basic grains and other things. This is how she receives income to survive daily and support her home. 2 years ago she decided to become a small businesswoman and use her work to support her home. The financing that she seeks today is to buy items as the holiday season is approaching.

loans.use: Working capital for her business

loans.name: Mujeres Progresistas (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Mujeres Progresistas esta formado por 11 mujeres, quienes luchan día a día en sus trabajos para mejorar la economía de sus hogares y así sacar adelante a sus hijos, viven en diferentes lugares de la ciudad de Cuenca,  esta ciudad  la tercera ciudad  más importante del país, su gente es amable y cordial quienes guardan sus tradiciones y cultura.

La Señora María H. vive por el sector de San Joaquín, se encuentra en su segundo crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y fue invitada por una muy buena amiga quien es socia del banco. Tiene 28 años, es casada y tiene 4 hijos de 11, 8, 5 y 3 años de edad, sus dos primeros hijos estudian en una escuela de la ciudad, su esposo labora en una ferretería, con el sacrificio de su trabajo han logrado construir su casa propia. 
Doña María se dedica hace 3 años al  arreglo de oficinas y casas, esta actividad la realiza 4 días de la semana y no tiene un horario fijo. En su casa se dedica a la cría de animales como cerdos, gallinas y cuyes los que son para su consumo o cuando tiene  alguna necesidad económica los vende. El dinero de su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos y en su alimento para iniciar con este negocio. Su meta es  tener un criadero de pollos muy grande.

La Señora. Marcia S. vive por el sector de la Feria Libre. Tiene 42 años, es madre soltera de 4 hijos de 18, 16, 15 y 2 años de edad, su primer hijo es especial y estudia en una escuela para niños especiales, su segunda y tercer hijo estudian en un colegio de la ciudad. No tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando. 
Doña Marcia está en su tercer crédito y fue invitada por una amiga quien es socia activa del banco comunal. Nuestra socia se dedica a la atención de cabinas telefónicas e Internet, el local es de su propiedad, trabaja de domingo a domingo desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 10 de la noche. El dinero de su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de confitería para la venta en su local. Su sueño es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
The communal bank “Mujeres Progresistas” (Progressive Women) is made up of 11 women who daily fight in their jobs to improve their household economic situations and provide a future for their children. They live in different parts of Cuenca city, the third most important city in the country, whose people are friendly and cordial, keeping their traditions and culture.

Mrs. María H. lives in the San Joaquín area, this is her second loan from the communal bank and she was invited by a good friend who is a member of the bank. She is 28 years old, married, and has 4 children ages 11, 8, 5, and 3. Her first two children student in a school in the city, her husband works in a hardware store, and with sacrifice from their work they have been able to build their own home.

María has been cleaning offices and homes for 3 years, working 4 days a week and she doesn’t have a fixed schedule. At home she raises animals such as pigs, chickens, and guinea pigs for consumption or when needed, she sells them. The money from her loan will be invested in buying chickens and chicken feed to begin with this business. Her goal is to have a very large chicken farm.

Marcia S. lives in the Feria Libre area. She is 42 years old, a single mother of 4 children ages 18, 16, 15, and 2. Her oldest son is special and studies at a school for special children. Her second and third children study in one of the city’s schools. She doesn’t have her own home, she rents.
Marcia is in her third loan cycle and was invited by a friend who is a member of the communal bank. Our member has an Internet and telephone business located on her property. She works Sunday to Sunday from 8 in the morning until 1- at night. The money from her loan will be used to establish a snack shop at her locale. Her dream is to have her own home.

loans.use: Buy chickens and chicken feed

loans.name: Estefania

texts.es: Estefania, de 62 años, enviudo hace 6 años, pero a pesar de ello, ella nunca decayó y siguió adelante en compañía de sus 4 hijos, de los cuales solo vive con 3 de ellos: José, de 34, Andrea, de 33 y Jorge, de 22, en su casa propia ubicada en la ciudad de La Merced (selva central peruana). En Pampa del Carmen, donde se ubica el restaurante de Estefania, los platos exquisitos que prepara, son el deleite de todos los pobladores de su localidad; según menciona en temporadas turísticas, y fechas importantes del país, recibe mucha clientela, tanto así que hay fechas que no se abastece. Ahora Estefania, recibe el apoyo de sus hijos con los cuales pudo abrir una tienda de comestibles, donde vende productos de primera necesidad, y para más adelante sueña con convertirlo en un minimercado. Es la décima vez que trabaja con MFP, y agradece el apoyo recibido por parte de su banco comunal, y a todas las personas que hacen posible la obtención del préstamo. De obtener el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de insumos para surtir su tienda de comestibles, sobre todo en está época de año nuevo, que la demanda es mayor.
texts.en: Estefania, age 62, has been a widow for 6 years; despite this, she has never waned and has kept seeing her 4 children, of whom only 3 live with her in their own home in the city of La Merced (in the central peruvian forest): Jose, age 34, Andrea, age 33, and Jorge, age 22. In Pampa del Carmen, where Estefania's restaurant is located, the exquisite dishes that she prepares are the delight of all the townspeople. She says that she has many customers during the tourist season and on important dates for the country. There are also times when she does not have many customers. Now, with her children's support, she and her children are opening a food store, where she sells basic staples. In the future she hopes to convert it into a minimarket. This is her tenth loan with MFP, and she is grateful for the support of her community bank, and to all of the people who are making it possible for her to obtain this loan. When she obtains this loan, she will invest in the purchase of items to stock her food store, as the demand is greater in the new year.

loans.use: to purchase products to stock her store.

loans.name: Carlos Augusto

texts.es: CARLOS AUGUSTO  tiene 24 años es conviviente hace mas de 7 años tiene 2 hijos menores de edad viven en casa de sus abuelos , se dedica a trabajar como chofer hace mas de 4 años cuentan con buena acumualación de bienes, no tiene experiencia crediticia gozan de buenas referencias personales , tiene aspiraciones a seguir trabajando con la entidad para luego poder solicitar un crédito mayor para la compra de dicho activo fijo (auto tico) solicitan dicho crédito para gastos personales se propone dicho crédito por contar  con capacidad de pago.
texts.en: CARLOS AUGUSTO  is 24 and has been living with his partner for over seven years. He has 2 young children, and they live in the home of their grandparents. He has worked as a driver for over 4 years. He has a good asset accumulation, and has no credit history. He has good personal references and hopes to continue working with the company in order to later request a larger loan for the purchase of assets (a car). He is requesting this loan for personal expenses, and he has the ability to repay it.

loans.use: for personal expenses

loans.name: Bernardo

texts.es: Bernardo, de 59 años, es un empeñoso padre soltero de 8 hermosos hijos, todos ellos mayores y realizados, ahora él vive solo en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de La Merced (selva central peruana). El trabajo arduo que durante más de 25 años dedicó a su taller de mecánica; le permitió educar y sacar adelante a sus hijos, los cuales agradecidos por el apoyo recibido durante todo estos años: lo visitan constantemente para poder aconsejarlo en la mejora de su taller. Lo que más le gusta a Bernardo es reparar los carros que sus clientes le proporcionan, pero como hombre hábil y de muchos oficios; él también incorporó el servicio de cerrajería y carpintería; donde menciona augura un buen futuro, ya que está ampliando su taller con nuevos servicios, los cuales le dan nuevos clientes. Por ello más adelante está pensando ampliar su negocio con personal a disposición para cubrir todas las expectativas de su nueva clientela. Es el octavo crédito con MFP, y como presidente de su banco comunal, es una persona responsable y muy comprometida por el desarrollo y progreso de todos. De adquirir el crédito, podrá comprar materiales para su taller y de esa manera abastecer los pedidos que recibe diariamente.
texts.en: Bernardo is 59, he is a hardworking single dad of eight beautiful children, all of whom are older and accomplished, he now lives by himself in a house he owns, located in La Merced (central Peruvian jungle).   The hard work that during 25 years he dedicated to his mechanic shop allowed him to educate and get his children ahead, his children are thankful for the support given to them during all those years and they visit him frequently and advise him on ways he can improve his shop.  What Bernardo likes the most is repair the cars his clients bring, as a talented man with many trades he also added the service of locksmith and carpentry, where he thinks future will be good because he is expanding his shop with new services which will translate into new clients.  Later on he plans to expand the business with staff to cover any expectations of his new clients.  This is the 8th loan with MFP and as president of the community bank, he is a responsible person and very committed with the development and progress of everyone. With the loan, he will buy items for his shop to fulfill the orders he gets daily.

loans.use: Buy items to implement a mechanic shop

loans.name: Gerardo

texts.es: Gerardo, de 57 años, se separó de su mujer hace 20 años, pero vive en compañía de sus 3 hijos a los cuales cuida, y educa en su casa propia, ubicada en la ciudad de La Merced (selva central peruana). El trabajo que le permitió darle el sustento económico a su familia es el trasporte público. Hace18 años que labora en la empresa de trasporte “Santa Rosa” cubriendo las rutas La Merced-Oxapampa, y según menciona le gusta mucho su trabajo, porque puede conocer nuevos lugares y diferentes personas, ya que a veces cubre las rutas a la ciudad de Pozuzo-La Merced; y aunque a veces le resulta un poco cansado, él, no se rinde pues según sus propias palabras “todo trabajo tiene su lado bueno y malo”. Ahora planea acondicionar su casa para poder comenzar con el negocio de alquiler de cuartos, ya dio el primer paso con el pintado de las paredes de los cuartos y, según afirma le falta muy poco. Es el octavo crédito con MFP, y está segura que podrá salir adelante con la ayuda de su banco comunal, donde le enseñan a proyectarse y ahorrar. De obtener el crédito podrá comprar los materiales necesarios para arreglar el baño de su casa, y de esa manera comenzar con su nuevo proyecto.
texts.en:
Gerardo is 57 years old.  He separated from his wife 20 years ago but he lives with his 3 children who he cares for and educates in his own home, located in the town of La Merced (central Peruvian jungle).

The work which has enabled Gerardo to financially support his family is providing public transport services.  He has been working for the "Santa Rosa" transport company for 18 years, covering La Merced - Oxapampa routes and he tells us that he likes his work a lot because he gets to know new places and different people since he sometimes covers the Pozuzo - La Merced routes.  Although his work is sometimes a little tiring, he does not give up because, in his own words, "every job has its good points and its bad points".

Gerardo is planning to remodel his home so that he can begin to rent out rooms.  He has already taken the first step in painting the walls of the rooms and he says that he doesn't have much left to do.

This is Gerardo's eighth loan from MFP and he is certain that he will be able to get ahead with the help of his community bank where they teach him to plan and save.  Gerardo will use his loan to buy the material he needs to fix up his bathroom and, in this way, begin his new project.

loans.use: To buy material to remodel his bathroom

loans.name: Abraham Josue

texts.es: Abraham tiene 25 años es soltero no tiene carga familiar vive en casa alquilada hace mas de 3 años , tiene una movilidad que  trabaja manejando  tiene buenas referencias personales, no tiene experiencia crediticia gozan de buenas referencias personales , tiene aspiraciones a seguir trabajando con la entidad para luego poder acceder a mas crédito solicita dicho crédito para mantenimiento de dicha movilidad  se propone dicho crédito por contar  con capacidad de pago.
texts.en: Abraham is 25, single and does not have a family burden. He has lived in a rented home for over 3 years. He has a car and works driving it. He has good personal references, and has no credit history. He hopes to continue working with the company in order to be able to access more credit later. He is requesting this loan for the maintenance of his car. He has the ability to repay it.

loans.use: for maintenance for his car

loans.name: Tania

texts.es: Tania, de 42 años, se separó de su esposo hace un año; pero a pesar de los problemas y conflictos, ella trabaja con mucho esfuerzo para cuidar de su hija Aime, de 10 años de edad, con quien vive en una casa alquilada ubicada en la ciudad de La Merced. Está trabajadora mujer que a pesar de los inconvenientes sufridos, continúa trabajando arduamente, pues según menciona quiere ser una mujer independiente y con mucha proyección para el futuro. Hace un año comenzó con el negocio de un locutorio, donde las personas realizan llamadas a diferentes lugares del Perú y del mundo; este negocio le resulta muy rentable, ya que su tienda de servicios está ubicada en una zona estratégica. Tania, menciona también que está pensando comprar la parte de inversión de su socia, con la que puso su negocio de locutorio, y de esa manera no depender de nadie, ella está segura que con el apoyo de su hijo Harry, que trabaja en la capital, podrá lograr esté objetivo. Esté es el séptimo crédito con MFP, y se siente agradecida por todo el apoyo que recibe de parte de los integrantes de su banco comunal. De adquirir el crédito que solicita, implementará su negocio de más cabinas telefónicas.
texts.en:
Tania is 42 years old.  She separated from her husband a year ago.  However, in spite of the problems and difficulties, she works very hard to care for her 10 year-old daughter Aime, with whom she lives in a rented house in the town of La Merced.

This hard-working woman, in spite of the difficulties she has suffered, continues working hard since she says that she would like to be an independent woman and she has a lot of plans for the future.  One year ago she started running a public telephone business where people make calls to different places in Peru and elsewhere in the world.  This business is very profitable since her premises are in a strategic location.

Tania mentions that she is thinking of buying out her partner in her public telephone business so that she doesn't have to depend on anybody.  She is certain that with the support of her son Harry, who lives in the capital, she will be able to achieve this goal.

This is Tania's seventh loan from MFP and she feels grateful for all the support that she receives from the other members of her community bank.  She will use her loan to install mO. telephone booths in her business.

loans.use: To install more telephone booths in her business

loans.name: Jessica Nataly

texts.es:
La Señorita. Jessica V. es socia del banco comunal Buscando el Éxito, vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es reconocida por su cultura y tradiciones, la belleza de esta ciudad cautiva a propios y extraños, cuenta con una gran variedad en su gastronomía, su gente es muy amable y cordial quienes mantienen su cultura y tradiciones.
 
La Señorita. Jessica es soltera y tiene una hija de 4 meses, vive en la casa de sus padres quienes no tienen casa propia y viven arrendando.

Nuestra socia por el momento esta al cuidado de su niña, también cuando puede ayuda a su mamá en la venta de comida. Hace un año se dedica a la venta de cosméticos de la marca Yanbal, es una socia fundadora del banco comunal y el dinero de su crédito lo va  a invertir en la compra cosméticos Yanbal.
 
Su meta es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Miss Jessica V. is a member of the communal bank "Buscando el Éxito" ("In Search of Success"). She lives in Cuenca, a city renowned for its culture and traditions. The scenery of the city captures residents and visitors alike, with its large choice of gastronomy and its very kind and cordial people who keep its culture and traditions alive.

Miss Jessica is single and the mother of a 4-month-old daughter. She lives with her parents who don't own their house, but rent it.

Our member currently looks after her daughter, but she also helps her mother in her food business whenever she can. A year ago she began selling cosmetics of the brand Yanbal. Jessica is a founding member of her communal bank. She will invest the money from her loan in the purchase of Yanbal cosmetics.

Her goal is to have her own house.

loans.use: To buy Yanbal cosmetics

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es: Pedro, de 58 años, está casado con Olivia, de 60 años. Ambos tienen 2 hijos, pero viven solos su casa propia, ubicada en la ciudad de La Merced. Todas las mañanas desde hace 22 años, el restaurante del señor Pedro; ubicado en un lugar céntrico, abre sus puertas para deleitarnos con los ricos platos criollos y típicos del lugar, pues según afirma, la dedicación por sus hijos lo motivó a salir adelante. Ahora él está orgulloso de verlos salir adelante y ser independientes, por todo ello está planeando invertir con su esposa Olivia, en el negocio de arrendamiento de cuartos; con ello espera seguir trabajando, para mantenerse activo y vivir por muchos años, en compañía de sus hijos y nietos. Esté es el noveno crédito con MFP, y como secretario de su banco comunal, es una persona responsable y muy cumplida. De obtener el crédito solicitado, lo invertirá en la construcción de cuartos para implementar su casa en la ciudad de Pichanaki (selva central peruana), donde planea dedicarse al negocio inmobiliario.
texts.en:
Pedro is 58 years old and married to 60 year-old Olivia.  They have 2 children but live alone in their own home which is located in the city of La Merced.  Every morning for the past 22 years, Pedro's restaurant, which is in a central location, opens its doors to delight its customers with the rich creole dishes which are traditional in this area.  Pedro tells us that it was his children who motivated him to get ahead.  Now he is proud to see them getting ahead and being independent.  

Pedro is planning to invest, with his wife Olivia, in the business of renting out rooms.  He hopes that this way he will keep working, keep active and live for many years in the company of his children and grandchildren.

This is Pedro's ninth loan with MFP and, as secretary of his community bank, he is a responsible and very punctual person.  He will invest this loan in building rooms to set up his house in the town of Pichanaki (central Peruvian jungle) where he plans to work in the real estate business.

loans.use: To build more rooms so that he can rent them out

loans.name: Rocio

texts.es: Rocío, de 39 años, convive con Jorge, de 44 años. Ambos tienen un hijo, Jorge, de 18 años de edad. En unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la ciudad de San Ramón (selva central peruana). Rocío pertenece al grupo “Las Magníficas”, este conjunto de mujeres, son totalmente independientes, y ella motivada por ello, hace algunos años en trabajo conjunto consiguió abrir un restaurante donde vende comida criolla, de la misma manera brinda pensión a 15 personas, las que desayunan, almuerzan y cenan; los ricos platos que cocina Rocío, por ello también prepara bocaditos para cualquier ocasión. Pero hace muy poco incursiono en la venta de muebles viajando una vez a la semana para comprar mercadería, los que vende a las personas que conocedoras de su negocio le solicitan constantemente muebles novedosos para adornar sus casas. Por ello más adelante quiere abrir una tienda de muebles grande y espacioso. Es el octavo crédito con MFP, y como una de las socias antiguas de su banco comunal, se siente feliz de pertenecer a un grupo de mujeres independientes y luchadoras. De obtener el crédito podrá comprar más muebles, para abastecer los pedidos de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Rocío is 39 years old and lives with 44 year-old Jorge.  They have one son, 18 year-old Jorge.  They live together in their own home, in the town of San Ramón (central Peruvian jungle).

Rocío belongs to the "Las Magníficas" group.  This group of women are completely independent and Rocío is motivated by it.  She has, for some years, been working jointly with the group and because of this she managed to open a restaurant where she sells creole dishes.  She also provides meals to 15 people who have breakfast, lunch and dinner, enjoying the rich dishes that Rocío cooks.  She also prepares snacks for any occasion.

Very recently Rocío ventured into the furniture sales business, travelling once a week to buy merchandise which she sells to people who know about her business and are constantly requesting new furniture for their houses.  For this reason, in the future she would like to open a large and spacious furniture store.

This is Rocío's eighth loan with MFP and, as one of the longest-standing members of her community bank, she feels happy to belong to a group of independent and hard-working women.  She will use her loan to buy more furniture to fill her customers' orders.

loans.use: To buy more furniture to satisfy her customers' demands

loans.name: Nancy Yolanda

texts.es:
La Señora. Nancy B. es socia del banco comunal Buscando el Éxito, vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es reconocida por su cultura y tradiciones, la belleza de esta ciudad cautiva a propios y extraños, cuenta con una gran variedad en su gastronomía, su gente es muy amable y cordial quienes mantienen su cultura y tradiciones.
