Nancy K. is a 34 year-old single mother supporting two members of her family.  Her children are Collins Amdany, 14 years-old, and Mercy Amdany,10 years-old. She runs a retail shop which has been in operation for five years.  She sells a variety of items including food and clothes.  Her monthly income is Kshs 10,000.

She is borrowing a loan of Kshs 59,000 and she plans to use it to purchase sugar worth Kshs 10,000, clothes for 40,000 Kshs and soap for Kshs 9,000.

Nancy will use the anticipated profit to invest back into the business  This is her fifth loan from Kiva partner KADET LTD after paying back the previous loans successfuly. Her dreams and hopes are to have a big business, to open a wholesale shop and to be able to manage her family well.

loans.use: To buy more stock of sugar,clothes and soap to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy more locks, tea, milk, sugar, etc

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy more spare parts and petroleum products for his business.

loans.name: Grace Kadioli

texts.en:
Grace Kadioli O. is 29 years and married to Andrew Saina. Together they have two young children. They live in Eldoret where Grace has had her business for 10 years, making a monthy income of nine thousand shillings.

This will be Grace's first loan from  KADET LTD and she will use it to buy more clothes. She plans to use the profits to expand her business and make it more stable financially. In future she hopes to open a bigger shop and raise her standard of living.

loans.use: To buy more clothes to sell

loans.name: Paul Etabu

texts.en: Paul Etabu L. is thirty seven years and married to Rose Amlango. They have five children. They live in Eldoret town, where Rose sells roasted maize to contribute to the family's income. Paul has had his motorcycle transport business for ten years and makes a monthly income of fifteen thousand shillings. This will be his first loan from  KADET LTD and he plans to diversify his business and start a grocery shop. In the future he hopes to buy a canoe to fish in Lake Turkana and to educate his children to the highest level.

loans.use: To open a grocery shop

loans.name: Imad

texts.en:
Imad is a young man from Rafah city in Gaza Strip, Imad is married and a father of one son, Wadee, and one daughter, Rinad. Imad is a National Palestinian Authority employee. He was married four years ago and has been purchasing the needed items gradually.

Imad came to FATEN and took a loan to buy a washing machine to replace the old one they had, which was a second hand machine and is not working properly anymore, and other household needs.

Imad appears in the picture here in FATEN's branch.

loans.use: To purchase a washing machine

loans.name: Sarah Wandia

texts.en: Sarah Wandia G. is a 37-year-old woman, married to John Kamondo. They are blessed with two beautiful children. They live in the Roadblock area in Eldoret Town. Sarah buys used clothes in bulk and sells them retail. She has been in this business for 11 years and makes a monthly income of fifteen thousand shillings. With this loan she wants to add to her stock by buying more bails of clothes for resale, and hopes with the income to open another business. Sarah's hope for the future is to build her own shop where she can open a wholesale business and also to raise her family's standard of living.

loans.use: To buy more second hand clothes to sell

loans.name: Mohamed

texts.ar:
محمد في عمر 35 سنة متزوج وله اربع اولاد يعمل في الخردة وتصليح السيارات الخردة يحب عائلته ويسعى 
الى تحسين وضعه المادي يتميز عمله بقلة الاشخاص الذين يعملون في هذا المجال لا ما ينقصه لزيادة مدخوله هو المادة له تاريخ
جيد مع المجموعة وقد تلقى دعم كامل من العائلة يريد من خلال طلب قرض من المجموعة الى شراء الخردة ثم بيعها بالمفرق
يتميز بذكائه في العمل والدقة والصدق والجدية في المعاملة
texts.en: Mohamed is 35 years old. He has four children. Mohamed sells scrap and fixes motor vehicles. He loves his family and seeks to enhance his income. His profession is not very common, and all Mohamed is missing is financial assistance. Mohamed has a good history with Al Majmoua. He has the full support of his family. Through a loan from Al Majmoua, he seeks to purchase more scrap and resell it. He is honest, diligent, serious and clever.

loans.use: To purchase scrap for resale

loans.name: Bilal

texts.ar:
بلال عمره 24 سنة يعمل سائق عام موظف متزوج وله ولدان له في عمله 15 سنة يحب عائلته كثيرا وهي كل اهتامه 
يسعى دائما الى تعليم اولاده بصورة جيد حتى يكونوا ذات مركز جيد في المجتمع طموح ويحب ان يعلم اولاده يعلم بكد
ونشاط لكي يؤمن القوت اليومي له تاريخ جيد في المجموعة كان يلقى الدعم دائما من عائلته وكان له اثر جيد
على زيادة مدخوله يريد ان يؤسس عمل خاص له كفتح محل جديد للأحذية يريد من خلال طلب قرض له من المجموعة
الى شراء بضائع جديدة لفتح محل احذية
texts.en: BilA. is 24 years old and married. He has been working as a driver for 15 years. BilA. loves his family and seeks to educate his children well and enhance their sociA. standing. He is ambitious and works diligently to secure his daily income. BilA. has a good history with A. Majmoua. He has the full support of his family. BilA. seeks to establish a private business. He would like to own a shoe store. Through his loan from A. Majmoua, BilA. wants to purchase new merchandise for his store.

loans.use: To purchase new merchandise (shoes and bags)

loans.name: Paustine

texts.en:
Paustine C. is a 41-year-old single mother supporting four children: Duncan Kiprono 15, Edwin Kiplagat 11, Timothy Kipchumba 10, and Victor Kimutai two. She runs a busines selling milk and green vegetables and also maize farming. She has been in business for three years and earns a monthly income of Kshs 10,400. She is borrowing a loan of Kshs 30,000 to purchase milk, vegetable and maize seeds to plant, and ploughing.

This is Paustine's second loan, having repaid the first one well and on time. Her hope and dream is to be able to purchase a pick-up truck to expand her business and to have additional income for school fees and to improve her family's standard of living.

loans.use: buy more milk to sell

loans.name: Lourdes Rosaura

texts.es:
Lourdes Rosaura P. G. tiene 32 años de edad, Vive en Unión Libre junto a su compañero y sus hijos en el Cantón Chillanes  Provincia de Bolívar. Tiene 2 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. TRES DE NOVIEMBRE, Esta compuesta por 28 socios y esta a 90 minutos de  la oficina se encuentra dentro de los límites del Cantón Chillanes. Esta Ventanilla se dedica labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de arroz, plátano, maíz, cacao, naranja, yuca. Esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Lourdes Rosaura se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de arroz, plátano, maíz, cacao, naranja, yuca. Compra sus productos en Mata de cacao y sus ventas se realizan en el Comercial  Matilde Esther y vende los  productos en Bucay.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para el cultivo de arroz, plátano, maíz, cacao, naranja, yuca Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es ampliar sus cultivos.

Le gusta pasear por la finca junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Lourdes Rosaura P. G. is 32 years old, and she is in a common-law marriage.  She lives with her life partner and their children in the Chillanes canton in the Bolívar province.  She has two children.

The “Tres de Noviembre” (November Third) Communal Bank is comprised of 28 members.  The bank is 90 minutes from the office, and it is in the Chillanes canton limits.  This bank is devoted to short cycle agricultural work.  They grow rice, bananas, corn, cacao, oranges, and yucca.  They have been doing this for a long time.

Lourdes Rosaura grows rice, bananas, corn, cacao, oranges and yucca.  She buys her products in Mata de Cacao.  She makes her sales in the Matilde Esther market, and she sells the products in Bucay.

She is requesting the loan to buy agricultural supplies and fertilizers for her rice, banana, corn, cacao, orange, and yucca crops.  The help from the loan will financially help supply her with the necessities.  They face challenges like pest infestations, diseases, and climate changes.

Her dream is to increase her crops.
 
She likes to take walks on the farm with her family.

loans.use: To buy agricultural supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Francisco Libert

texts.es:
Francisco Libert R. M. tiene 53 años de edad,union libre Vive con la compañera y con los hijos en el Cantón Chillanes  Provincia de Bolívar. Tiene 2 hijos

Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es ampliar sus cultivos. 

Le gusta compartir con los amigos.
texts.en: Francisco Libert R. M. is 53. He is in a common-law marriage and lives with his partner and children in the Chillanes Canton, Bolivar province. He has 2 children. The V.R.C. Tres de Noviembre group has 28 members and is 90 minutes from the office, within the limits of the Chillanes Canton. This region is dedicated to short-cycle agricultural labour; the sowing of rice, bananas, corn, cocoa, oranges and yucca. They spend a lot of time doing this work. Lourdes Rosaura works in agriculture, sowing rice, bananas, corn, cocoa, oranges and yucca. He purchases his products in Mata de Cacao and sells in the Matilde Esther Market and in Bucay. He is requesting this loan to purchase agricultural inputs and fertilizers for the cultivation of rice, bananas, corn, cocoa, oranges and yucca. The support of this loan will help him economically to supply his needs. He confronts challenges such as plagues, diseases and the varied climate. His dream is to expand his cultivation. He enjoys sharing with his friends.

loans.use: agricultural inputs and fertilizers

loans.name: Carmela

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “QORICHUSPA”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Carmela; ella tiene 37 años. La socia es conviviente  y tiene 2 hijos  la socia se dedica al comercio minorista, ella tiene en casa un espacio para hacer manicure a las jovencitas que tienen un evento como una fiesta de promoción, quince años, matrimonios y otros y en su casa ellas las arregla, también la socia realiza caritas pintadas dentro de este espacio y para toda edad, la socia hace a pedido tortas para todo tipo de ocasión, ella es una persona muy trabajadora y confía en su habilidad y desea mejorar su espacio y en un futuro no muy lejano ella quiere poner una tienda en el centro de la ciudad ofreciendo su servicio. La socia desea implementar su negocio para estas fiestas navideñas y año nuevo es por esta razón que ella solicita el préstamo para comprar material para sus caritas pintadas y esmaltes modernos, escarchas y decorar también su negocio. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de mercadería para su negocio.

La socia está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: This member belongs to the Qorichuspa community bank. This bank is located in the Huanchac district in the province and department of Cusco. Carmela is 37, lives with her partner and has 2 children. She works in retail. She has a space in her home where she does manicures for young women who have events coming up such as proms, fifteenth birthday parties, weddings and other events. She also does makeup in her home for all ages. She makes cakes for all occasions on order. She is a very hard-working person and trusts in her abilities. She wants to improve her work space and open a store in the city center in the near future. She wants to have her business running well for the Christmas holidays and new year, and so she is requesting a loan to purchase materials for makeup and modern enamels and glitter, and also to decorate her business. She is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of merchandise for her business. She is happy to have this loan and promises to repay it as established.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of merchandise for her business.

Le gusta viajar en especial a la playa.

The support of this loan will help her economically to supply her needs. She confronts challenges such as plagues, diseases and the varied climate. Her dream is to improve her economic stability. She enjoys traveling, especially to the beach.

loans.use: agricultural inputs and fertilizers

loans.name: Johanna Virginia

texts.es:
Johanna Virginia R. R. tiene 24 años de edad, Es soltera vive con la madre en el Cantón Chillanes  Provincia de Bolívar. No tiene  hijos

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para el cultivo de arroz, plátano, maíz, cacao, naranja, yuca Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es  mejorar la calidad de vida.

Le gusta practicar el deporte.
texts.en:
Johanna Virginia R. R. is 24 years old.  She is single and lives with her mother in Chillanes canton, in Bolívar province.  She doesn't have any children.

The TRES DE NOVIEMBRE community bank has 28 members and is located 90 minutes from our office, in Chillanes canton.  The members of this group work in short-cycle agriculture, growing rice, bananas, corn, cacao, oranges and cassava.  They have been in this line of work for many years.

Johanna Virginia is a farmer who grows rice, bananas, corn, cacao, oranges and cassava.  She buys her products in Mata de Cacao and makes her sales in the Matilde Esther shopping center and in Bucay.

Johanna Virginia is requesting this loan to buy farming supplies and fertilizers for her rice, banana, cacao, orange and cassava crops.  The support of this loan will help her to financially cover her needs.  She faces challenges such as insect infestations, plant diseases and changes in the weather.  Her dream is to improve her quality of life.

Johanna Virginia likes taking part in sports.

loans.use: To buy farming supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Luis Manuel

texts.es:
Luis Manuel de 22 años de edad, es soltero, vive con su mamá quien donde comparte con los gatos familiares, en la Zona # 4 en Nueva Guinea, se desempeña como Cajero para el Pali Nueva Guinea, desde hace 3 años, de donde obtiene sus ingresos mensuales. Es un joven trabajador, con animo de superacion, responsable; ha trabajado con Kiva a quien agradece mucho por brindarle esta gran oportunindad para seguir construyendo su casa, ya que con el credito anterior empezó a construir un cuarto.

Por lo que ahora solicita su segundo crédito para invertirlo repello del mismo y ponerle piso  y asi  de esta manera gozar de mejores condiciones en su hogar.

Su mayor sueño es ayudar a su mayor sueño en la vida es seguir estudiando y asi llegar a ser un excelente profesional, tener estabilidad laboral  y formar su propia familia.
texts.en:
Luis Manuel is 22 years old and single.  He lives with his mom and helps her with the family expenses.  They live in Zone #4 in Nueva Guinea.  Luis Manuel works as a checkout operator for Pali in Nueva Guinea.  He has been in this job for 3 years and makes a monthly wage.

Luis Manuel is a hard-working and responsible young man who has a desire to improve himself.  He has worked with Kiva previously and he would like to thank them for giving him this opportunity to continue building his home since he used his previous loan to start building a room.

He is requesting his second loan to invest in plastering his room and putting in a floor so that he can have better conditions in his home.  His biggest dream in life is to continue studying so that he can become an excellent professional, to have stability in his work and to form his own family.

loans.use: To buy building materials to improve a room

loans.name: Cesar Alfredo

loans.name: Alma Raquel

texts.es:
La Joven Alma Raquel de 26 años de edad Habitante en el Barrio Linda Vista de petronic 4 c. al norte en Nueva Guinea, su esposo trabaja como tecnico con quien tiene 2 hijos varones los cuales son su  mayor felicidad, ella trabaja para la Alcaldia Municipal  como asistente del asesor legal desde hace 6 años de donde obtiene sus ingresos mensuales para cumplir con sus compromisos de pago ya que los gastos del hogar los comparte con el marido, ambos son responsables y honesto, y son personas muy queridos por sus compañeros de trabajo y vecinos.  

Solicita su primer  crédito para invertirlo en arreglo de cocina y de esta manera tener mejores condiciones en su hogar, por lo que esperan el apoyo de Kiva para realizar este pequeño proyecto.  

Su mayor sueño en la vida  es que sus hijos no les falte nada y tener estabilidad laboral.
texts.en:
Alma Raquel is a young woman of 26.  She lives in Linda Vista de Petronic neighborhood, 4c. al norte, in Nueva Guinea.  Her husband works as a technician and they have 2 sons who are their greatest joy.  Alma Raquel works for the City of Nueva Guinea as an assistant to their legal counsel.  She has been in this job for 6 years and she makes a monthly wage which covers her loan repayments since she shares her household expenses with her husband.  They are both responsible and honest people who are very well liked by their work colleagues and neighbors.

Alma Raquel is requesting her first loan to invest in fixing up her kitchen so that she can have better conditions in her home.  They are hoping for Kiva's support in carrying out this small project.

Alma Raquel's biggest dream in life is for her children not to want for anything and to have stability in her work.

loans.use: To buy materials to fix up her kitchen

loans.name: Henrry Israel

texts.es:

He enjoys sharing his free time with his children.

loans.name: Kokou Ernest

texts.fr: M. Ernest est âgé de 53 ans et a 4 enfants  en charge. Il est marié.  Il fait le commerce de produits congelés pour pouvoir répondre aux besoins de ses enfants.  IL a commencé en 2005 cette activité et achète  ses produits à Togo Frigo. Il est dans son deuxième cycle de prêt. IL demande un crédit pour satisfaire plus de clients.
texts.en: Mr. Ernest is 53 years old and has four children to support.  He is married.  He does commerce in frozen foods in order to meet the needs of his children.  He started this business in 2005 and buys his goods at Togo Frigo.  He is on his second loan cycle and is asking for a loan to satisfy more customers.

loans.use: Buying frozen foods

loans.name: Luis Felipe

texts.es:
Luis Felipe es padre de familia, muy dedicado a sobresalir adelante con su familia de dos hermosos hijos. Labora como maestro de obra desde hace doce años. 
Iniciando como albañil, en donde obtuvo mucha experiencia, y hoy en día lo ejerce más profesional. Cuenta con el apoyo económico de su esposa quien trabaja como estilista.
Luis su casa la ido construyendo poco a poco con financiamientos que la institución ha otorgado, siendo su séptimo ciclo en donde con este nuevo préstamo comprara materiales de construcción para cambio de sistema eléctrico como compra de azulejos para poner en el baño. Con la ventaja que el mismo hace los trabajo.
texts.en: Luis Felipe is a father who is very dedicated to succeeding with his family. He has two handsome children. He has worked as a master builder for twelve years. He started off as a bricklayer, obtaining a lot of experience, and today he is much more professional. He counts on his wife's economic support; she works as a stylist. Luis has been building his house bit by bit with the loans that the institution has authorized. This is his seventh loan cycle, and with this new loan he will purchase construction materials to change the electric system, and he will purchase tiles to put in the bath. He has the advantage of doing the work himself.

loans.use: he will purchase materials such as: tile to put in the bath, and he will improve the electrical system

loans.name: Augusto Moises

texts.es:
Augusto Moises R. B. tiene 74 años de edad, Vive en unión Libre junto a su compañera y junto a sus hijos en el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar. Tiene 8 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. TRES DE NOVIEMBRE, Esta compuesta por 28 socios y esta a 90 minutos de  la oficina se encuentra dentro de los límites del Cantón Chillanes. Esta Ventanilla se dedica labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de arroz, plátano, maíz, cacao, naranja, yuca. Esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Augusto Moises se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de arroz, plátano, maíz, cacao, naranja, yuca. Compra sus productos en Mata de cacao y sus ventas se realizan en el Comercial  Matilde Esther y vende los  productos en Bucay.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para el cultivo de arroz, plátano, maíz, cacao, naranja, yuca Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es  mejorar la calidad de vida para su familia.

Le gusta ver televisión.
texts.en: Augusto Moises R. B. is 74. He is in a common-law marriage and lives with his partner and children in the Chillanes Canton, Bolivar province. He has 8 children. The V.R.C. Tres de Noviembre group has 28 members and is 90 minutes from the office, within the limits of the Chillanes Canton. This region is dedicated to short-cycle agricultural labour; the sowing of rice, bananas, corn, cocoa, oranges and yucca. They spend a lot of time doing this work. Augusto Moises works in agriculture, sowing rice, bananas, corn, cocoa, oranges and yucca. He purchases his products in Mata de Cacao and sells in the Matilde Esther Market and in Bucay. He is requesting this loan to purchase agricultural inputs and fertilizers for the cultivation of rice, bananas, corn, cocoa, oranges and yucca. The support of this loan will help him economically to supply his needs. He confronts challenges such as plagues, diseases and the varied climate. His dream is to improve his family's quality of life. He enjoys watching television.

loans.use: agricultural inputs and fertilizers

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
María madre soltera, mujer emprendedora ha salido adelante con mucho esfuerzo, posee su vivienda humilde que requieren de mejoras, tiene su propio negocio un tramo de ropa en cual vende variedad  de estilo, talla. Se dedica a vender ropa desde hace 15 años al principio por encargo, en su casa ahora ya compro un tramo en el mercado captando mayor cantidad de clientela. Tiene como planes ofrecerle a su familia una mejor forma de vida. 
El préstamo que solicitad es para la compra de materiales de construcción como: cemento, clavos, estribo, arena, lamina, amarre, para construir el muro y replegar algunas paredes. Lo lograda gracias al financiamiento. Obteniendo seguridad, comodidad y protección.
texts.en:
Maria, a very enterprising single mother, has been advancing with much effort. She has her humble house which requires improvements, and she has her own business, a clothing store that sells a variety of styles and sizes.

Maria has dedicated herself to selling clothes since 15 years ago, at first by taking orders in her house. Now, she has bought a market stall and can capture a larger clientèle. Among her plans is to offer her family a better form of life.

The loan Maria requests is for buying construction materials, such as cement, nails, bracing, sand, sheet metal, and fasteners to build a wall and replace some old walls.  This can be achieved with this financing, offering better security, comfort and protection.

loans.use: TO CONSTRUCT ONE WALL AND REPLACE OTHER WALLS ON HER PROPERTY

loans.name: Amelia Ninfa

texts.es:
Amelia Ninfa S. R. tiene 50 años de edad, Vive en Unión Libre junto a su compañero y sus hijos en el Cantón Chillanes Provincia bolívar. Tiene 6 hijos.


Los miembros de la V.R.C. TRES DE NOVIEMBRE, Esta compuesta por 28 socios y esta a 90 minutos de  la oficina se encuentra dentro de los límites del Cantón Chillanes. Esta Ventanilla se dedica labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de arroz, plátano, maíz, cacao, naranja, yuca. Esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Amelia Ninfa se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de arroz, plátano, maíz, cacao, naranja, yuca. Compra sus productos en Mata de cacao y sus ventas se realizan en el Comercial  Matilde Esther y vende los  productos en Bucay.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para el cultivo de arroz, plátano, maíz, cacao, naranja, yuca Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es  mejorar la calidad de vida y ampliar el negocio.

Le gusta cocinar y compartir momentos con sus hijos.
texts.en:
Amelia Ninfa S. R. is 50 years old.  She lives with her common-law husband and children in Chillanes canton, in Bolívar province.  She has 6 children.

The TRES DE NOVIEMBRE community bank has 28 members and is located 90 minutes from our office, in Chillanes canton.  The members of this group work in short-cycle agriculture, growing rice, bananas, corn, cacao, oranges and cassava.  They have been in this line of work for many years.

Amelia Ninfa is a farmer who grows rice, bananas, corn, cacao, oranges and cassava.  She buys her products in Mata de Cacao and makes her sales in the Matilde Esther shopping center and in Bucay.

Amelia Ninfa a is requesting this loan to buy farming supplies and fertilizers for her rice, banana, cacao, orange and cassava crops.  The support of this loan will help her to financially cover her needs.  She faces challenges such as insect infestations, plant diseases and changes in the weather.  Her dream is to improve her quality of life and to expand her business.

Amelia Ninfa likes cooking and spending time with her children.

loans.use: To buy farming supplies and fertilizers

Los miembros de la V.R.C. TRES DE NOVIEMBRE, Esta compuesta por 28 socios y esta a 90 minutos de  la oficina se encuentra dentro de los límites del Cantón Chillanes. Le gusta pasear con sus hijos.
texts.en:
Silvia Eugenia R. R. is 29 years old, and she is married.  She lives with her husband and their children in the Chillanes canton in the Bolívar province.  She has three children.

The “Tres de Noviembre” (November Third) Communal Bank is comprised of 28 members.  The bank is 90 minutes from the office, and it is in the Chillanes canton limits.  This bank is devoted to short cycle agricultural work.  They grow rice, bananas, corn, cacao, oranges, and yucca.  They have been doing this for a long time.

Silvia Eugenia grows rice, bananas, corn, cacao, oranges and yucca.  She buys her products in Mata de Cacao.  She makes her sales in the Matilde Esther market, and she sells the products in Bucay.

She is requesting the loan to buy agricultural supplies and fertilizers for her rice, banana, corn, cacao, orange, and yucca crops.  The help from the loan will financially help supply her with the necessities.  They face challenges like pest infestations, diseases, and climate changes.

Her dream is to improve her family’s quality of life.
 
She likes to take walks with her children.

loans.use: To buy agricultural supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Corazon De Jesus Group

texts.es:
CORAZON D. JESUS

Rosa es integrante D. la Alcancía Comunal “CORAZON D. JESUS” hace 1 año y recientemente por decisión D. todo el grupo le otorgaron el puesto D. presidenta, en la foto sale la presidenta sale parada al medio D. todo el grupo con (POLO D. COLOR BLANDO D. MANGA CORTA CON UN PANTALON JEEN D. COLOR CELENTE) Entre todo el grupo decidieron ponerle ese nombre a su Alcancía Comunal por que a todos les pareció bien y les gusto ese nombre este grupo lo conforman 11 personas las cuales tienen ya 1año trabajando con Edaprospo-prosperidad.
Rosa tiene 39 años D. edad es madre soltera tiene 5 hijos los cuales son dependientes   (4 MENORES D. EDAD Y 1 MAYOR D. EDAD) Rosa trabaja en lo que es compra y venta D. chatarra (compra fierros, clavos, y todo tipo D. metales) D. esa manera ayuda a su hija que esta estudiando (ESTUDIOS SUPERIORES) Rosa piensa invertir el dinero del préstamo en el alquiler D. un puesto D. venta D. ropa para su hija pero su sueño D. Rosa es tener un puesto D. venta D. ropa propio en el mercado D. su localidad.
texts.en:
Rosa has been a member of the “Corazón D. Jesús”  (The Heart of Jesus) Communal Bank for one year.  The whole group recently decided to give her the presidency.  In the photo the president is standing in the middle of the group (with a white, short sleeve polo shirt and light blue jeans).  The whole group decided on the name for their communal bank because it seemed good to them, and they liked this name.  This group is comprised of 11 people who have been working with Edaprospro-Prosperidad for one year.

Rosa, age 39, is a single mother.  She has five dependent children (four are minors, and one is an adult).  Rosa works buying and selling scrap metal (she buys iron, nails, and all types of metal).  This way she helps her daughter who is enrolled in higher education studies.

Rosa plans to use the loan to rent a stand to sell clothes for her daughter.

Rosa’s dream is to have her own stand to sell clothes at the local market.

loans.use: To rent a stand to sell clothes

loans.name: Ismail

texts.en: Ismail is 29 years old, married, and does not yet have children.  Ismail sells soft drinks and mineral water, a business in which he has been involved for one year. His wife works with her husband in this business.  Ismail will use the loan to purchase juice, soda, sugar, and fresh milk to sell.  Ismail plans to build a house and increase his savings with the new profits from his expanded business.

loans.use: To buy more soft drinks, especially juice, to sell

loans.name: Juan Alberto

texts.es:
Don Juan Alberto habitante de la zona # 2 de la Escuela Mauricio Cajina 1/2 c. al oeste en Nueva Guinea, de 59 años de edad con 10 años de laborar para la casa de la Mujer como contador, su esposa se encarga de los quehaceres y del cuido de su hijo menor, ya que son una familia bien humilde y bien trabajadora.  

Está solicitando su cuarto credito para invertirlo  compra de eléctrodomésticos y comprar pintura para pintar su vivienda , hay buenas referencias comerciales y personales, es caracterizado como una persona honesta trabajador y de buenas costumbres. 

Su mayor sueño en la vida es gozar de mucha salud y trabajo para seguir ayudando a su familia.solicitamos al comité la aprobación del préstamo solicitado.
texts.en:
Juan Alberto lives in zone #2 a half of a block to the west of the Mauricio Cajina School in Nueva Guinea.  He is 59 years old.  He has worked for ten years as an accountant for the “Casa de la Mujer” (Women’s Clinic).  His wife does the household chores and takes care of their minor son.  They are a very humble and hard-working family.

He is requesting his fourth loan to buy electric appliances and to buy paint to paint his house.

He has good personal and business references.  He is known to be an honest and hard-working person with good habits.

His greatest dream in live is to enjoy good health and to work in order to keep helping his family.  

We are asking the committee to approve the requested loan.

loans.use: To paint his house

loans.name: Gloria Marlene

texts.es:
Doña Gloria de 43 años de edad  vive con sus dos hijos y su esposo el cual le ayuda con los gastos familiares, habitan en Nueva Guinea de la Policia 1 c. al sur 1/2 c. al este, ella  labora como docente de primaria  desde hace 20 años en la Escuela Mauricio Cajina ubicada en  la zona urbana de Nueva Guinea, segun referencias es  responsable con sus compromisos y lo ha demostrado ser en sus creditos anteriores. 

Solicita su octavo crèdito a AFODENIC para construir una habitaciòn y mejorar sus condiciones de su vivienda para que sus hijos gocen de un hogar agradable, 

Su mayor sueño en la vida es que su linda familia permanezca unida y en las cosas de Dios.
texts.en:
Gloria is 43 years old.  She lives with her two children and her husband who helps with their family expenses.  They live in Nueva Guinea de la Policia, 1 c. al sur, 1/2 c. al este.  

Gloria has worked as an elementary school teacher for 20 years in Mauricio Cajina Elementary School which is located in the urban area of Nueva Guinea.  According to her references she is responsible in her obligations and she has shown this with her previous loans.

Gloria is requesting her eighth loan through AFODENIC to build a room and improve the conditions in her house so that her children can live in a pleasant home.

Her biggest dream in life is for her beautiful family to remain united and committed to God.

loans.use: To build a room

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es: Mercedes, de 55 años, es una madre de familia muy laboriosa, vive en su casa propia, junto a su esposo y sus 2 hijos. En un inicio tenía como primer negocio una librería, pero el tiempo le demostró que no le era rentable, antes esto decidió cambiar de rubro; hoy se dedica a la venta de productos perecibles de primera necesidad. Desde entonces se dedica a la venta de especias molidas, verduras y frutas, negocio que le esta yendo muy bien. Ella se siente muy contenta con su tienda, ya que además de vender sus productos, se interrelaciona con sus vecinas. Su buen trato y su paciencia, han hecho que su negocio sea el más concurrido y preferido por sus clientes, por lo que se siente muy motivada a seguir trabajando. Por el momento solo atiende por su ventana, ya que el ambiente de su casa no fue diseñada para este fin; es por ello que planea ampliar su negocio, asimismo desea vender productos naturales, productos que ella misma consume. Es su segundo crédito con MFP, y sabe que le será muy útil este aporte, por ello se compromete pagar puntualmente sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará gaseosas y productos lácteos para implementar su tienda.
texts.en:
Mercedes, 55, is a very hardworking mother.  She lives in her own house, together with her husband and their two children.  Her first business was a book store, but time proved that it was not profitable so she decided to change direction.  Now she sells basic perishable goods like ground spices, vegetables, and fruits, and her business is doing very well.  She feels very happy with her store because not only does she sell her products, but she also gets to interact with her neighbors.  Her patience and good customer service have won her customers' preference and made her business the busiest around.  Therefore, she feels very motivated to keep working.

For now, she only tends to her customers through her window, as her house was not designed for this purpose.  For this reason, she plans to expand her business.  She would also like to sell natural products, which she consumes herself.  This is her second loan through MFP and she knows that this support will be very useful.  She promises to make punctual repayments according to the established schedule.

She will use this loan to buy soft drinks and dairy products to expand her store.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks and dairy products

loans.name: Angela Nelly

texts.es:
Angela Nelly R. R. tiene 34 años de edad Es casada vive con su esposo y junto a sus hijos en el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar. Tiene 4 hijos

loans.name: Emprendedoras De Casa Huerta Group

texts.es: Milagros tiene 40 años de edad, es secretaria de la Alcancía Comunal “Emprendedoras de Casa Huerta,” tiene 5 hijos  dos de los cuales son mayores de edad y le ayudan con los gastos de su hogar, como también con los estudios de sus hermanos menores.  Ella lleva trabajando 8 meses con EDAPROSPO es personal de limpieza de una institución educativa particular,  pero como  empezaron la época de vacaciones Milagros se dedica a realizar trabajos como: venta de quesos, carne y tejidos para pedidos, también los ofrece (chompas, gorros, chalinas, tapetes), ya que con los ingresos de todas estas actividades ayuda a cubrir los gatos de su hogar a sus hijos mayores. Ella solicito el préstamo a EDAPROSPO para comprar carne, lechones y venderlos aprovechando las fiestas de navidad y año nuevo.
texts.en:
Milagros is 40 years old.  She is the secretary of the "Emprendedoras de Casa Huerta" (Entrepreneurs of Casa Huerta) community bank.  She has five children.  Two of her children are grown up and help her with the household expenses as well as with their younger siblings' studies.

Milagros has been working with EDAPROSPO for 8 months.  She works as a cleaner in a private school but since the holiday season began, Milagros has been carrying out other activities such as: selling cheese, meat and knitted items to order.  She also sells these items (sweaters, caps, scarves and tablecloths).  The profits she makes from all these activities helps her to cover the household expenses with her older children.  

Milagros is requesting a loan from EDAPROSPO to buy meat and suckling pigs to sell, taking advantage of the Christmas and New Year holidays.

loans.use: To buy meat and suckling pig

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal  “LOS COMERCIANTES DE VIRGEN ASUNTA”;  El banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de iscuchaka, provincia de Anta, departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Eugenia; La socia tiene 36 años de edad, la socia tiene 3 hijos, y la socia se dedica a la compra y venta de ropa paralelo a esto en su mismo stand ella vende pasamanería, la pasamanería consta de un surtido de artículos tales como, pasadores  para zapatos y zapatillas, betún, espejos de todo tamaño, peines, click y otros. La socia desea invertir su crédito en la compra de mercadería de tipo menaje ría;  la socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de mercadería.

En la foto de grupo sale el asesor Hernán junto con ellos y la esposa del socio eduardo también esta en la foto.

La socia valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Eugenia belongs to the "LOS COMERCIANTES DE VIRGEN ASUNTA" community bank which is located in Iscuchaka district, in Anta province, in Cusco department.  

Eugenia is 36 years old.  She has 3 children and her business is buying and selling clothes.  In addition, from the same stall, she sells an assortment of articles such as shoelaces for shoes and sneakers, shoe polish, mirrors of all sizes, combs, pens etc.  She would like to invest her loan money in buying merchandise: household items.  She is requesting this loan to buy merchandise.

In the group photo, their advisor Hernán appears with them and the wife of Eduardo, one of the group's members, also appears in the photo.  Eugenia appreciates the loan that she is being offered and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: To invest in buying merchandise

His group, Tres de Noviembre, is made up of 28 members and is located 90 minutes from him, within the city limits of Chillanes. Their work is focused around agriculture, specifically the cultivation of rice, plantain, corn, cocoa, oranges, and yuca. They have been involved in this activity for a long time, and this is how Wilson Efrain makes a living. His sales are made in Matilde Esther's stores in Bucay.

He is requesting this credit to purchase agricultural supplies and fertilizers for the cultivation of the aforementioned products. This support will help him economically so that he can provide for his necessities. He faces challenges such as plagues, disease, and the changing climate, but he dreams of improving his quality of life.

loans.use: Fertilizer and other agricultural supplies

loans.name: Solidario San Jose De San Bartolo Group

texts.es:
Solidario San Jose de San Bartolo
La representante de este grupo es  doña Patricia A. Juárez  ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas, cuando ella inicio su negocio solo vendía en su comunidad que es San Bartolo,  ella siempre está buscando maneras de mejorar su negocio, actualmente ella comenta muy contenta que distribuye en las fabricas locales y el aeropuerto , para poder hacer este trabajo actualmente tiene dos empleadas y su deseo es seguir creciendo más para apoyar a su esposo y darles una mejor oportunidad de vida a sus hijos,Solicita este credito para compra de maiz, de la misma forma doña Irma Consuelo J.   empezó vendiendo churrascos cada fin de semana en la carretera de su comunidad, nos  comenta que hace cuatro años se quedo viuda y fue ahí donde ella empezó a vender a diario y ella  dice que gracias a los prestamos que ha tenido con  Fape podido sostener a su familia,solicita el credito para la compra de productos para elavorar comida, de la misma forma Hilda Isabel tiene su venta de de refacción  en la escuela local de su comunidad y por las tardes vende sus tortillas ya que su propósito es seguir estudiando ,  ella estudia solo fines de semana ya que se ha sostenido gracias a su negocio.solicita el credito para comprar productos para elavorar comida,   Todas ellas cuentan que es muy importante para ellas tener capital para invertir en este mes, especialmente por las fiestas de fin de año y ellas quieren aprovechar todas las oportunidades.
texts.en:
San Jose de San Bartolo Solidarity Group

This group's representative is Patricia A. Juárez whose business is selling tortillas.  When she set up her business, she only sold her products in her own community of San Bartolo.  She is always looking for ways to improve her business.  She comments that she is currently very happy because she delivers her products to local factories and to the airport.  She has two employees who help her in her work and her wish is to continue growing her business so that she can support her husband and give her children better opportunities in life. Patricia is requesting this loan to buy corn.

Irma Consuelo J. started selling 'churrasco' (barbecued meat) every weekend on a road in her community.  She tells us that four years ago she was left a widow and that was when she started selling her products every day.  She says that thanks to the loans she has had from Fape, she has been able to support her family.  She is requesting this loan to buy supplies for making her food.

Hilda Isabel's business is selling snacks in a local school.  In the afternoons she sells tortillas.  Her goal is to continue studying.  She studies on weekends and supports herself with her business.  She is requesting this loan to buy supplies for making her food.

All of the women tell us that it is very important for them to have capital to invest in their businesses this month, especially as the end-of-year holidays approach as they would like to take advantage of every opportunity.

loans.use: To buy supplies for making food.  To buy corn.

loans.name: Petrona

texts.es:
Doña Petrona  de 56 años de edad, tiene una hija que se desempeña como docente de secundaria de donde obtiene ingresos, la Sra Petrona es una persona activa, responsable y muy trabajadora, labora para el Hospital Jacinto Hernandez desde hace 30 años desempeñandose como supervisora,  ambas comparten con los gastos del hogar y con los compromisos adquiridos, cabe mencionar que esta Señora ha trabajado con Kiva por lo que con el credito anterior pudo repellar la pared de su casa.

Por lo tanto se siente muy agradecida y  solicita 6to. credito para hacerle un anexo a la casa y pìntarla y de esta manera continuar mejorando su vivienda por lo que es una persona asalariada y con lo que gana no es suficiente para realizar estos gastos de un solo; por tanto tiene que mejorar con creditos, los cuales asume con respnsabilidad. 

Su mayor mayor sueño en la vida  es que su familia goze de mucha salud y estabilidad laboral.
texts.en:
Petrona is 56 years old.  She has a daughter who works as a high school teacher and earns a salary.  Petrona is an active, responsible and very hard-working person.  She has worked as supervisor in Jacinto Hernandez Hospital for 30 years.  She and her daughter share the household expenses and any financial obligations.  We should mention that this lady has worked with Kiva before.  She used her previous loan to plaster the wall of her house, therefore she feels very satisfied.

Petrona is requesting her 6th loan to build an extension on her house, paint it and thereby continue improving her home.  She earns a wage but what she makes isn't enough to allow her to incur expenses such as these all in one go.  For this reason, she must improve her home with loans which she takes on responsibly.  Her biggest dream in life is for her family to enjoy good health and stability in their work.

loans.use: To build an extension to her home and paint it

loans.name: Mario Ramiro

texts.es:
Mario de 35 años, es un hombre trabajador que desde pequeño su padre le enseño a fabricar muebles en un pequeño taller que el tenia. Poco a poco fue aprendiendo hasta cuando decidió que esa iba a ser la actividad económica que iba mantener a su familia. Viviendo en una zona urbana llamada suburbio tiene su taller de ebanista. En la actualidad trabaja de lunes a sábado desde muy temprano haciendo muebles de madera y diseños que con la ayuda de su padre los realiza. 

Quiere continuar con su negocio por eso quiere el préstamo para comprar madera, pegamentos, herramientas y así hacer todos los pedidos que les piden sus clientes. En el futuro quiere seguir trabajando con su padre y que su negocio de ebanista sea conocido.
texts.en:
Mario is 35 years old.  He is a hard-working man whose father taught him to make furniture in a small workshop that he owned when he was a young boy.  He gradually learned the trade until he decided that this was going to be the business activity with which he would support his family.

Mario lives in an urban area called Suburbio and he has a cabinet-making workshop.  He currently works from Monday to Saturday, from very early in the morning, making wooden furniture and designs that his father helps him with.  He would like to continue in his business and is requesting this loan to buy wood, adhesive and tools so that he can fill all of the orders he receives from his customers.  In the future, he would like to continue working with his father and for his furniture business to become well known.

loans.use: To buy wood, adhesive and tools

The TRES DE NOVIEMBRE community bank has 28 members and is located 90 minutes from our office, in Chillanes canton.  The members of this community bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing rice, bananas, corn, cacao, oranges and cassava.  They have been in this line of work for many years.

Marcia Angélica is a farmer who grows rice, bananas, corn, cacao, oranges and cassava.  She buys her products in Mata de Cacao and makes her sales in the Matilde Esther shopping center and in Bucay.

She is requesting this loan to buy farming supplies and fertilizers for her rice, banana, corn, cacao, orange and cassava crops.  The support of this loan will help her to financially cover her needs.  She faces challenges such as insect infestations, plant diseases and changes in the weather.  Her dream is to continue working so that she can support her children.  She likes to go for walks in the country.

loans.use: To buy farming supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Etibar

texts.en: Etibar Y. is a 26 year-old-man, who is in the business of cattle-breeding. A refugee from Nagorno-Karabakh, he lives with his family in a small settlement built for refugee families in the Sabirabad region. He has a little son who is two years old. The hardship of being refugees made it difficult for Etibar to support his family so he decided to start his own livestock-breeding business in 2008 and since that time he is doing well. This is his first loan of 1100 AZN with Aqroinvest and Kiva to buy two cows. Now he has five. He also breeds other types of animals. Etibar is sure that having more cows will allow him to further increase his family's income which now is only 350 AZN per month. He foresees a bright future for his cattle-breeding business. He is a diligent man who, after repaying this loan, plans to buy ten more cows.

loans.use: to buy two cows

loans.name: Gerardo Rafael

texts.es:
Gerardo Rafael C. A. tiene 65 años de edad, es casado vive con su esposa y sus hijos en el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar. Tiene 4 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. TRES DE NOVIEMBRE, Esta compuesta por 28 socios y esta a 90 minutos de  la oficina se encuentra dentro de los límites del Cantón Chillanes. Esta Ventanilla se dedica labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de arroz, plátano, maíz, cacao, naranja, yuca. Esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Gerardo Rafael se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de arroz, plátano, maíz, cacao, naranja, yuca. Compra sus productos en Mata de cacao y sus ventas se realizan en el Comercial  Matilde Esther y vende los  productos en Bucay.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para el cultivo de arroz, plátano, maíz, cacao, naranja, yuca Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es seguir trabajando en la agricultura.

Le gusta pasear en el campo.
texts.en:
Gerardo Rafael C. A. is 65 years old, married, and lives with his wife and children in the canton of Chillanes, which is in Bolívar province.  He has four children.

The 28 members of the Third of November rural communal bank are based within the limits of the canton of Chillanes and are 90 minutes from the office of Cooperativa San Jose.  The members of this group work in short-cycle agriculture, planting rice, plantains, cocoa, oranges, and cassava.  Collectively, they have been doing this work for a long time.

Gerardo Rafael plants rice, plantains, corn, cocoa, oranges, and cassava.  He buys products in Mata de Cacao and makes his sales at the Matilde Esther market and in Bucay.

He is requesting this loan to buy agricultural supplies and fertilizers for cultivating rice, plantains, cocoa, oranges, and cassava.  With the economic support provided by this loan, he will be better able to meet his needs.  He faces challenges like insect plagues, crop illnesses, and variations in the climate.  His dream is to continue working in agriculture.

He enjoys spending time in the countryside.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Touba Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe groupe de solidarité TOUBA est créé depuis la mise en place du Banc Villageois, il y a de cela plus de 8 ans. Il est composé de 13 femmes qui habitent le même village et ont le même centre d'intérêt qui est le développement de terroir. 

Madame Fatou M., à gauche de la photo, levant main est responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 36 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 06 enfants. 

Elle fait un petit commerce. Elle vend des produits divers tels que des céréales et des produits d'artisanat 

Avec les bénéfices qu'elle réalise elle soutien son mari dans la prise en charge de la famille
texts.en:
The Touba solidarity group was created when the Banc Villageois was set up, more than 8 years ago. The group is made up of 13 women who live in the same village and have the same main interest - development of their land. 

Madame Fatou M., on the left in the photo with her hand raised, is the group's leader. She is 36 years old, married, and the mother of 6 children. She has a small store, where she sells various products such as cereals and craft items. With the profit, she helps her husband in managing the family.

loans.use: To develop and market her small business

loans.name: Durna

texts.en: Durna R. is 56, married, and lives with her five dear children in her own house in a small settlement built for refugee families in the Bilasuvar district. She fled with her big family to Bilasuvar in 1993. Durna is an entrepreneurial woman and together with her husband, they did their best for many years to give comfort and an education to their beloved children, but it was difficult to cover all their needs. Durna decided to start her cattle-breeding business in 2003. Now the monthly income of the family is around 500 AZN. Her three sons help her in this business. With this loan of 1200 AZN she bought three cows. This is her first loan with AqroInvest and Kiva and she promises to make the payments on time since she would like to take out more loans in the future. She is planning to enlarge her cattle-breeding business and increase her number of cows to twelve.

loans.use: to buy three cows

loans.name: Gulnaz

texts.en: Gulnaz S. is a 46 year-old woman who has a primary education. She is from Nagorno-Karabakh but fled with her family to Bilasuvar at the beginning of the 1990s. Now she lives with her family in a small settlement built for refugee families. Gulnaz is married and has a 25 year-old son and a 23 year-old daughter. Her husband and children help her in the cattle-breeding business which she started in 2007. Now the family's monthly income is on average 250 AZN. This is her first loan with Aqroinvest and Kiva 1000 AZN which she used to buy three cows. Now she has six cows. After she repays this loan she plans to apply for more loans to expand her business. Her goal is to have thirteen cows.

loans.use: to buy three cows

loans.name: Asim

texts.en: Asim X. is a 40 year-old-man who lives and works in Sabirabad. He never received a formal education but all his life did his best to provide for his family. Asim is married and has one son, aged 16. His wife actively helps him in his cattle-breeding business, which he started in 2005. Asim buys animals at profitable prices and then raises and sells them in the livestock bazaar for a profit. Asim also has a little poultry business. His monthly income  is 300 AZN to support his family. This is the first loan that he has taken from Aqroinvest and Kiva. He used this loan of 1000 AZN to buy three cows. Asim says that the success of his business lies in the quality of his meat and dairy produce. Now he has six cows but after repaying this loan he would like to take out another loan to buy four more cows.

loans.use: to buy three cows

loans.name: Vahida

texts.en: Vahida Z. is a hard-working woman who lives in Sabirabad. She is 55 years old and lives with her husband and three children — two daughters and one son — aged between 23 and 28. Her son and husband are engaged in agriculture which did not cover all the family's needs. In 2005, to help provide for the family, she went into the business of selling jewelry, and since has gained a lot of clients. Vahida sells rings, watches, bracelets and other gold accessories. This is the first loan Vahida has taken from Aqroinvest and Kiva. She used this loan of 1500 AZN to invest in her jewely inventory, so as to increase the number of items for sale and boost her profit.

loans.use: to buy jewelry for sale

loans.name: Mubariz

texts.en: Mubariz A. is a 59 year-old man, married, with four children. He is an internal refugee from Nagorno-Karabakh who fled to the Sabirabad district of Azerbaijan in 1993. Mubariz is the head of his large family and the hardship of being refugees made it difficult for him support them. That is why in 2004 he started his animal breeding and selling business with the little savings he had. He gradually expanded his business, which is the only source of income for his family. His sons, who are 24 and 28, actively help him in business. Now he has seven cows and a monthly income of 300 AZN. This is his second loan from AqroInvest and Kiva. After successfully repaying his previous loan he requested another loan of 1300 AZN to buy three cows. In the future Mubariz wants to expand his business and have a farm.

loans.use: to buy three cows

loans.name: Gultakin

texts.en: Gultakin M. is a farmer, who lives in Imishli. She is 30 year old woman, married, and a mother of two boys, who are school-age. Gultakin has a cattle-breeding business which she started in 2008. She considers animal feed to be the biggest obstacle to the success of her business. After repaying her previous loan, Gultakin decided to apply for her second loan in the amount of 1000 AZN. The loan was spent to buy two cows and as working capital for animal feed purchases. Now she has seven cows. Gultakin sells meat and dairy in the Imishli bazaar every day. The family income is now 300 AZN. She hopes to open a farm with the help of her husband.

loans.use: To buy animal feed and two cows

loans.name: Vilayat

texts.en: Vilayat A. is one of the newly established farmers in the Saatli region. He is a 21-year-old single man. He is engaged in the business of cattle breeding. Specifically he buys calves, raises them and sells their meat and mil at the Saatli bazaar every day. Vilayat's father actively helps him in this business.  He requested a loan in 2000 AZN from Agroinvest and Kiva to buy animal feed and 3 more calves. This is his first loan. His goal is to increase the number of cows to seven.

loans.use: To buy animal feed and 3 more calves

loans.name: Asmar

texts.en: Asmar B. is a 52 year-old-woman who has her own cattle-breeding business. Asmar lives in the southern part of Azerbaijan in the town of Imishli. Asmar is married and has one son and two daughters, aged 23 and 21. Asmar gets a monthly pension in the amount of 85 AZN. This income is not sufficient for her big family, consisting of 5 members. In 2004, Asmar decided to start her cattle-breeding business and since then her income has considerably increased. She also breeds other types of livestock. Asmar is very grateful, because with this first loan in the amount of 1000 AZN that she received from Aqroinvest and Kiva, she was able to buy two more cows. Now she has five cows and her family's monthly income from this business is 250 AZN. Asmar is a very industrious woman. Her goal is to increase the number of cows to eight.

loans.use: To buy two cows

loans.name: Jorge Benedicto

texts.es:
Jorge Benedicto M. Z. tiene 23 años de edad, Es soltero vive con su padre en el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar. No tiene hijos.


Los miembros de la V.R.C. TRES DE NOVIEMBRE, Esta compuesta por 28 socios y esta a 90 minutos de  la oficina se encuentra dentro de los límites del Cantón Chillanes. Esta Ventanilla se dedica labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de arroz, plátano, maíz, cacao, naranja, yuca. Esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Jorge Benedicto se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de arroz, plátano, maíz, cacao, naranja, yuca. Compra sus productos en Mata de cacao y sus ventas se realizan en el Comercial  Matilde Esther y vende los  productos en Bucay.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para el cultivo de arroz, plátano, maíz, cacao, naranja, yuca Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es seguir trabajando para ayudar a sus padres.

Le gusta el deporte con sus amigos.
texts.en:
Jorge Benedicto M. Z. is 23 years old.  He is single and lives with his father in Chillanes canton, in Bolívar province.  He doesn't have any children.

The TRES DE NOVIEMBRE community bank has 28 members and is located 90 minutes from our office, in Chillanes canton.  The members of this community bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing rice, bananas, corn, cacao, oranges and cassava.  They have been in this line of work for many years.

Jorge Benedicto is a farmer who grows rice, bananas, corn, cacao, oranges and cassava.  He buys his products in Mata de Cacao and makes his sales in the Matilde Esther shopping center and in Bucay.

He is requesting this loan to buy farming supplies and fertilizers for his rice, banana, corn, cacao, orange and cassava crops.  The support of this loan will help him to financially cover his needs.  He faces challenges such as insect infestations, plant diseases and changes in the weather.  His dream is to continue working so that he can help his parents.  He enjoys taking part in sports with his friends.

loans.use: To buy farming supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Gladis

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “ÑAUPASUNCHIS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Gladis; ella tiene 28 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de pasteles, ella vende en forma independiente llevando a los diferentes colegios, ella prepara diferentes pasteles rellenos de mermeladas y manjares, la socia quiere tener una teinda donde pueda vender los pasteles. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos para preparar los pasteles.              
                                            
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Gladis is a member of the ÑAUPASUNCHIS community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Gladis is 28 years old and lives with her partner and child.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling cakes.  She makes her sales independently, delivering her products to different schools.  She makes different types of cakes filled with jam and caramel spread.  She would like to own a store where she could sell her cakes.

Gladis is requesting this loan to buy supplies for making her cakes.  She is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: To buy supplies for making her cakes

loans.name: María

texts.es: María tiene 44 años, es una madre de familia amorosa y abnegada con sus hijos, vive en su casa propia, en compañía de su esposo y sus 3 hijos. La actividad a la que María se dedica, es el servicio domestico, es así que se levanta muy temprano para cumplir con los labores de su casa, para luego dirigirse a la casa de sus patrones en donde realiza el trabajo de limpieza, cocina, esta actividad empieza desde 10:00am hasta muy tarde. Gracias a este trabajo viene educando a su hijo, un joven muy inteligente y emprendedor que estudia.  Por ello María, no duda en escatimar todo su esfuerzo para ayudar a su hijo. Señala que le gusta lo que hace, ya lleva más de 6 años en esta labor y planea construir su casa con material noble, de esa manera podrá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su hijo. Es su segundo crédito con MFP, y se compromete pagar de manera puntual sus cuotas, para acceder a posteriores ayudas en el futuro. Con el crédito que solicita, es para  invertirlo en la educación de su hijo, ya que le falta un semestre para terminar.
texts.en:
María is 44 years old and a loving and unselfish mother to her children.  She lives in her own house, in the company of her husband and their three children.  María is a domestic worker, so she gets up very early to do her own housework and then heads to her employers' house where she does the cleaning and cooking.  She starts her job at 10:00 a.m. and works until very late.  Thanks to this job, she has been able to educate her son, a very intelligent young man who is motivated in his studies.  María does not hesitate to put all of her efforts into helping her son. 

She indicates that she enjoys her work and has been doing it for six years.  She plans to build her house from sturdy materials in order to improve the quality of life for her and her son.

This is María's second loan through MFP and she promises to make her repayments punctually so that she can access further assistance in the future.  She will use the requested loan to invest in her son's education, as he is one semester short of finishing.

loans.use: to invest in her son's education

loans.name: Silvia Karin

texts.es:
Silvia es una madre de familia de 27 años de edad que reside junto a su esposo y a sus tres hijos menores de edad en el distrito de Pacanga, una zona agrícola que se encuentra situada en la provincia de Chepén, región La Libertad. La localidad se encuentra situada a mas de una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Ella se dedica a trabajar como comerciante: Por un lado cuenta con un pequeño establecimiento en su vivienda en donde ofrece en venta materiales de costura y confección de tejido, ella vende hilos de diversos colores y texturas a sus clientes, adicionalmente vende productos de belleza y cosméticos por catálogo a sus vecinos y conocidos. Ambos negocios cuentan con buena acogida ya que Silvia es una mujer bastante dinámica y los mantiene del mejor modo posible. Los ingresos que ella percibe de esta actividad los utiliza para ayudar a su esposo, quien trabaja como jornalero en los campos de cultivo de la zona, con el sostenimiento de la economía de su familia.

Actualmente ella desea implementar su negocio con la instalación de un pequeño estante en donde ofrezca a sus clientes un stock fijo de productos cosméticos. Esto le permitirá satisfacer la demanda con la que cuenta rápidamente, sin tener que esperar a fin de mes, que es cuando llega el pedido. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 500 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Silvia is a 27 year-old mother who lives with her husband and three dependent children in Pacanga district.  This is an agricultural area located in Chepén province, in La Libertad department.

Silvia works as a saleswoman.  She has a small establishment in her home where she sells sewing and knitting supplies.  She sells different colored and textured yarns to her customers.  She also sells beauty products and cosmetics from a catalog to her neighbors and acquaintances.  Both businesses are very popular because Silvia is quite a dynamic woman and she keeps her businesses running in the best way possible.

Silvia uses the profits from her business activities to help her husband, who works as a day laborer in local fields, to support their family financially.  Currently, Silvia would like to keep her business running by installing a small shelf where she can offer her customers a fixed stock of cosmetics.  This will allow her to satisfy her customers' demands quickly, without having to wait until the end of each month when her orders arrive.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan of 500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: To buy cosmetics to expand her inventory

loans.name: Laura Aida

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “ÑAUPASUNCHIS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Laura Aida; ella tiene 62 años de edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo de cesante de educación y por medio de este trabajo saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere tener una tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el préstamo para uso personal para el mantenimiento de su casa.             
                                           
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Laura Aida is a member of the Ñaupasunchis Communal Bank.  The bank is located in the Cusco district, Cusco Province, Cusco department.

Laura Aida, age 62, is married and has three children.  She has her daily activities, and she supports her family with her pension as a retired teacher.  That is how she gets her children ahead, but she wants to open a grocery store.

She is requesting the loan for personal use for maintenance on her house.

She is happy about the loan, and she pledges to make her payments on time.

loans.use: Personal use for home maintenance

loans.name: Solidario Mujeres Con Metas Group

texts.es:
solidario mujeres con metas.
El grupo se compone por las siguientes señoras, Virginia T. T., quien es  la representante del grupo, ella tiene un puesto de venta de fruta desde hace 4 años en el mercado local. Ella desea agrandar su local y poder ofrecer más variedad de frutas,solicita el credito para comprar frutas en barieda, su sueño es poder darles a sus hijos una oportunidad de educación.   Doña Elisa C. Y. es vendedora desde hace 8 años y cada día desea agrandar su negocio, ella distribuye frutas a otras vendedoras en el mercado ella cuenta que quiere seguir apoyando a sus hijos y además ella  desea poder brindar un mejor servicio en la distribución de frutas pero para eso necesita capital  para poder lograrlo.Solicita el credito para la compra de frutas por mayor.  Helen Noelia A., a su corta edad ha ganado experiencia por medio de las enseñanzas de su mama, vendiendo fruta,  su sueño es seguir estudiando en la universidad por lo que día a día  trabaja duro para poder lograrlo,Solicita el credito para compra de frutas, ella valora mucho que a través de su negocio pueda tener ingresos que le permitan estudiar y ayudar en su familia también.
texts.en:
"Mujeres con Metas" ["Women With Goals"] solidarity group
The group is made up of the following women: 
Virginia T. T. is the group representative. She has had a fruit stall for 4 years in a local market. She wants to expand her stall and be able to offer more variety of fruit. She is requesting this loan to purchase varied fruit. Her dream is to be able to give her children the opportunity for education.
Elisa C. Y. has been a merchant for 8 years and wants to expand her business. She distributes fruits to other sellers in the market. She says that she wants to continue to support her children, and that she wants to be able to provide a better fruit distribution service-- but in order to do this she needs capital. She is requesting this loan for the wholesale purchase of fruit. 
Helen Noelia A., at her young age, has gained experience from her mother's teaching, selling fruit. Her dream is to continue studying in university, and she works hard every day to be able to achieve this. She is requesting this loan for the purchase of fruit. She greatly values the fact that, through her business, she is able to have an income that allows her to study and also help her family.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale fruit

loans.name: Hugo Daniel

texts.es:
Hugo es un padre de familia de 33 años de edad que vive junto a su esposa y a su hijo en la ciudad de Reque, una zona de movimiento comercial considerable que se encuentra ubicada a 20 minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a brindar servicio de tallado en piedra y a la elaboración de lápidas. Este trabajo consiste en tallar piedras para hacer decoraciones en fachadas e interiores de viviendas, por otro lado, aplica sus habilidades para elaborar lápidas fúnebres. Sus habilidades le han permitido hacerse más conocido en la zona, y sus servicios cuenta con una demanda estable.

Hugo ha tenido un crédito anteriormente financiado por el fondo Kiva a través de Edpyme Alternativa y su producto Capital Semilla. En esa oportunidad el pudo adquirir algunos materiales y herramientas que necesitaba para poder satisfacer de buena manera la demanda con la que cuenta. Con las ganancias que obtuvo en su momento de estas actividades ayudó a su esposa a instalar poco a poco una bodega en donde ofrece a sus vecinos diversos productos de uso diario, entre abarrotes y productos de primera necesidad.

Actualmente Hugo desea adquirir mas productos para ampliar su bodega ya que la demanda de este negocio se ha incrementado últimamente, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar nuevamente un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a realizar su objetivo. Hugo se encuentra bastante agradecido con las personas que colaboraron con el y le ayudaron a salir adelante.
texts.en:
Hugo is a 33 year-old father who lives with his wife and child in the city of Reque.  This is an area with considerable commercial activity which is located 20 minutes from the city of Chiclayo.  Hugo provides a stone cutting and gravestone making business.  He cuts stone to make decorations for the outside and inside of houses.  He also uses his skills to make gravestones.

Hugo's skills have allowed him to become very well known in his area and he has a stable demand for his services.  Hugo has had a previous loan funded by Kiva through Edpyme Alternativa's seed money.  On that occasion he acquired some materials and tools that he needed to meet the demand that he had.  With the money he made from his business he helped his wife to set up a small grocery store where she sells all sorts of daily-use products such as groceries and essentials.  Hugo would currently like to acquire more products so that they can expand the store since demand has increased lately.  For this reason, he is requesting a new loan for 2000 Peruvian soles which will help him to achieve his goal.  Hugo is very grateful to the people who help fund his loans and help him to get ahead in life.

loans.use: To acquire more merchandise to expand his grocery store as demand has increased lately

loans.name: Henry

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “ÑAUPASUNCHIS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Henry; el tiene 36 años de edad y es soltero y tiene 1 hijo; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de fotocopiadora, el tiene una pequeña tienda donde realiza fotocopias, anillados y empastados de cuadernos, tesis entre otros, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar la fotocopiadora. El  socio solicita el préstamo para implementar la fotocopiadora.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: The member belongs to the “ÑAUPASUNCHIS” community bank. The bank is located in the Cusco district, in the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco. The member is Mr Henry. He is 36, single, and has one child. He alternates his daily activities with his photocopy store. He has a small store where he makes photocopies and binds documents (theses and other items). He wants to expand and improve his business. He is requesting this loan to install a photocopier. He is happy to have this loan and promises to pay the quotas.

loans.use: the member is requesting this loan to install a photocopier.

loans.name: Gervis Valentin

texts.es:
Gervis Valentin R. I. tiene 22 años de edad, Es soltero vive con su papá en el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar. No tiene 4hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. TRES DE NOVIEMBRE, Esta compuesta por 28 socios y esta a 90 minutos de  la oficina se encuentra dentro de los límites del Cantón Chillanes. Esta Ventanilla se dedica labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de arroz, plátano, maíz, cacao, naranja, yuca. Esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Gervis Valentin se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de arroz, plátano, maíz, cacao, naranja, yuca. Compra sus productos en Mata de cacao y sus ventas se realizan en el Comercial  Matilde Esther y vende los  productos en Bucay.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para el cultivo de arroz, plátano, maíz, cacao, naranja, yuca Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es tener una casa.

Le gusta el deporte.
texts.en: Gervis Valentin R. I. is 22. He is single and lives with his father in the Chillanes Canton, Bolivar province. He does not have any children. The V.R.C. Tres de Noviembre group has 28 members and is 90 minutes from the office, within the limits of the Chillanes Canton. This region is dedicated to short-cycle agricultural labour; the sowing of rice, bananas, corn, cocoa, oranges and yucca. They spend a lot of time doing this work. Gervis Valentin works in agriculture, sowing rice, bananas, corn, cocoa, oranges and yucca. He purchases his products in Mata de Cacao and sells in the Matilde Esther Market and in Bucay. He is requesting this loan to purchase agricultural inputs and fertilizers for the cultivation of rice, bananas, corn, cocoa, oranges and yucca. The support of this loan will help him economically to supply his needs. He confronts challenges such as plagues, diseases and the varied climate. His dream is to have a house. He enjoys sports.

loans.use: agricultural inputs and fertilizers

loans.name: Esther

texts.es: Esther, de 40 años,  de carácter muy amable y solidario, es muy laboriosa, vive en su casa propia, junto a su esposo y sus 2 hijos. La actividad a la que Esther se dedica, es la compra y venta de bisuterías, concernientes en aretes, collares, pulseras, ganchos y vichas de artesanías y fantasías finas. Estas mercaderías los compran del mercado central de Lima y seguidamente los envía mediante la empresa interprovincial,  a la provincia Pucallpa (la selva peruana), en donde recepciona sus familiares, quienes se dedican a la distribución. Es así, que realiza su trabajo por más de 2 años, buscando nuevos diseños y descubriendo nuevos proveedores; quienes le dejan a precios mucho más asequibles que los tiendas comerciales. Por lo tanto su negocio le  resulta muy rentable a Esther, por lo que se siente muy contenta. Además, tiene mucho más tiempo para dedicarse a sus hijos. En adelante, se ha propuesto  terminar de construir su casa de material noble. Es sus 11avo crédito con MFP, y sabe que le será muy útil para continuar realizando su negocio. Por ello, se compromete pagar todas sus cuotas  como lo vino haciendo hasta hoy en día. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará mercaderías en bisuterías, de esa manera cumplir con los pedidos pendientes de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Esther, 40, is a kind, caring and hard-working woman. She lives in her own home together with her husband and two children. Esther works selling costume jewelry such as earrings, bracelets, necklaces, barrettes, hand-made headbands and imitation jewelry. 

Esther buys merchandise from the Lima’s central market and then sends it to the province Pucallpa (Peruvian jungle) where distributors receive the goods. This is how Esther has done business for over two years, looking for new designs and finding new suppliers that allow her to keep prices more affordable than department stores. For the most part, Esther’s business is very profitable, which is why Esther is pleased. In addition, she has more time to devote to her children. 

Going forward, Esther plans to finish construction on her home with quality materials. This is her 11th loan with Microfinanzas Prisma (MFP) and she knows that it will be very useful to her as she continues growing her business. She commits to making timely payments as she has continued to do to date. With the loan she requests, Esther will buy costume jewelry to satisfy the requests of her customers.

loans.use: Purchase costume jewelry merchandise to meet customer demand.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es:
Antonio tiene 45 años de edad, es casado y reside junto a su esposa y a sus hijos en el sector Tranca Fanupe, uno de los caseríos que conforman el distrito de Mórrope, una zona agrícola que está poblada principalmente por gente humilde y bastante trabajadora. Pertenece a la provincia de Lambayeque y esta situada a más de una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a trabajar en labores asociadas a la agricultura desde que era joven. El cría ganado ovino y animales menores en la parte posterior de su domicilio.
