Usualmente comercializa la leche que producen sus vacas entre sus vecinos. Los animales menores los comercializa entre los negociantes de la zona y el público en general una vez que hayan alcanzado su desarrollo completo. Por otro lado Antonio también se dedica a trabajar en la agricultura como peón en los campos de cultivos vecinos.

Los ingresos que percibe de estas actividades le ayudan a sacar adelante a su familia, por ello Antonio siempre está buscando la manera de sacar adelante su negocio. Actualmente el desea adquirir alimento parta sus animales de modo que estos puedan desarrollarse de mejor modo y pueda brindar una mejor producción, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Antonio, 45, is married and lives together with his wife and children in Tranca Fanupe, one of the villages that belong to the district of Mórrope, an agricultural region populated mainly by humble and hard-working people. It belongs to the province of Lambayeque and is located more than an hour outside of the city of Chiclayo. 

Antonio has worked in agriculture since he was young. He breeds sheep and small animals in the back of his house. Usually, he sells the milk from his cows to neighbors. He sells the young animals to local merchants and to the general public once they have completely developed. In addition, Antonio also works as a laborer in one of the neighboring fields. 

The income earned from these activities help Antonio care for his family. He is always looking for ways to get ahead in his business. He wishes to buy food for his animals so that they can develop better and he can supply better production. For this purpose, Antonio has decided to request a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 1,500 soles (USD 500).

loans.use: Purchase animal feed for better growth and prodcution

loans.name: Norma Eulogia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “QORICHUSPA”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Norma; ella tiene 50 años. Tiene 2 hijos y ella es casada;  La socia se dedica  ala compra y venta de materiales educativos, la socia viaja a la ciudad de Juliaca a comprar todo tipo de materiales de librería para la época escolar y para todo el resto del año, la socia viaja al menos 3 veces al año para implementar su negocio y poder así tener variedad de mercadería y actualizar sus productos educativos. La socia compra también corrospun para realizar figuras como el cuerpo humano,  animales de la granja entre otros y venderlos a pedido a los diferentes centros educativos y jardines de la ciudad. La socia en esta ocasión requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales para la elaboración de cuerpos humanos y hacerlos didácticos para los jardines que comenzarán en la quincena de enero las clases de verano y vacacionales. La socia necesita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de materiales de corrospun para realizar figuras educativas.

La socia está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Norma belongs to the QORICHUSPA Communal Bank which is located in the district of Huanchac, province and department of Cusco.  She is 50 years old and married with 2 children.  

She is engaged in the business of buying and selling educational materials. She travels to the city of Juliaca to purchase all types of materials from the bookstore for the school term and for the rest of the year.  In order to run her business, she travels at least 3 times a year so she will have a variety of merchandise to make her educational products.  

She also buys corrospum (a micro-porous material similar to plastic) to make figures such as the human body, and farm animals (among others), and sells them on order to various schools and kindergartens in the city.  

Norma is requesting this loan to buy materials to make models of the human body and to make didactic materials for the kindergarten as summer vacation classes will begin on the fifteenth of January.  She needs the loan to purchase corrospum (a micro-porous material similar to plastic) to make educational figures.

She is happy to receive the loan and is committed to making her payments according to the established terms.

loans.use: The member needs the loan to purchase corrospum to make educational figures.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy fabric to decorate premises where events take place

loans.name: Cesar Augusto

texts.es:
Cesar Augusto tiene 29 años de edad, es soltero y reside junto a su familia en el distrito de Olmos, una zona agrícola de regular movimiento comercial que se encuentra situada en la provincia de Lambayeque, a casi dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la elaboración y venta de bebidas y refrescos en un puesto ambulante situado en una de las calles céntricas de su distrito. El prepara sus bebidas en su domicilio y las vende a diario entre los transeúntes de la zona. La zona es de clima semitropical, por lo que existe calor durante la mayor parte del año, siendo los meses de mayor calor los correspondientes al verano (tres a cuatro primeros meses de cada año), debido a este factor climático su negocio siempre cuenta con clientela estable.

Los ingresos que el percibe de estas actividades los utiliza para ayudar a su familia con el sostenimiento de su economía diaria. Cesar desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de fruta fresca y materiales, de modo que pueda aumentar su producción y ventas, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1800 nuevos soles con los cuales planea lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
Cesar Augusto is 29 years old, single, and lives with his family in the Olmos district, an agricultural zone with steady commercial activity. It is located in the province of Lambayeque, almost two hours from the city of Chiclayo.

He works making and selling refreshments and soft drinks at a stand located on one of the central streets of his district. He prepares his refreshments at home and sells them daily to the people passing by the area. The area climate is semi-tropical so it is hot for the majority of the year, the hottest months being during the summer (the first three or four months of each year). Due to this climate, his business always has a stable clientele.

He uses the income he earns from this business to help his family with their daily needs. Cesar wants to expand his business with the purchase of fresh fruit and materials so that he can increase his production and sales. For this reason, he is requesting a loan of 1,800 Peruvian Nuevos Soles (PEN) from Edpyme Alternativa with which he plans to achieve his goal.

loans.use: To expand his business with the purchase of fresh fruit and materials.

loans.name: María Consuelo

texts.es:
María Consuelo es una madre de familia de 48 años de edad que reside junto a su familia en uno de los caseríos que conforman el distrito de Pacora, una zona agrícola de regular movimiento comercial que se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Lambayeque, aproximadamente a una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Ella cuenta con una pequeña bodega instalada en su domicilio en donde ofrece a sus clientes diversos productos de uso diario entre productos de primera necesidad y abarrotes. El negocio ya cuenta con cuatro años de antigüedad y durante ese tiempo ella siempre se ha esforzado por brindar a sus clientes productos de calidad y un buen servicio. Gracias a ello actualmente cuenta con una clientela estable y fidelizada. El negocio le sirve para ayudar a su esposo con el sostenimiento de la economía de su familia.

María Consuelo desea adquirir más productos para poder ampliar su negocio y satisfacer la demanda con la que cuenta, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
María Consuelo is a 48-year-old mother who lives with her family in one of the settlements that make up the district of Pacora, an agricultural zone with steady commercial activity. It is located in the province of Lambayeque, approximately an hour from the city of Chiclayo.

She has a small grocery store in her house where she sells different everyday products to her customers, among basic household goods and groceries. The business is already four years old and during this time, she has always made an effort to provide her customers with good quality products and good service. Thanks to this, she currently has a stable and loyal clientele. The business allows her to help her husband with the family’s needs.

María Consuelo wants to obtain more goods to be able to expand her business and meet the demand that she has. For this reason, she is requesting a loan of 2,000 Peruvian Nuevos Soles (PEN) from Edpyme Alternativa that will help her to achieve her goal.

loans.use: To obtain more goods to be able to expand her business and meet the demand.

loans.name: Maria Cristina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “QORICHUSPA”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Maria Cristina; ella tiene 49 años. Tiene 3 hijos y ella es casada;  La socia se dedica  a la administración de su propio restaurante, ella tiene un restaurante y prepara diferentes menús y extras a la carta en este local ella acondicionó un pequeño espacio en el cual exhibe adornos, vasos con decoraciones, flores, trabajos manuales y todo con motivos de matrimonios y fiestas de quinceaños, también hay para bautizos y otros eventos, la socia destina este espacio para promocionar la venta y alquiler de arreglo y armado de fiestas y eventos diversos. La socia  requiere el préstamo para la compra de adornos para la nueva famosa hora loca que existe en todas las fiestas desde las infantiles hasta los matrimonios, esta hora trae unos cotillones con trajes incluidos para bailar sin parar durante una hora. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar nuevos adornos y productos para amenizar la hora loca en todo evento.

La socia está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Maria Cristina is a member of the “QORICHUSPA” community bank which is located in Huanchac district, in Cusco province and department.

Maria Cristina is 49 years old.  She is married and has 3 children.  Her business is running her own restaurant.  Maria Cristina has a restaurant where she makes different set meals and a la carte meals.  She adapted a small space in her premises where she displays decorations, decorated vases, flowers and handicrafts for weddings, 15th birthday celebrations and also for baptisms and other events.  This space is used to promote the sale and rental of decorations and supplies for parties and other events.  She requires this loan to buy decorations for the new famous 'crazy hour' which takes place in all parties, from children's parties to wedding parties.  This hour sees an elaborate dance, with costumes included, where all the guests dance for an hour without stopping.  She is requesting this loan to buy new decorations and products for livening up 'crazy hour' in all these events.

Maria Cristina is happy to be receiving a loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: To buy new decorations and products to liven up 'crazy hour' at different events

loans.name: Maria Milagros

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “ÑAUPASUNCHIS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Srta. Maria Milagros; ella tiene 23 años de edad y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el estudio de la carrera profesional de Historia, ella estudia en la universidad para que así pueda trabajar en alguna institución y sacar adelante a su familia, la socia quiere seguir mejorando en sus estudios. La socia solicita el préstamo para uso personal y comprarse algunas cosas que necesita para la universidad.                                     
                   
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Laura Aida is a member of the “ÑAUPASUNCHIS” community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Laura Aida is 23 years old, married and has 3 children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her work.  She is a retired teacher and through her work she gets her children ahead in life.  She would like to own a grocery store.  She is requesting this loan for personal use, to support her household.

Laura Aida is happy to be receiving a loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: For personal use.  To support her household

loans.name: Pascual

texts.es: Pascual, de 57 años, es un asombroso padre soltero de 2 hijos: Elías, de 27 y Elizabeth, de 22 años de edad. En unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la ciudad de La Merced (selva central peruana). Las manos prodigiosas de este talentoso hombre le enseñaron a depender hace 5 años, de lo que hoy es su mejor pasatiempo y distracción “la sastrería”, ahí confecciona prendas de vestir, además de hacer composturas, teñidos, planchados, y demás servicios que brinda en su propio taller, ubicado en una zona estratégica de la ciudad. Lo que más le gusta a este talentoso hombre, es poder crear sus propias prendas de vestir, pues según afirma, “es una diversión”. Por ello más adelante está pensando, acondicionar su taller con una pequeña tienda de venta de ropa que el mismo confeccionará. Es el segundo crédito con MFP, y como socio activo de su banco comunal espera seguir trabajando conjuntamente con sus integrantes, y de esa manera lograr sus objetivos. De obtener el crédito podrá adquirir diversas telas para la confección de diferentes prendas de vestir.
texts.en:
Pascual, age 57, is an amazing single father of two children: Elías (age 27) and Elizabeth (age 22). His family lives in his own home located in the city of La Merced in the central Peruvian jungle. The prodigious hands of this talented man have taught him to become self-dependent for the past five years. Today he spends most of his time and energy tailoring, which includes making and mending clothes. In addition, he provides dyeing and ironing services from his own shop located in a strategic area of the city. What this talented man enjoys most is designing his own clothes because he says “it is fun”. Later on he plans to convert his workshop into a small clothing store where he can sell the garments he makes.

This is his second loan with MFP. As a member of his Communal Bank, Pascual hopes to continue working with the other members to achieve their objectives. With the loan he will receive, Pascual will acquire various fabrics to produce different types of clothes.

loans.use: Purchase fabrics in different colors and styles

loans.name: La Fuente De Cristo 1, 2, 3 Group

texts.en:
Marcelo is the coordinator of his group, La fuerza de Cristo 1, 2, & 3 (The strenght of Christ). He makes his home in a simple structure with his wife and a child. He says that his most difficult challenge have been to develop his business.

Marcelo is excited to be taking his third loan with Esperanza, having successfully repaid his previous loans and grown his business. He has had his business for 5 years. He plans to use this loan to invest in his business to buy rice, flour and other foods.  He will use the profits to buy a vehicle that he needs to transport the goods to his business.

Marcelo's story is representative of his group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican (many of whom recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti) clients generally. His group is located in the rural areas surrounding La Romana, where the sugarcane harvest and tourist industry dominate the economy. This area, like nearly all impoverished areas of the Dominican Republic, suffers from unreliable running water (none of which is potable) and electricity.

loans.use: To buy rice, beans, sugar, oil, etc.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.es:
Cristina de 42 años de edad, es madre soltera de una niña de 12 añitos la que acaba de culminar su primaria, habita en la Zona # 7 en el Municipio de Nueva Guinea junto a sus padres quienes dependen de ella y a su vez le cuidan a su niña cuando ella sale a trabajar.  la Señora Cristina labora como docente de primaria en la Escuela Miguel Larreynaga ubicada en la Colonia el Serrano desde hace 6 años de donde obtiene sus ingresos mensuales para el sustento de su Familia, Ha venido creando sus propios activos por ser una mujer esforzada y muy trabajadora.  

Solicita su tercer crédito para invertirlo en remodelación de una habitación misma que construyo con credito anterior mediante Kiva, por tanto agradece mucho este apoyo que le ha permitido dar mejores condiciones en su vivienda y a la vez a su familia.  

Su mayor sueño en la vida es que su familia goce de salud y mejorar sus condiciones de vida .
texts.en:
Cristina is 42 years old.  She is a single mother and has a 12 year-old daughter who has just finished elementary school.  She lives in Area #7 of the town of Nueva Guinea together with her parents who are dependent on her.  Her parents help to look after her daughter when she goes out to work.

Cristina works as an elementary school teacher in Miguel Larreynaga School which is located in El Serrano district.  She has worked there for 6 years and makes a monthly wage with which she supports her family.  She has been creating her own assets as she is a very dedicated and hard-working woman.

Cristina is requesting her third loan to invest in remodeling a room that she built with a previous Kiva loan.  She is very grateful for this support which has allowed her to provide her home and family with better conditions.

Cristina's biggest dream in life is for her family to enjoy good health and to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: To remodel a room

loans.name: Florencia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” CHIKON”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia D. Urubamba y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Florencia; ella tiene 46 años D. edad, casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio D. restaurante  ella trabaja todos los dias atendiendo almuerzos y cenas, siendo esta la única actividad que realiza por el momento y D. esta forma saca a su familia adelante.  

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra D. insumos como arroz, azúcar, menestras entre otros mas para su negocio.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos D. su cuota
texts.en:
Florencia is a member of the "CHIKON” community bank which is located in Urubamba district, in Urubamba province, in Cusco department.

Florencia is 46 years old, married and has 2 children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her restaurant business.  She works in her restaurant every day, making lunches and dinners.  This is the only business activity that she pursues at the moment and it is how she gets her family ahead in life.

Florencia is requesting a loan so that she can buy supplies such as rice, sugar, vegetables, etc. for her business.  She is happy to be receiving a loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: To buy supplies such as rice, sugar, vegetables, etc. for her business

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María, de 39 años, vive con su papá Helman, de 65 años, y su mamá Rosa, de 56 años. Ambos en unión familiar viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la ciudad de La Merced (selva central peruana). Está exitosa mujer se dedica hace 8 años a la venta de comida, en un restaurante que abrió en sociedad con su mamita Rosa a la que quiere mucho. Lo que más le gusta a María es cocinar comida criolla, ya que eso le permite dar pensión a los que trabajan en la policía nacional del Perú, donde tiene que cocinar una porción considerable para el desayuno, almuerzo y cena. Sin embargo está pensando abrir una tienda grande y bien equipada de mercadería como ropa variada y regalos para toda ocasión, y según menciona en estos meses ya dará el primer paso. Es el quinto crédito con MFP, y se siente orgullosa de trabajar con los integrantes de su banco comunal. De obtener el crédito solicitado, podrá comprar prendas de vestir, juguetes y demás pedidos de sus clientes y amistades que tiene.
texts.en: María is 39 years old and lives with her 65-year-old father, Helman, and her 56-year-old mother, Rosa.  They live together in a house that they own, located in the city of La Merced in the central Peruvian jungle.  This successful woman has worked selling food for eight years in a restaurant that she opened in collaboration with her mother, who she loves very much.  What María likes most is cooking Creole food because it allows her to provide meals for the people who work for the Peruvian National Police.  There, she has to cook a considerable portion for breakfast, lunch and dinner.  However, she is planning to open a large store that is well-equipped with merchandise such as varied clothing and gifts for every occasion.  She mentions that in the months to come, she will take the first step.  This is her fifth loan with MFP and she is proud to work with the members of her communal bank.  In obtaining the loan requested, she will be able to buy clothing, toys and the other requested items from her customers and friends.

loans.use: To buy clothing, toys and other household items

loans.name: Eulalia

texts.en:
The member belongs to the “Pro Desarrollo” cooperative bank, which is located in the Pisac district of the province of Calca.

Her name is Eulalia, and she is 35 years old.  Eulalia is married and has three children.  She requested her loan of $100 to invest in her business in the sale of vegetables.  Each day, she will sell her vegetables from a stall in the Pisac market, and will purchase more inventory with her loan.

loans.use: To invest in  a vegetable business

loans.name: Liz Ayde

texts.es: Liz Huamán tiene 29 años de edad vive en el distrito de Lurigancho Chosica, ella se dedica a la realización de eventos sociales  y a su  vez estudia en la universidad educación primaria, el cual decide estudiar ya que a los 18 años comenzó trabajando de auxiliar de educación en un pequeño colegio cerca a su casa, de ahí emprende este desafío  por la educación, el cual es una carrera que la apasiona y la llena de alegría. En el futuro el gustaría culminar con sus estudios  y poder tener su propia escuela. Con el presente préstamo lo invertirá en los pagos de sus estudios ya que recién va cursando el cuarto año de estudios. Liz Huamán es una mujer con mucha iniciativa y con grandes proyectos  a futuro y tiene una dedicación especial con los niños que son el motivo de sus estudios.
texts.en: Liz Huamán is 29 years old and lives in the district of Lurigancho Chosica.  She works organizing social events and studies elementary education at the university as well.  She decided to study this because when she was 18, she began working as a teaching assistant at a small school near her house.  There, she undertook the challenge of education, a career which she is passionate about and fills her with joy.  In the future, she would like to finish her studies and be able to have her own school.  She will invest this current loan in her school payments because he is just starting her fourth year of college.  Liz Huamán is a woman with a lot of initiative and has big plans for the future.  She has a special dedication for children who are the reason for her studies.

loans.use: For her monthly university payment

loans.name: Santos Esther

texts.es:
Doña Santos Esther de 33  años  de edad, tiene 2 hijos una mujer de 19 años que estudia su 5to año secundaria y el varon de 10 años que estudia su primaria; su esposo trabaja como agricultor en la parcelita que ellos poseen y le ayuda con los gastos familiares; ella se desempeña como docente de primaria en la comarca Maritza Quezada a niños campesinos de esa comunidad, ejerciendo esta labor desde hace 10 años lo que antes daba clase en la Escuela Rafaela Herrera, es una persona bien querida por sus compañeros de trabajo y vecinos, ademas es muy responsable con sus compromisos. 

Solicita su cuarto crédito para invertir en mejora de su vivienda la cual ha venido construyendo con el apoyo de Kiva ya que ésta sería la segunda vez que recibe el Beneficio con Financiamiento de Kiva y esta muy agradecida por este beneficio que le permite brindarle mejores condiciones de vida a su familia. 

Su mayor sueño es que sus hijos gocen de buena salud y sean personas de bien.
texts.en:
Santos Esther is 33 years old.  She has 2 children: a 19 year-old daughter who is in her fifth year of high school and a 10 year-old son who is in elementary school.  Her husband works as a farmer on a small plot of land that they own and helps her with their family's expenses.  

Santos Esther works as an elementary school teacher in Maritza Quezada region.  She teaches peasant children in this community and has been doing the job for 10 years.  Before doing this job she used to give classes at Rafaela Herrera School.  She is very well liked by her work colleagues and neighbors.  She is also very responsible with her obligations.

Santos Esther is requesting her fourth loan to invest in improving her home which she has been building with support from Kiva.  This will be the second time that she has benefited from a Kiva loan and she is very grateful because Kiva's loans are enabling her to provide her family with better living conditions.

Her biggest dream is for her children to enjoy good health and to become good people.

loans.use: To improve her home

loans.name: Wilber Fernando

texts.es:
Wilber de profesión optometrista tiene su propio negocio de una Óptica ambulante, su esposa es auxiliar de la óptica, trabajando en conjunto para lograr el progreso en su negocio y en su vivienda. Tiene como proyecto la construcción completa de su hogar. Gracias al apoyo de la financiera ha ido construyendo poco a poco la parte que más ha necesitado mejorar. El negocio ha sido familia ya que su padre lo inicio y ahora lo administra don Wilber. 
El préstamo que solicita será invertido en la compra de materiales de construcción como: cemento, lamina de zinc, alambre amare, bloques, perlines y otros materiales. Realizando la obra de la construcción de un cuarto y remodelar partes de la casa obteniendo seguridad, protección y comodidad.
texts.en:
Wilber is an optometrist by profession and has his own mobile optical business. His wife works as his assistant. They work together in order to advance their business and their home. Wilber has plans to complete the construction of his house. Thanks to the financial support he has been able to build a little bit at a time and needs more to continue with the improvements. His business has always been in the family since his father started it. Don Wilber is now the one managing it.

The loan he requested will be invested in the purchase of construction materials such as cement, sheets of zinc, fastening wire, blocks, crossbeams, and other items. He plans to complete the construction of a room and remodel parts of the house to achieve greater security, protection, and comfort.

loans.use: Complete the construction of a room and other home remodeling projects

loans.name: Ceferina

texts.en: Ceferina belongs to the “Pro Desarrollo” cooperative bank, which is located in the Pisac district of the province of Calca. She is 38 years old and married with four children. She requested her loan for $500 to invest in her business selling handicrafts.  Each day, she will sell her handicrafts, clothes made from alpaca, and souvenirs in the Plaza de Pisac. She is very happy with the loan granted, and commits to making her payments within the established time frame.

loans.use: To Invest in a Handicrafts Business

loans.name: Elba Del Socorro

texts.es:
Elba de 28 años de edad, vive en la Ciudad de Nueva Guinea, costado sur del Parque, es madre soltera de un niño de 5 añitos, vive con su mamá que que le ayuda cuidandole a su hijo cuando ella sale a trabajar, recibe ayuda para el niño por parte del papá, ella trabaja como docente desde hace  4 años en la Escuela Cesar Augusto Salinas Pinell ubicada en la zona # 1 de Nueva Guinea,  esta joven es una mujer bien responsable, honesta y  trabajadora  que ha luchado para que a su hijo no le falte lo basico en el hogar.  

Esta solicitando su segundo crèdito, para remodelar su vivienda y asi brindar mejores condiciones a su linda familia. 

Su mayor sueño en la vida es que su hijo estudie para que sea un hombre de bien y que goce de mucha salud.
texts.en:
Elba is 28 years old and lives in the city of Nueva Guinea, on the south side of the Park.  She is a single mother and has a 5 year-old child.  Elba lives with her mom who helps her by looking after her son when she goes out to work.  She receives help from the child's father.  Elba has been working as a teacher at Cesar Augusto Salinas Pinell School which is located in Area #1 of Nueva Guinea for four years.  This young woman is very responsible, honest and hard working and she has worked hard so that her son doesn't want for any essentials in their home.

Elba is requesting her second loan to remodel her home and thereby provide better conditions for her beautiful family.  Her biggest dream in life is for her son to study so that he becomes a good man and for him to enjoy good health.

loans.use: To remodel her home

loans.name: Nora Bertha

texts.en: This member belongs to the Pro Desarrollo cooperative bank, which is located in the Pisac district of the province of Calca. Her name is Nora Bertha, and she is 69 years old. Nora Bertha is married and has eight children. She plans on investing her loan in her condiments business. During the week, she will sell condiments maD. from garlic, peanut and peppers in the market of Pisac. On Thursday and Friday, she takes her business to the Pisac fair. She is very happy with the loan granted, and commits to making her payments within the established time frame.

loans.use: Invest in the condiment business

loans.name: Fredesminda

texts.es:
Fredesminda de 27 años de edad, esta joven no tiene hijos, vive con su esposo su esposo quien trabaja como asesor de crèdito el cual la ayuda con los gastos familiares ya que son bien unidos y responsables , ella labora como docente de primaria en la Escuelita colonia Los Pintos en el Municipio de Nueva Guinea, es una persona esforzada que ha obtenido lo que tiene con sacrificio, el cual desea seguir progresando en la vida.  

Solicita su segundo crèdito para invertirlo en compra de  materiales de construcciòn para reparar la cocina de su vivienda, de esta manera brindar mayor seguridad a sus bienes y aumentar el valor comercial de su vivienda. 

Su mayor sueño en la vida  es estar bien con Dios, que su familia permanezca bien unida y mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Fredesminda is 27 years old.  This young woman doesn't have any children.  She lives with her husband who works as a loan consultant and helps with the family expenses since they are very united and responsible.

Fredesminda works as an elementary school teacher in Colonia Los Pintos School, in the town of Nueva Guinea.  She is a very dedicated person who has obtained everything she has through hard work and sacrifice and who would like to continue making progress in life.

Fredesminda is requesting her second loan to invest in buying building materials to fix up the kitchen in her house so that she can provide her belongings with more safety and increase the commercial value of her home.  Her biggest dream in life is to be in good standing with God, for her family to remain close and to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: To fix up her kitchen

loans.name: Rodolfo

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “ÑAUPASUNCHIS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Rodolfo; el tiene 31 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo de cheff de cocina, el socio prepara diferentes tipos de platos como tradicionales y de gourmet, el socio quiere tener un negocio de restaurant. El  socio solicita el préstamo para el mantenimiento de su casa.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This borrower belongs to the Ñaupasunchis communal bank. The bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province and department of Cusco.

Rodolfo is 31 years old, has a common-law marriage and one child. He alternates his daily activities with his work as a kitchen chef. He prepares different types of dishes such as traditional and gourmet, and he wants to have a restaurant business. He is requesting the loan for housing maintenance.

Rodolfo is happy for the loan and promises to make his loan payments.

loans.use: Housing maintenance

loans.name: Isidora

texts.es: Isidora, de 57 años, está casada con Francisco, de 61 años. Ambos tienen 5 hijos, pero solo vive con su hija Sonia, de 30 años de edad, y su nieta Alexia, de 4 años de edad. En unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la ciudad de La Merced (selva central peruana). El trabajo al que se dedica Isidora, es la venta de comida para ello tiene un restaurante que abrió en una zona céntrica de la ciudad, donde trabaja con la ayuda de su hija. Hace 7 años que emprendió este negocio, y según menciona se siente realizada y con muchos proyectos para el futuro, pues su buena disposición en la venta de comida le asegura su éxito, todos los días de lunes a viernes, prepara comida criolla, mientras que los fines de semana ella cocina platos típicos de la región, pues son las fechas donde la mayoría de los pobladores salen a pasear con su familia. Pero como la comida que prepara es muy buena, Isidora también ofrece pensión, sirviendo; desayuno, almuerzo y cena a un buen precio. Es el tercer crédito con MFP, y como socia nueva de su banco comunal se siente orgullosa por los ahorros obtenidos hasta el momento, ya que en una de las charlas que recibe, le enseñaron ahorrar e invertir. De obtener el crédito, lo invertirá en la compra sacos de arroz, azúcar, fideos, papa y demás insumos para la preparación de sus exquisitos platos, con ello podrá abastecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Isidora is 57 years old and is married to Francisco, who is 61 years old.  They have 5 children but only their daughter Sonia,30, and their granddaughter Alexia, 4, live with them. They live as a family in their own home located in the city of Merced (jungle in central Peru).  With the help of her daughter, Isidora runs a restaurant that is located in the city center. She started this business 7 years ago and it has been fulfilling for her along with the many projects she has planned for the future.  Her good disposition has ensured her restaurant success.  Every day, Monday through Friday, she prepares creole cuisine.  On the weekends she prepares traditional dishes from the region as this is when the majority of residents go walking with their families.  Since the food that she prepares is so good she offers board also, serving breakfast, lunch and dinner at an affordable price.  

This is her third loan with MFP.   As a new member of her communal bank she is proud of what she has saved to date since in one of their talks they taught her to save and invest.  She will use the loan to purchase sacks of rice, sugar, noodles, potatoes and other items for the preparation of her exquisite dishes that she will serve her customers.

loans.use: To purchase sacks of rice, sugar, noodles, potatoes and other items for the preparation of her dishes

loans.name: Brenda Gissel

texts.es:
Brenda de 30 años de edad, vive en la zona # 7 del ciclo 5 c. al sur en el Municipio de Nueva Guinea,  tiene un bebesito de 7 meses de nacido, la cual se siente muy feliz a pesar  que no recibe la ayuda del padre de su bebe ella ha luchado para que no le falte nada ya que es una persona emprendedora y muy trabajadora, ejerce la actividad de docente de secundaria en el Colegio Cesar Augusto Salinas Pinell, de donde recibe sus ingresos mensuales y de esta manera garantizar el sustento de su familia y sus obligaciones de pago mes a mes.  

Solicita su octavo crèdito para comprar materiales de construcciòn para repellar la habitaciòn y hecharle el piso el cual le permitirà mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de su familia.  

Su mayor sueño en la vida es que su hijo crezca sano y fuerte y que no le falte lo basico en el hogar.
texts.en:
Brenda is 30 years old and lives in Zone #7 ‘del cico 5 c. al sur’ in the municipality of Nueva Guinea.  She has a little baby who is 7 months old and is happy despite not receiving help from her baby’s father.  She has fought so that her baby is not lacking anything, as she is an enterprising and very hardworking person.  She works as a secondary school teacher at Colegio Cesar Augusto Salinas Pinell, where she earns her monthly income.  This is how she guarantees support for her family and her payments month to month.

She is requesting her eighth loan to purchase construction materials to plaster the bedroom and to put on the floor, thus allowing her to improve her and her family’s living conditions.

Her biggest dream in life is for her son to grow healthy and strong, and to not lack the basics in the home.

loans.use: To plaster the bedroom

loans.name: Maria Ayde

texts.es:
La joven Maria Ayde de 32 años de edad vive con sus padres en el Municipio de Nueva Guinea de la Escuela Rigoberto Cabezas 1 c. al oeste,  ella aún no ha formado su propio hogar,  trabaja para el ministerio de Educaciòn desde hace 4 años, de donde recibe sus ingresos mensuales el cual le ayuda a su familia con los gastos del hogar ya que son una familia bien unida y humilde de escasos recursos econòmicos pero muy responsable en sus compromisos, ya que gozan de excelentes recomedaciones.  

Solicita su primer crèdito a la instituciòn con el apoyo de Kiva para construir una habitaciòn y asi tener mayor privacidad en su hogar, pues necesita su propio espacio. 

Su mayor sueño en la vida es ir poco a poco mejorando su vivienda y tener establidad laboral para seguir ayudando a su linda familia.
texts.en:
Maria Ayde is 32 years old and lives with her parents in the municipality of Nueva Guinea, one block west of the Rigoberto Cabezas School. She has still not formed her own home. She has worked for the Ministry of Education for four years. This is where she makes her monthly earnings which help her family with the household expenses, as they are a close-knit and humble family with limited financial resources. However, they are very responsible with their commitments, as they have excellent recommendations.

She is requesting her first loan from the lending institution with Kiva’s support in order to build a room and thus, have more privacy in their home as she needs her own space.

Her biggest dream in life is to improve their house, little by little, and to have work stability to continue helping her wonderful family.

loans.use: To build a room

loans.name: Anselmo

texts.en:
The member belongs to the “Pro Desarrollo” cooperative bank, which is located in the Pisac district of the province of Calca.

His name is Anselmo C.  P. and he is 57 years old.  Anselmo is married and has three children.  He is dedicated to the sale of clothes and also works as a tailor.  He is planning to invest his loan in his tailoring and clothes sale businesses.  He also works as an regional advisor to Pisac in the area of cleaning.

loans.use: To invest in a clothing and tailoring business

loans.name: Maria Nelly

texts.es:
Maria Nellys de 32 años de edad, cuenta con la ayuda de su esposo y sus padres, labora como docente de primaria desde hace cinco años en la Escuela Paulino Halsalla ubicada en la colonia Yolaina en el Municipio de Nueva Guinea, donde se desempeña con gran responsabilidad y honestidad, Vecinos y Amigos manifiestan muy buenas referencias de su persona, por ser una persona luchadora, responsable y bien querida en la colonia donde ella habita.  

Solicita su tercer crèditoa Kiva para Repellar la casa ya que poco a poco va comprando los materiales para construir su  vivienda y asi mantener el espiritu de superacion.  

Su sueño en la vida es que su linda familia permanezca siempre unida y goce de buena salud.
texts.en:
Maria Nelly is 32 years old and has the help of her husband and parents. She has worked for five years as an elementary school teacher at Paulino Halsalla School, located in the Yolaina neighborhood of the municipality of Nueva Guinea. She works there with great responsibility and honesty. Neighbors and friends give very good references about her for being a determined, responsible and well-liked person in the neighborhood where she lives.

She is requesting her third loan from Kiva to plaster the house, as she is buying the materials to build her house little by little and this way, maintain her spirit for self-improvement.

Her life dream is for her wonderful family to always be close-knit and healthy.

loans.use: To plaster the house

loans.name: Cruz

texts.es: La señora Cruz H., es casada tiene 49 años de edad y cuatro hijos aun a su cargo. Sus hijos asisten a la escuela. Su esposo trabaja como agricultor y le ayuda con los gastos de su casa. Doña cruz, cultiva junto con su esposo diferentes terrenos ahora están  cosechando diferentes productos como espinacas y ejote, los productos los vende en una  cooperativa local donde ella vive  y otra parte en el mercado local con sus clientes que ya la conocen. El préstamo lo solicita porque necesita invertir más en la compra de abono y semilla porque necesita seguir cultivando  nuevos productos ya que al terminar la cosecha  ella necesita tener ya sembrado otros cultivos. Su sueño es  terminar de darles estudio a sus hijos pequeños, aunque el trabajo en el campo no es fácil ella se siente contenta de poder tener la oportunidad de sacar adelante a su familia y es una mujer responsable en sus pagos ya que ella dice que es para corresponder a la confianza que se le ha dado a través del crédito.
texts.en: Ms. Cruz H. is 49 years old, married, and has four children who go to school and are still under her care.  Her husband works as a farmer and he helps her with the household expenses.  Cruz farms different lands with her husband and they are now harvesting different crops such as spinach and green beans.  She sells the crops in a local cooperative where she lives, and sells another part to her customers that already know her at the local market.  She is requesting the loan because she needs to invest more in the purchase of manure and seeds to continue growing new products, since she needs to have other crops already planted at the end of the harvest.  Her dream is to finish providing her young children with an education.  Although working in the field is not easy, she is happy to have the opportunity to get her family ahead.  She is a woman who is responsible with her payments because she says that it corresponds to the confidence provided through granting her the loan.

loans.use: To purchase manure and seeds for farming

loans.name: Cruz Esmelda

texts.es:
Cruz Emelda de 34 años de edad, tiene dos hijos un niño de 13 añitos que empieza sus estudios secundarios y una niña de 7 que estudia su primaria, cuenta con la ayuda de su esposo que trabaja como albañil y tambien ejerce la labor de agricultor produciendo en una parcelita que tienen en el Municipio de Nueva Guinea,  ambos comparten con los gastos familiares, ella labora como docente de primaria desde hace 11 años en la escuela Diriangen. 

Solicita nuevamente el apoyo de Kiva en su 7mo crèdito para areglar la cocina de su vivienda ya que necesita mejorar su vivienda y de esta manera darle mejor presentacion a la misma. 

Su sueño es tener salud, trabajo y una vivienda bonita con mejores condiciones.
texts.en:
Cruz Esmelda is 34 years old and has two children - a 13-year-old son starting high school and a 7-year-old daughter in elementary school.  She relies on her husband who works as a mason and also as a farmer, caring for a little plot of land he has in the municipality of Nueva Guinea.  Both she and her husband split the family expenses.   For the past 11 years, she has worked as a primary school teacher at the Diriangen School.    

She is seeking Kiva’s support again for a loan to repair her kitchen, which she needs to improve the look of her home. 

Her dream is to be healthy, have a job and a beautiful home, and better living conditions.

loans.use: To repair her kitchen.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es: Elizabeth, de 26 años, es una mujer soltera y trabajadora; que vive en compañía de su mamá Abelarda, de 52 y su papá Abraham, de 54 años de edad, a los que quiere y cuida en su casa propia ubicada en el caserío de Cumutay. Desde que tenia 20 años de edad, se dedico a la agricultura, sus principales cultivos constan de papa y alverjas; lo que más le gusta de su labor es poder cuidar de su becerra mientras limpia la maleza que crece entre sus sembríos, pero lo que no le gusta a Elizabeth, son las temporadas donde los agricultores cosechan gran cantidad de hortalizas, ya que saturan el mercado y no le permite tener buenas ganancias. Pero es en está temporada que ella, deja secar la alverja, la cual se convierte en semilla, vendiendo el saco de semilla de alverja a un mayor precio; en el mercado central de Tarma, lo que le permite estabilizar su economía. Por todos lo aciertos que tiene está pensando abrir un restaurante en su zona, ya que no existe una. Es el octavo crédito con MFP, y como mujer joven, asegura que el papel que cumple su banco comunal en su vida, es preponderante, ya que le ayuda a crecer y forjarse nuevas metas. De obtener el crédito comprará 15 sacos de abono orgánico que oscila entre los 100 nuevos soles aproximadamente.
texts.en:
Elizabeth is 26 years old and single.  She is a hard-working woman who lives with her mom, 52 year-old Abelarda, and her dad, 54 year-old Abraham.  She loves and looks after her parents in their own home which is located in the village of Cumutay.

Since she was 20 years old, Elizabeth has been working as a farmer.  Her main crops are potatoes and peas.  What she most likes about her work is being able to look after her calf while she clears away the weeds that grow between her crops.  What Elizabeth does not like are the seasons when farmers grow a large quantity of vegetables because they flood the market and she can't make good profits.  In this season she is leaving her pea crop to dry.  She will convert it into seed and will sell sacks of pea seed at a higher price in the central market in Tarma which will allow her to stabilize her finances.

With all the good decisions that she has made, Elizabeth is thinking of opening a restaurant in her area because there isn't one at present.

This is Elizabeth's eighth loan with MFP and, as a young woman, she assures us that her community bank plays a predominant role in her life since it helps her to grow and set herself new goals.  Elizabeth will use this loan to buy 15 sacks of organic fertilizer which cost around 100 Peruvian soles a sack.

loans.use: To buy 15 sacks of organic fertilizers

loans.name: Fanni Jovita

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “ÑAUPASUNCHIS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Fanni Jovita; ella tiene 36 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de bisutería como collares, aretes y pulseras, ella trabaja en forma independiente llevando a diferentes tiendas que venden bisutería, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de bisutería. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales para hacer los aretes, collares y pulseras.                     
                                  
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Fanni Jovita is a member of the “ÑAUPASUNCHIS” community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Fanni Jovita is 36 years old, single and has one child.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling costume jewelry such as necklaces, earrings and bracelets.  She works independently, taking her products to different stores that sell jewelry.  She would like to expand her jewelry business.  She is requesting this loan to buy materials for making earrings, necklaces and bracelets.

Fanni Jovita is pleased to be receiving a loan and she pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: To buy materials for making earrings, necklaces and bracelets

loans.name: Geilin

texts.es:
La profesora  Geilin de 31 años de edad tiene una niña de 12 añitos de edad, vive en la Colonia San Miguel en el Municipio de Nueva Guinea, su esposo ejerce las actividades acrigola en la parcela que poseen y le ayuda con los gastos familiares, ella trabaja como docente en el Nerpe Diriangen en la colonia San Miguel, se siente muy agradecida con Kiva por la ayuda Recibida en el credito anterior ya que gracias a esto pudo repellar las paredes de su casa. 

Solicita nuevamente crèdito con a Kiva mediante Afodenic para  acondicionar la vivienda, pintandola y anexandole divisiones que carece de ellas para darle una mejor presentacion a la misma. 

Su mayor sueño en la vida es que su preciosa familia goce de salud y que no le falte lo basico en el hogar.
texts.en:
Geilin is 31 years old and a teacher.  She has a 12 year-old daughter and lives in San Miguel neighborhood, in the city of Nueva Guinea.  Her husband does agricultural work on a plot of land that they own and helps her with the family expenses.

Geilin works as a teacher at the Diriangen Rural Education Center, in San Miguel neighborhood.  She is very grateful to Kiva for the help she received with her previous loan which she used to plaster the walls of her house.

Geilin is requesting a new loan from Kiva, through Afodenic, to remodel her home, painting it and putting up partition walls which she needs to give it a better appearance.

Geilin's biggest dream in life is for her precious family to enjoy good health and for them not to want for any basic necessities in their home.

loans.use: To fix the walls in her home

loans.name: Noemi

texts.en:
The member belongs to the “Pro Desarrollo” cooperative bank, which is located in the Pisac district of the province of Calca.

Her name is Noemi C. B., and she is 55 years old.  Noemi is married and has two children.  She requested a loan to invest in the purchase of more inventory for her handicraft business in Pisac around Christmas.  Specifically, she invested in blankets, sweaters, and jackets made from alpaca wool, and materials to create Nativity scenes for Christmas.  In Peru,the Nativity scene is more common than Christmas trees.

Noemi commits to making her payments within the established time frame.

loans.use: To invest in a handicrafts business

loans.name: Geovany Jose

texts.es:
El joven Geovany de 26 años de edad, vive en Colonia Puerto Principe, en Comarca los Cocos en el Municipio de Nueva Guinea, con su compañera de vida, el cual  trabaja como docente, ambos comparten los gastos familiares ya que son una familia bien unida; el  trabaja como director de la Escuela Pablo Antonio Cuadra desde hace 6 años; este joven es bien queridos por los docentes del colegio  y por los pobladores de la colonia donde habita por demostrar ser una psersona honrada, trabajadora y muy responsable.  

Solicita segundo crèdito para construir una habitaciòn y asi gozar de mejores condiciones en su vivienda. 

Su sueño en la vida es tener una vivienda bonita, seguir estudiando y que su familia permanezca bien con Dios.
texts.en:
Geovany is a young man of 26 who lives in Puerto Principe neighborhood, in the Los Cocos area of the city of Nueva Guinea, with his life partner.  Geovany works as a teacher.  Both he and his partner share their family expenses since they are a very united family.  He has been working as the principal of Pablo Antonio Cuadra School for 6 years.  This young man is very well liked by the teachers in his school and by the residents of his neighborhood as he is an honest, hard-working and very responsible person.

Geovany is requesting his second loan to build a room so that he can enjoy better conditions in his home.  His dream in life is to have a nice home, to continue studying and for his family to remain in good standing with God.

loans.use: To build a room

loans.name: Fortunata

texts.en:
The member belongs to the “Pro Desarrollo” cooperative bank, which is located in the Pisac district of the province of Calca.

Her name is Fortunata P. B. and she is 35 years old.  Fortunata is single and doesn´t have any children.  She is requesting the loan to invest in her vegetable business.  She sells many different types of vegetables (depending on the season) in the market of Pisac from 8am to 1pm in the afternoon.

Fortunata  commits to making her loan payments within the established time frame.

loans.use: to invest in a vegetable business

loans.name: Dolores Aurora

texts.es:
La profesora  Dolores de 37 años de edad, es madre soltera de una niña de 13 añitos de edad la que estudia su primaria, a pesar que no recibe la ayuda del papà de su  hija, dolores ha luchado para que no le falte nada a su pequeña, labora como docente de primaria desde hace 11 años desempeñandose con gran dedicaciòn y esmero. 

Està solicitando su sexto crèdito a AFODENIC con la ayuda de Kiva a quien agradece por el financiamiento anterior el que ocupo para construir su habitacion.  Requiere nuevo credito para construir una habitaciòn para la niña y asi gozar de mejores condiciones. 

Su sueño en la vida es que su hija siga estudiando para que sea una persona de bien y mejorar poco a poco su vivienda, al igual que no le falte el pan de cada dia.
texts.en:
Dolores is 37 years old and a teacher.  She is a single mother and has a 13 year-old daughter who is in school.  In spite of the fact that she doesn't receive any money from her daughter's father, Dolores has worked hard so that her little one hasn't wanted for anything.  She has been working as an elementary school teacher for 11 years.  She does her job with a great deal of commitment and care.

Dolores is requesting her sixth loan from AFODENIC, with Kiva's help.  She is grateful to Kiva for her previous loan which she used to build a room in her house.  She requires a new loan to build a room for her daughter so that she can live in better conditions.

Dolores' dream in life is for her daughter to continue studying so that she can grow up to be a good person.  She would also like to gradually improve her home and make sure that she and her daughter don't want for anything.

loans.use: To build a room

loans.name: Julia Rosa

texts.en:
The member belongs to the “Pro Desarrollo” cooperative bank, which is located in the Pisac district of the province of Calca.

Her name is Julia Rosa and she is 35 years old.  Julia Rosa is married and has three children.  She is requesting the loan to invest in her business of selling drinks on the street in Pisac.  Julia Rosa has a small cart where she can make different sorts of traditional Peruvian drinks from barley to mates and quinoa, and she will use her push cart to sell these drinks.  Generally in Peru, people will come to her cart to have a drink for around one Nuevo sole and stand by the cart until the drink is finished, handing her back the glass.

Julia Rosa commits to making her loan payments within the established time frame.

loans.use: To invest in a beverage business

loans.name: Rita De Los Angeles

texts.es:
Rita de 28 años de edad, tiene una niña de 5 años, cuenta con la ayuda de su marido para los gastos familiares, el tiene su propio negocio de relojeria, ella trabaja como docente  desde hace 4 años en el colegio Cesar Augusto Salinas Pinell en la zona urbana de Nueva Guinea, es una joven  alegre, servicial y muy trabajadora, es bien querida por sus alumnos ya que siempre imparte sus clases con mucha dedicacaciòn y amor. 

Solicita nuevamente el apoyo de Kiva en su tercer  crèdito para invertirlo en reparacion de cocina la que gracias a este Financiador pudo constrirla, el cual ahora necesita mejorla y gozar  de buenas condiciones en el hogar.  

Su sueño en la vida es que su familia siempre permanezca en Uniòn y seguir estudiando para ser una profesional con mucho exito.
texts.en:
Rita is 28 years old and has a 5 year-old daughter.  She receives help from her husband in covering their family's expenses.  Her husband has his own watchmaking business.

Rita has been working as a teacher in Cesar Augusto Salinas Pinell School, in the urban area of Nueva Guinea for 4 years.  She is a happy, helpful and very hard-working young woman who is well liked by her pupils since she always gives her classes with a lot of dedication and love.

Rita is requesting Kiva's support again, with her third loan, as she would like to invest in repairing her kitchen which she was able to build thanks to her previous loans.  It now needs to be improved so that she can have her home in good condition.

Rita's dream in life is for her family to remain united and to continue studying so that she can be a very successful professional.

loans.use: To repair her kitchen

loans.name: Francisco Antonio

texts.es:
Francisco de 61 años, tiene 10 años con una tienda que le ha costado trabajar con esfuerzo y dedicación obtenerla. Con la buena administración que le ha dado durante todo ese tiempo ahora su tienda esta surtida. 

Viviendo en una zona periurbana llamada Perimetral ha trabajado desde las 06h00am hasta las 23h00pm todos los días vendiendo enlatados, frutas, granos, bebidas a un bajo costo. La esposa le ayuda con los gastos familiares vendiendo comida. Para seguir con su negocio él quiere comprar con el préstamo aceite, enlatados, granos etc. 

Para seguir progresando en su negocio él quiere comprar en el futuro un carro para tener más facilidad al obtener la mercadería para la tienda.
texts.en:
Francisco is 61 years old.  He has had his store for ten years.  It cost him great effort and dedication to get the store.  With the good administration that he has exercised during this time, he now has a store that is stocked.

He lives in a periurban zone called Perimetral.  He works every day from 6:00 a.m. until 11:00 p.m.  He sells canned goods, fruit, grains, and drinks for a low price.  His wife helps him with the family expenses by selling food.  In order to continue with his business he wants to use the loan to buy oil, canned goods, and grains, etc.

In order to continue progressing in his business, he wants to buy a car in the future.  This will make it easier to get the merchandise for the store.

loans.use: To buy oil and canned goods

loans.name: Fredy

texts.en:
The member belongs to the “Pro Desarrollo” cooperative bank, which is located in the Pisac district of the province of Calca.

His name is Fredy L. P. and he is 35 years old.  He has a common law wife and three children.  He is planning on using the loan to invest in the maintenance of his car.  He is a taxi driver in the town of Pisac occasionally taking tourists to the Pisac ruins.  

Fredy commits to making his loan payments within the established time frame.

loans.use: To invest in taxi maintenance

loans.name: Solidario Trabajadoras De San Tiago Group

texts.es: SOLIDARIO  trabajadoras D. Santiago está formado por tres señoras, doña Sandra Magali S. D. 31  años, Rosa T. D. 32 años, y doña Hilaria T. D. 38 años , Doña Sandra tiene 2 hijos está casada,  ella  venD. en  su tortillería los tres tiempos D. comida, D. lunes a sábado ya que los domingos asiste a la iglesia, ella también hace delantales típicos que luego venD.. Se levanta muy temprano para poder realizar sus actividades.solicita el credito para la compra D. maiz  Doña Rosa T. también hace delantales típicos y venD. en el mercado todo tipo D. verduras, como zanahorias, güisquil, tomate, güicoy u otros.Solicita el credito para la compra D. verduras,  Doña Hilaria T. venD. almuerzos en una fábrica todos los días D. lunes a viernes.  Ahora ellas desean solicitar este crédito para invertir en productos para la elavoracion D. comida  y realizar sus sueños y propósitos para este nuevo año.
texts.en:
The solidarity group 'Trabajadoras D. Santiago' (Hard-Working Women of Santiago) is maD. up of three ladies: 31 year-old Sandra Magali S., 32 year-old Rosa T. and 38 year-old Hilaria T..

Sandra is married and has 2 children.  She makes sales in her tortilla bakery during the day's three mealtimes, from Monday to Saturday.  She doesn't work Sundays as she goes to church.  She also makes traditional aprons which she sells.  Sandra gets up early every morning to do her work.  She is requesting this loan to buy corn.

Rosa T. also makes traditional aprons and she also sells all kinds of vegetables such as carrots, chayote, tomatoes, squash, etc, in the market.

Hilaria T. sells lunches in a factory every day from Monday to Friday. 

The ladies are requesting this loan to invest in products for making their food and to realize their dreams and goals for this new year.

loans.use: To buy products for making food.  To buy vegetables and corn.

loans.name: Las Peques 1 Group

texts.es: ESTE GRUPO SE LLAMA LAS PEQUES 1 PORQUE SON PERSONAS QUE DESDE SIEMPRE SE HAN DEDICADO A UN NEGOCIO EN ESPECÍFICO Y CON BASE EN GRANDES SACRIFICIOS HAN LOGRADO HACER CRECER SUS NEGOCIOS. IDENTIFICARSE COMO PEQUES ES UNA MANERA DE RECONOCER SU ESFUERZO CON SENCILLES. ESTÁ UBICADO EN ATLACOMULCO ESTADO DE MÉXICO. EL GRUPO ESTA CONFORMADO POR 10 INTEGRANTES. LA SEÑORITA YOLANDA N. TIENE 35 AÑOS Y ES PASANTE EN LA LICENCIATURA DE ADMINISTRACIÓN NO PUDO CONCLUIR SU CARRERA POR MOTIVOS ECONÓMICOS. CUANDO DEJÓ LA UNIVESIDAD COMENZÓ SU NEGOCIO CON VENTA EN CATÁLOGOS, DESPUÉS CON AYUDA DE LOS CRÉDITOS EMPEZÓ A VENDER, PRINCIPALMENTE LENCERIA, EN UN LOCAL. EN SU NEGOCIO LLEVA 3 AÑOS Y VARIAS PERSONAS COMENTAN QUE LES GUSTA COMPRARLE PORQUE APARTE DEL BUEN SERVICO SIEMPRE TIENEN NOVEDADES, Y HACEN TODO LO POSIBLE Y HASTA LO IMPOSIBLE POR CONSEGUIR LOS MODELOS QUE SOLICITAN EN EL MENOR TIEMPO POSIBLE. ELLA SE SIENTE ORGULLOSA DE PODER AYUDAR A SU MAMÁ CUANDO LO NECESITA Y TAMBIÉN DE ESTAR AHORRANDO PARA TENER UN MEJOR FUTURO APLICANDO SUS CONOCIMIENTOS EN ADMINISTRACIÓN.
texts.en:
This group is called 'Las Peques 1' (Kids 1) because they are people who have always dedicated themselves to one specific business and through great sacrifice they have managed to grow their businesses.  To identify themselves as kids is a way of recognizing their effort simply.  The group is located in Atacomulco, in the State of Mexico and has 10 members.

Yolanda N. is 35 years old.  She did a degree course in business administration but couldn't complete her studies for economic reasons.  When she left university, she started her business making catalog sales.  Then, with the help of loans, she started to sell mainly lingerie from a business premises.  She has been in her business for 3 years and several people comment that they like to buy from her because she provides a good service and always has new products.  She does everything possible (and even impossible) to acquire the products they request in the least amount of time possible.  Yolanda feels proud that she can help her mom when she needs it and she is saving so that she can have a better future, applying her knowledge of business administration.

loans.use: To invest in her business

loans.name: Bokk Jom Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité BOKK JOM est créé depuis 3 ans et demi lors de l'ouverture du Banc Villageois. Il est composé de 13 femmes issues du même quartier. Le groupe fait partie du Banc Villageois de TAKHIKAO

Madame ANTA G. assise au milieu du groupe avec une écharpe blanche sur les épaules et levant le doit est responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 45 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 5 enfants.

Elle fait un petit commerce de mil et d'arachides

Son nouveau crédit lui permettra de s'approvisionner en quantité afin d'accroitre ses bénéfices. 

Ses bénéfices lui permettrons de participer à la prise en charge de la famille. Par exemple l'habillement des enfants et leur santé
texts.en:
The solidarity group BOKK JOM was created three and a half years ago at the inauguration of the Banc Villageois of Takhikao, to which it belongs. It consists of 13 women from the same neighborhood. 

Mrs. Anta G. is the head of the group. She is seen sitting in the center with a white scarf on her shoulders and lifting her finger. She is 45 years old, married, and the mother of five children.  She makes a living by selling millet and peanuts.

With her new loan, she will increase her stocks and bolster her profits, which will allow her to help provide for the family, including the children’s clothing and healthcare.

loans.use: To promote her business

loans.name: Pedro Gilberto

texts.es:
Pedro Gilberto de 62 años de edad, tiene un hijo mayor de edad que le ayuda en el negocio y permanece con él casi todo el tiempo,  este señor atiende su negocio de manera personal, habitante de colonia san Jose, en el Municipio de Nueva Guinea, desde hace 20 años labora en su pequeño negocio de Pulperia siendo su  principal actividad economica para sastifacer sus necesidades.

Requiere este financiamiento para abastecer de productos su pulperia y asi poder imcrementar las oportunidades de venta y aumentar las ganancias permitiendole mejorar  las condiciones de vida economicamente,  espera ser beneficiado nuevamente con el fondo KIVA a quien agradece desde ya por este apoyo ya que realmente lo necesita; es una persona responsable, humilde y muy creativo.  

Su mayor sueño es que su hijo crezca mucho mas en el Negocio y sean una gran parsona que nos les falte el pan de cada dia.
texts.en:
Pedro Gilberto is 62 years old, and has an older son who helps him in the business. His son is with him almost all the time and Pedro attends to his business with a personal touch. He is from Colonia San Jose, in the municipality of Nueva Guinea. He has worked in his small neighborhood store for the past 20 years, as it is his main source of income to meet basic needs. 

He needs this loan to stock his neighborhood store with products so that he can increase his chances of sales and increase earnings, which would allow him to improve his living conditions. He hopes to be a return lender with Kiva, who he thanks for this support which he truly needs; he is a responsible, humble, and creative person.

His biggest wish is that his son grows more within the business and becomes a great person, and that they do not lack anything.

loans.use: To purchase goods for his neighborhood store.

loans.name: Elisa Audelina

texts.es:
ELISA AUDELINA O. T.
Elisa tiene 56 años, es casada, tiene cuatro hijos, su negocio es una tienda y tortillería desde hace seis años,  es una mujer muy trabajadora y con la ayuda de su esposo han podido mantener el negocio que está situado en la misma casa,  sus hijos  están casados y ella todavía tiene sueños y metas, uno de ellos  es poder ayudar a sus nietos y brindarles una mejor vida, una de sus hijas le ayuda en la tortillería y  se han dado cuenta que necesitan más inversión para brindarles un mejor servicio a los clientes y poder generar más ganancias por eso piden a FAPE y KIVA poder otorgarles un préstamo para su negocio.
Donde invertirán Productos comestibles y maiz
texts.en:
ELISA AUDELINA O. T.
Elisa is 56, married and has four children. Her business is a store and tortilla store which she has had for six years. She is a very hard-working woman who has been able to maintain her business with the help of her husband. Her business is in their own home. Her children are married and she still has dreams and goals, one of which is to be able to help her grandchildren and offer them a better life. One of her daughters helps her in the tortilla store and they have noticed that they need to invest more in order to offer a better service to their customers and generate more income. For this reason, they are requesting a loan from FAPE and Kiva for their business. They will invest in edible products and corn.

loans.use: to purchase edible products and corn

loans.name: Mujeres En Accion 7 Group

texts.en: Juana is the coordinator of her group Mujeres en accion 7 (Women in action). She makes her home here in a simple structure with her husband and their only child. She says that her biggest challenge is to help her daughter to become a professional. Juana is excited to be taking her third loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loan and grown her business. She has had her business for almost 16 years, starting to work from her house after a cousin motivated her to buy a hair dryer. She started her beauty salon in her living room; she decided to do it and little by little, she bought everything. She plans to use this loan to invest in her beauty salon by buying hair and cosmetic products. She also wants to buy a professional blower. She will use the profits to reinvest in her business and to save for her daughter's studies. Her story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican clients, many of whom recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti. Her group is located in the urban slums surrounding Santo Domingo. This area, like nearly all impoverished areas of the Dominican Republic, suffers from unreliable electricity and running water, none of which is potable.

loans.use: To buy hair products and a blower

loans.name: Sope Serigne Fallou Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de Solidarité SOPE SERIGNE FALLOU est créé depuis 7 cycles de 6 mois. Il est composé de 14 femmes qui sont toutes issus du même quartier. Elles se sont organisées par affinité et par voisinage. Le groupe fait partie du Banc Villageois de TAKHIKAO

Madame COUMB. M. assise au dernier rang à partir de la gauche sur la photo et levant la main est responsable du groupe. Elle âgée de 54 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 04. Elle a aussi la charge de sa belle fille. 

Elle fait un petit commerce de tissus et d'objets d'art. Elle fait aussi depuis plusieurs années de la couture 

Avec son nouveau crédit elle va renforcer son niveau d'achat de marchandises afin de réaliser plus de bénéfices

Son objectif est de mieux développer son activité et d'augmenter son fonds de roulement.
texts.en: The SOPE SERIGNE FALLOU solidarity group has been in existence for seven six-month cycles. It is composed of 14 women who all live in the same neighborhood. They are organized by kinship and neighborhood. The group is affiliated with the TAKHIKAO banc villageois.  Mrs. COUMB. M., seated in the back row in the left of the photo with her hand raised, is the leader of the group. She is 54 years old, married and the mother of four children. She is also responsible for her stepdaughter. She has a small business selling fabrics and decorative items and has been sewing for several years. With her new loan, she will bolster her purchase of merchandise in order to make a larger profit. Her goal is to expand her business and increase her working capital.

loans.use: To buy fabric and decorative items

loans.name: Amistad Group

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal "Amistad" inicia su septimo  ciclo con 16 socias.
Gardenia tiene 31 años, es madre de tres hijos, de 3, 7 y 8 años de edad. Durante el día trabaja en la tienda de su suegra. Por la noche vende juguetes en las calles de Ayacucho. Ella inició su negocio porque su hijo está muy enfermo y su tratamiento médico es muy costoso. Gardenia solicita un préstamo para invertir en su negocio y en el tratamiento médico de su hijo. Gardenia es socia de FINCA Perú desde hace 1 año. A ella le gusta la facilidad de obtener un préstamo y las reuniones dos veces por semana y el calendario de amortización. Su sueño es que sus hijos crezcan sanos y salgan adelante.
texts.en:
The “Amistad” (Friendship) Communal Bank is starting its seventh cycle with 16 members.

Gardenia is 31 years old, and she has three children.  They are three, seven, and eight years old.  During the day she works in her mother-in-law’s store.  At night she sells toys on the streets of Ayacucho.  She started her business because her son is very sick, and his medical treatment is very expensive.

Gardenia is requesting the loan to invest in her business and for her son’s medical treatment.

Gardenia has been a member of FINCA Perú for one year.  She likes the ease of getting a loan, the twice a week meetings, and the amortization schedule.

Her dream is for her children to grow healthy and that they get ahead.

loans.use: To buy seasonal toys

loans.name: Wilfredo Antonio

texts.es: Wilfredo Antonio se dedica a brindar el servicio de enderezado y pintura. Esta no es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos, por lo que tiene mucho tiempo de trabajar con Fundación León 2000, ha demostrado ser una persona responsable con sus pagos. El solicita este crédito para la compra de pintura, aerosoles, herramientas entre otras cosas. El es una persona muy reconocida y todos sus clientes asisten a su taller pues ofrece un excelente servicio.
texts.en: Wilfredo Antonio works providing paint and body work services.  This is not the first time that he has gotten a loan, as he has been working with Fundación León 2000 for a long time and has proven to be a responsible person with his payments.  He is requesting this loan for the purchase of paint, spray cans, and tools, among other items.  He is a very well-known person and all of his customers go to his shop because he offers excellent service.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Rosas Blancas De Otzolotepec Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama “ROSAS BLANCAS D. OTZOLOTEPEC”,  se encuentra ubicado en Estado D. México y ésta compuesto por 10 integrantes. En este grupo se encuentra la señora Oralia C. D. 33 años D. edad, ella tiene 4 hijos y nos platica que estudió solamente la primaria. Oralia es comerciante, tiene un negocio D. herrería junto con su esposo, desD. hace aproximadamente 3 años, con el crédito quiere comprar materia prima para el crecimiento D. su negocio ya que así podrán surtir un número mayor D. pedidos.  A futuro quieren que su taller sea más granD. para producir más y contratar personal que les ayuD., así mismo desean adquirir un vehículo para la entrega D. pedidos a domicilio.
texts.en: This group is called Rosas Blancas D. Otzolotepec.  It is located in the State of México and consists of ten members.  Oralia C. is in this group and she is 33 years old.  She has four children and tells us that she only completed elementary school.  Oralia is a merchant and she has had a blacksmith business with her husband for approximately three years.  With the loan, she wants to purchase raw material for her business’ growth so that they will be able to fill a larger number of orders.  In the future, they want their workshop to be larger in order to produce more and to hire workers to help them.  They also want to get a vehicle for home delivery of the orders.

loans.use: Raw material for her business' growth

loans.name: Rosario Pastora

texts.es:
Rosario de 56 años, es una mujer trabajadora que para ayudar a su esposo con los gastos familiares comenzó a vender productos Yanbal (empresa que ofrece a mujeres emprendedoras comenzar con sus ventas independientes). 

Viviendo en una zona urbana llamada Guasmo ha trabajado con las ventas de productos de uso personal desde tiempo atrás dando créditos por la comprar de sus productos. Realiza la venta de los productos sola pero cuando es de cobrar el dinero que le quedan debiendo le ayuda su esposo. Vende perfumes, cremas, desodorantes, cosméticos. 

Para seguir trabajando con diligencia y a una cantidad mayor sus productos quiere comprar con el préstamo perfumes, cremas, desodorantes etc. En el futuro quiere incrementar las ventas de los productos y tener una cartera de clientes grande.
texts.en:
Rosario is 56 years old and is a hardworking woman. To help her husband with the family expenses, she began to sell Yanbal products (a company that offers enterprising women the opportunity to start independent sales).

Living in an urban area called Guasmo, she has worked with personal products sales for some time, leaving her products on credit. She sells her products alone but her husband helps her when it comes to collecting the money that her customers owe. Rosario sells perfumes, creams, deodorants, and cosmetics.

In order to continue working diligently and with more products, she wants to use the loan to buy perfumes, creams, deodorants, etc. In the future, she wants to increase her product sales and have a large client list.

loans.use: Perfumes, creams

loans.name: Consuelo Antonia

texts.es: Consuelo Antonia se dedica a una pulpería. Hace más de 4 años que se dedica a este negocio, y así buscar nuevos ingresos. Esta no es la primera vez que solicita financiamientos pues es una persona que busca la forma de mantener siempre activo su negocio. Siempre está al pendiente de lo que sus clientes le solicitan ya que llegan en busca de los diferentes productos. El crédito es para la compra de materia prima para esta época festiva y así tener una gran variedad.
texts.en: Consuelo Antonia runs a pulpería [small grocery store]. She has run this business for over four years and is looking for new ways to earn. This is not the first time she has requested a loan, as she is someone who is always looking for a way keep her business moving. She is always aware of what her customers are requesting, since they arrive at her store looking for different products. This loan is for the purchase of merchandise for this holiday season, so that she can have a good variety available.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for her grocery store

loans.name: Ivelisse

texts.en:
Ivelisse is an entrepreneur whose business has improved as a result of a loan for her small beauty salon.  She also sells miscellaneous items, including phone cards. Ivelisse lives and does business near Hato Mayor, an agricultural area. This area, like nearly all impoverished areas of the Dominican Republic, lacks reliable electricity and potable running water. Ivelisse makes her home in a simple structure with her husband and their 4 children. 

She has had her business for about 2 years, starting when she received her first loan from Esperanza and bought her first clothing merchandise. Ivelisse plans to use this loan to invest in her business by purchasing clothes, women's handbags, and calling cards. She will use the profits to re-invest in her business, because she needs to buy a hair dryer. 

Ivelisse says that her most difficult challenge is to buy a plot of land in the town to start building a house. In the meantime she plans to continue enjoying working in her beauty salon.
